las// sngags kyi sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung// de yi don rnams 'di ltar bshad// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Da Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ a k+Sha/ sgra'i gnas brgyad nas

'byung ba 'di rnams ni thabs rdo rje yi ge ste/ sde tshan brgyad pa'o/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I li lI/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH sde tshan brgyad dang sbyor ba'o// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug pa 'di rnams ni shes rab
pad+ma'i yi ge'o// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin las// yi ge btu ba 'di ltar bshad// thams cad kun gyi dang po la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas 'og tu brgyan// dbyangs yig dgu pas steng du
brgyan// de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig pas// steng du mdzes par shes par bya// 'di ni ye shes rdzogs pa yin// sngags rnams kun gyi mgo la gzhag/ oM/ pa tshan gsum pa gzhag par bya// de dang tsa tshan

gsum par ldan// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// ka tshan dang po gzhag par bya// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa
gzhag/ sha tsan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ sha tsan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tsan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig

brgyan// ya tsan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ka tsan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par// pa

tsan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shri he ru ka hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gnyis pa// che mchog he ru ka'i snying po ste// gtso bo sngags su

shes par bya// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ ya tsan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tsan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la

dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tsan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tsan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tsan yi
ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og sha tsan bzhi pas spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu drug brgyan// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// sha tsan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng

du thig les mdzes par bya// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ gsang sngags yi ge 'bru brgyad pa// che mchog yab yum la sogs pa// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i snying por bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ pa tsan

yi ge dang po gzhag/ de dang ta tsan gsum par ldan// pa tsan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de dang ta tsan lnga par ldan// ta tsan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tsan gsum pas 'og tu spras// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng du

brgyan// de dang ta tshan gsum par ldan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// ka tsan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de
la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pa gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge gsum pa
gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes

par bya// oM pad+ma ta krid badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gsum pa// pad+ma dbang chen snying por bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge
gsum par ldan// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ka tshan yi ge

dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes

par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// oM badzra ki li ki la ya hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge 'bru dgu pa// dpal chen badzra gzhon nu yi// gsang sngags snying po ma 'khrugs
pa// phur pa rtsa ba'i snying por bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ thams cad kun gyi dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas

brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang

po gzhag/ rin po che yi phra yis gcad// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan lnga par

ldan// tsa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// oM a kro

te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// sku yi snying po yin par bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po

gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// pa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng
du thig le mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// thams cad kun gyi dang po gzhag/ rin po che yi phra yis gcad// oM kA la ru pa hU~M phaT a/ gsang sngags

yi ge 'bru dgu pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// gsung gi snying po yin par bshad// yi shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs
yig gsum pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ta tshan dang pos 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ka tshan

yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pa spras// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ta tshan dang pos 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// pa tshan yi ge
gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga

pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// rin

po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM hri Sh+ti bi kr-i ta A nan/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gcig pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// thugs kyi snying po yin par bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la

gzhig/ sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la ta tshan lnga par ldan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum

par ldan// de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas

brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ra tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po
gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad/ pa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig rgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la

dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas rgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas rgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// tsa tshan
yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga
pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge gsum par ldan// de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tsan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu

spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ba tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang

po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ thams cad kun gyi dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ka tshan

yi ge dang po gzhag/ tsa tsan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum par rgyan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// te tshan yi ge dang po

gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// ka tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum par ldan// de dang ka tshan gsum par ldan// sha tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la

dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pas brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ tsa tshan lnga pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas rgyan// de dang ka

tshan lnga par ldan// ka tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang ka tshan gsum par ldan// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ sha tshan bzhi pas 'og tu spras// de
la dbyangs yig bcu drug rgyan// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// de dang ka tshan gsum par ldan// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// ta

tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig rgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas rgyan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// pa tshan yi ge lnga par ldan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa

gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas rgyan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ sha tshan bzhi

pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyang yig bcu drug rgyan// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ sha tshan bzhi pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu drug rgyan// de la dbyangs
yig bcu gsum rgyan// rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// tsa tshan yi ge

dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas rgyan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ sha

tshan bzhi pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu drug rgyan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ sha tshan bzhi pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu drug rgyan// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// tsa tshan

yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis spras// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og tsa tshan lnga pas spras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas rgyan// de la ka tshan lnga par ldan// ka tshan yi ge gnyis pa

gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de dang ka tshan gsum par ldan// pa tshan yi ge lnga par gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// de la

dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// de dang ka tshan gsum par ldan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og sha tshan bzhi pas spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu drug rgyan// de la dbyangs

yig bcu gsum rgyan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og sha tshan bzhi pas spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu drug rgyan// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM sa ma ya many+dzu

shri mu dra ya man ta ka/ pa tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri ya man ta ka ma ya ra tsa ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo te kuM ma ma dza dza kha

la ma hring b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya lon/ tsit+ta ma la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dzA dzA/ snying kha rag ma srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ gsang sngags yig 'bru brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yab yum gyi yon tan snying po yin par

bshad/ ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu

gsum rgyan// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig rgyan// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la

dbyangs yig bcu gcig rgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pa brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang
po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan/ ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po

gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs

yig gsum pas rgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de 'og sha tshan dang pos spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig rgyan// ya tshan yi ge dang po

gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis bcad// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis bcad// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de 'og sha tshan dang pos spras// de la dbyangs yig

bcu gcig rgyan// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de 'og sha tshan dang pos spras// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de 'og sha

tshan dang pos spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig rgyan// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum

pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de 'og dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang

ta tshan dang por ldan// oM ya ma ra dza sa to me ya// ya me to ru na yo ta ya// ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She dza ni ra ma ya hU~M phaT/ yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags/ gsang ba rin chen thugs kyi gter// yig 'bru sum
bcu rtsa gnyis pa// mgo dang mtha' rten gnyis dang ldan// 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsang sngags 'di// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// 'phrin las sngags kyi rtsa bar bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la

gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// de 'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// tsa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi

ge gsum pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og pa tshan gsum pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de 'og ta tshan dang pos

spras// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge dang
po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig

les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dag ta tshan dang por ldan// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og ya tshan gnyis pas

spras// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan/ ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru rtsa gnyis pa// phyag na rdo rje gtum po yi// sku yi snying po

yin par bshad// yi shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og sha tshan bzhi pas spras// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan

yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// sha tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes

par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang po ldan// rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM tsaN+Da ma ha ro Sha na hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu pa 'di// phyag na rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// gsung

gi snying po yin par bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de dang pa tshan lnga par ldan// pa tshan yi ge gsum

pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par lngan// de 'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// de

'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// pa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis

pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM nI laM badzra pa ni hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gcig pa// thugs kyi snying po yin par bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la

gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// de 'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// pa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas rgyan// tsa tshan

yi ge dang po gzhag/ de dang rta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de dang rta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge
bzhi pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas rgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas rgyan// steng du thig

les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da ma hA tsaN+Da hU~M hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gsum pa/ khro chen phyag na

rdo rje yi// yon tan gyi ni snying po bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de 'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// de 'og

dbyangs yig bcu gsum rgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas rgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan

dang por ldan// rin po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM ma hA kro ta hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge 'bru bdun pa/ khro bo 'bum gyis dbang bskur ba'i// stobs chen phyag na rdo rje yi// 'phrin las rtsa ba'i snying po
bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu la gzhag/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa gzhag par bya// de dang ka tshan gsum par ldan// de 'og dbyangs yig gnyis pas spras// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig

lnga pas rgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas rgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// rin
po che yi 'phra yis gcad// oM ga ru na hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge 'bru drug pa// gser gyi bya khyung rgyal po'i sngags su bshad// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ yi ge btu ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed pos zhus pa/ kye ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi bye brag nges pa rnams// 'gro la phan phyin bshad par zhu// zhes pa dang/ ston pas bka'

stsal pa/ che mchog he ru ka'i snying po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi snying po yin par bshad// pad+ma dbang chen snying po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi snying po yin

par bshad// rdo rje gzhon nu'i snying po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi snying po yin par bshad// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i snying po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yon

tan snying po yin par bshad// phyag na rdo rje'i snying po dang// mkha' lding rgyal po'i snying po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'phrin las snying po yin par bshad// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan
dang// 'phrin las dag dang lnga rnams ni// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// sku la lnga ste gsung la lnga// thugs la lnga ste yon tan lnga// 'phrin las dag la lnga ru bshad/ khyad par thabs ni gsang ba
ste// sngags ni thams cad grub par byed// rig pa sems kyi rang bzhin te// las la bsngags pas sngags zhes bya// sems kyi dran pa bzung la ste// kun la sngags pas sngags shes bya// rig pa sems kyi thig

le ste// len pa'i phyir na snying por bshad// snang ba sku yi rang bzhin la// bsgyur ba'i phyir na phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba sngags kyi snying po la// srog ces bya ba'i ming yang
med// gsang ba srog gi snying po ni// mi rtag chos can yin pa'i phyir// 'jig rten pa la gnas pa'o// gsang ba sngags kyi snying po ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// thams cad kun la gnas par

bshad// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lnga dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ gzungs sngags dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang ba srog gi snying po
dang/ gsang sngags kyi snying po rnams bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang po la/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed pos gsol pa/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i 'dod ched du// 'jig rten
'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sngags kyi 'phreng ba ji ltar lags// kun bzang yab kyis bstan du gsol// zhes pa dang/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sngags kyi 'phreng ba

ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M ka ra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la dan Da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ar+Ya

a tsa la hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kun+Da li hU~M phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha tai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M phaT/ phyogs bcu khro

bo'i gsang sngags kyi 'phreng ba'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// hU~M shrI he ru ka kro d+hi shwa ri staM/ hU~M ha he phaT/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu b+h+yo/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu b+h+yo/ ma ma yo gi

ni ru lu b+h+yo/ nyid bzhi mu kha le/ kro d+hi shwa ri b+ha ga pad+ma rgya/ bde klong 'dus 'dus na snying dza shag yu te b+h+yo// 'di lnga ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga zhes bya'o// dbyings kyi yum drug go/ ma hA laM te ha/ grin sa mu hA

dza la rtsa raM ha/ bi sha san ti ha/ bi yang yang te ha/ oM badzra kro d+hi shwa ri b+ha ga pad+ma rgya hU~M hU~M/ badzra shan ting pad+ma ka ru ting b+h+yo// mu tri ni/ a shan tri ni/ b+ha ga dun tri ni/ badzra sur+Ya bi d+ha ma ho ye/ badzra pad+ma bi dam to

yi badzra kha rag bi ta ma to ye/ badzra sing gro ba di ma to ye/ badzra keM badzra keM/ badzra ta keM badzra ta keM/ badzra ni la badzra ni la/ badzra lan d+ha badzra lan d+ha/ badzra sang g+h+ri ni mu graM raM shang/ badzra kha rag snying kha

rag/ trag rag sha trag rag sha mu tra nan/ kha mud tra pa ta rag sha/ pra ban pra ka ra gang ti sta b+h+yo/ pra kring gang gi shang b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hU~M ka ri ka/ ba rod da rod/ ni la chur mi d+ha/ kha dong kha/ da la dza la/ pad+ma tsan d+ha ma ru

ra ga to/ ting saM ting saM/ e a ra li/ bu byi ru lu b+h+yo/ bu byi ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rag sha trag rag sha b+h+yo/ a ti b+h+yo/ b+ho ting b+h+yo/ pus ting b+h+yo/ mu ting b+h+yo/ badzra shan ting b+h+yo/ dun ting b+h+yo/ har ting b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/ te

pang b+h+yo/ a bar d+ha la b+h+yo/ da la dun b+h+yo/ d+hi na ma ma ga ya sa b+h+yo/ ma nu rag sha si b+h+yo/ phra ma ni b+h+yo zhes pa nas badzra laM bo d+ha ra ya b+h+yo// zhes pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni spyir shes par bya'o// de rnams ni ma mo drug cu rtsa

brgyad 'khor bcas kyi sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma ma snying kha ra ga na// ma ma rag sha ma ma rag sha/ rag mo snying kha rag ma dun

dun/ trag rag sha ma snying te keM ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru la b+h+yo/ snying kha rag ma/ ma ma sa ma ya/ daM daM dza dza/ ru snying kha la rag sha ni rbad thum ril li li b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ni sha ku ru rag sha kha raM ni rbad thuM/ ril li li b+h+yo/

snying kha la rag sha ni ti sta rbad thum ril li li b+h+yo/ trag rag sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo ni rbad thuM ril li li b+h+yo/ de rnams ni gtso mo lnga'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par

gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ga na ba ti gu na bu ti dun dun dza dza/ de ni thog gi bu yug ma'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma

ma trag sha mu tra kha mun tra ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ rag mo te kuM dza dza pha la ma hing b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ de ni e ka dza ti sgrol byed ma'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par bshad// de nas yang dag

bshad bya ba// ma ma trag shag sha gu ra he se e sham b+h+yo ru lu ru lu/ de ni dkar mo spyi'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dang bshad bya ba// ma ma trag rag sha

tsit+ta a ru na/ nan dza dza/ de ni dkar mo 'bum gyi gtso mo nyi zla thod 'phreng can gyi sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// trag rag sha trig trig tsit+ta

hring hring dza dza/ de ni smug mo 'bum gyi gtso mo smug mthing rgyal mo'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma ma trag sha mu tra bi sha traM hring dza/ de ni
nag mo 'bum gyi gtso mo// nag mo chen mo'i sngags su shes par bya// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me dza dza/ de ni lha mo

nag mo re ma ti'i sngags so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ kha thun rag sha/ ma trang ru tra dran b+h+yo/ rag mo sha khrag dun b+h+yo/ smag rgyags dun dun rgyug ni dza/ smyags rgyags sarba dun b+h+yo/ ya tha ya 'bum rbad teM braM

ze mo nag mo b+h+yo/ ru lu tsa pa la/ ru tri ru le sha phaT sod sod/ du ni dun ting du la ya dza/ du ru dza la ni ha na dza/ du ma ra ha te dza b+h+yo dza/ de rnams ni bdud kha rag nag po bkrag med dang/ srin mo kha 'dar mgo

dgu ma dang/ bal mo spun gsum dang/ nag mo phung gsum ma'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sum badzra ra ga sha ke te/ trag sha thang thang

dza/ ma ma rag mo nag sha thun na ga duM ba le dza/ bi sha mi du ru ma shi ge tsa pa ni// ra hu la dza/ rag mo rag mo snying tsa la ma ma ma b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo ru ru ro ru tsa pa snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo tsab mo tsab

mo/ khrag la mu shaM b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo trag mo trag mo// shig shig snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rag mo snying tsa ru ru tsab mo snying kha rag gu si dan ma shag mu shag ma b+h+yo/ de rnams ni srin mo rag sha nag mo glog 'phreng can

dang/ srin mo sbal mgo khrag mi ma dang/ gza' gdong ming sring snga'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// su kri pa ya ba ra tsit+ta/ yo gi shwa ri ma ma

tsit+ta dun dun dza/ de ni gse mo snying zan ma bzhi'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags kyi spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma hA ka la/ ru paM paM smaM/ a kro taM/ ma ha sha pa ha naM/ na

rag sing ha/ sarba b+hu ta/ a ti pa ta ya/ ya ma ra dza dun dun dza/ de ni 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// oM ma

hA de ba tsit+ta hring hring dza/ de ni legs ldan dbang phyug chen po'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma hA kA la gu yi hri ta hU~M phaT/ de ni mgon po

legs ldan nag po'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mar ni ru tra ka la b+h+yo// de ni yab bdud kun gyi gtso bo nag po me'i kha rlangs can ces

kyang bya// skos rje brang dkar zhes kyang bya// ya bdud kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bya ba'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bi sha ma hA ra dza hrIM hrIM dza/ de

ni srog bdag rgyal po li byin ha ra'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ku be ra tsit+ta hring hring dza dza/ de ni gnod sbyin srog bdag

rgyal po gnod sbyin ma ru tse'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dang bshad bya ba// rgyun breng thuM ril/ taM pa ka so so ba te/ badzra tsa lo ki/ badzra ki li ki la ya/ tri

shar gar li phri pri mi li/ badzra sA d+hu sa ma ya/ ra paM dza dza dun b+h+yo/ de ni blo bur dang ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu'i bdag po gying chen rdo rje legs pa'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par

gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ka la ti pa tsa/ nA ga rag sha che ge mo rti ku la phe ban shan phos phos/ shig shig/ chuM chuM/ hU~M ya hU~M ya/ klu nag po mgo dag pa che ge mo dza dza/ de ni mdze nad las kyi
'khor lo'i sngags// 'chi bdag mgo dgu pa'i sngags su shes par bya'o// 'di ni las sngags rnam pa gsum// rnal ma zlog dang lha dkrug gsum/ shin tu gab pa'i tsakra bskor/ bka' yi gsang rgyud ji snyed
du// gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams cad la// 'di bzhin kun la shes par bya// ngan sngags gtsug lag rgyud las/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi

pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la zhus pa/ kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ser ba zhes bgyi ji lta bu// lo yi nad ces ji lta bu// glog ces bya ba ji lta bu// 'brug
ces bya ba ji lta bu// 'byung ba rlung zhes ji ltar lags// de rnams 'byung ba'i dus rnams su// ser ba 'byung bar nges pa na// dus kyi char ba 'byung ba'i tshe// ser ba med pa ji ltar
lags// ma bsgrub par yang 'bab 'gyur na// bsgrubs nas nges pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan bdag la bka' drin gsungs// zhes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal

khyod nyon cig/ ma 'ongs rnams kyi don du bshad// ser ba zhes bya'i de nyid ni// sngags kyi 'od zer bsam yas 'phro// ma mo mkha' 'gro las mkhan nyid// mkha' 'gro'i nga ro 'brug gi sgra// gzi mdangs glog

tu 'byung ba yin// de yi kha rlangs sprin du 'byung// sprul ba ser ba chen po 'bab// de ni ser ba'i sgra ru nges// dbugs ni 'byung ba rlung yin te// shin tu drag la grang ba 'byung// des ni ser ba'i sna yang

'dren// 'di rnams ser ba'i sgra ru nges// klu'i nga ro 'brug gi sgra ru 'byung// gzi mdangs glog tu 'byung ba'i tshe/ kha rlangs sprin dang na bun 'thibs// de yi sprul pa char du 'bab// 'di ni 'byung ba rang bzhin
tsha grang 'khrug/ dpe don gnyis su de bzhin khyad par che'o// ser ba'i ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum du nges pa ni// snying kar gnam gzer nam mkha'i 'khor lo can// nam

mkha'i dkyil 'khor shin tu zlum zhing 'khyil ba la// dbus su hU~M bkod steng du phrom// 'og tu hril la shar du shar// lho ru ma bkod nub tu ra// byang du ma bkod steng sgor b+h+yo/ thams cad byang chub sems kyi rang
bzhin bsam// gzas pa'i yul yang de bzhin gang bar bsgom// bar gzer ri rab 'khor lo can// ri rab chen po shin tu brjod pa la// lte bar sa yi maN+Dal bsgom// yig 'bru dgod pa gong bzhin bya// sa
gzer yul zhing se 'brung 'khor lo can// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo la// 'dab brgyad dbus su zlum zhing 'khyil bar bsgom// yig 'bru dgod pa gong bzhin sbyar/ khrag gsum yungs kar rgyal po
dang// snying dang gu gul nag po dang// dug sna gsum la sbyar byas nas// ser ba'i bu gzhag ri lu bya// shes rab can gyi 'gyur ba dang// shes rab chung na gsum du nges// dang po la ni nyi shar lta bu

ste// gnyis pa la ni phu chu 'brug pa 'dra// gsum pa bya rgod gzan la 'jug pa ltar// drag po sngags kyi 'od zer las// bdag nyid ye shes tshogs kyi gsang ba dang// rdzas rnams mkha' 'gro'i tshigs kyis gang
ba gnyis// yul gsum gshed ma'i tshogs kyis gang ba gsum// dbyer med ma 'dres gcig gi ngang du gsal// gang zhig las la sbyar ba'i rtags byung na// de dus las la sbyar ba shin tu gces/ khrag rnams

khol na khrag zor brdeg/ zor gyi phebs zhes rgyal bas gsungs// ri lu 'phar zhing 'od 'byung ri lu 'phang// ri lus phebs zhes nges par rgyal bas gsungs// thod pa 'phrog la 'tsheg cing 'od byung na// gzer

gyi nges par phebs zhes rgyal bas gsungs// phur pa 'phar zhing 'od byung phur gzer gdab// phub pas nges par phebs zhes rgyal bas gsungs// yungs kar 'phar zhing sngags sgra mang du sgrogs// gang gi yul
de thun gyis phab gyur na// yungs thun phebs zhes rgyal bas nges par gsungs// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ sair ba'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das
dpal kun tu bzang po la// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa// kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// thog gi de nyid bshad par zhu// zhes gsol pa dang/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal

pa// rdo rje thog gi las rnams ni// lo grangs rtsis kyis shes bya ste// gang zhig rta yi lo byung na// drag po sngags kyi dngos grub myur// sbrul gyi lo yang de bzhin no// gang zhig byi ba'i dus kyi tshe// de tshe 'di bsgrub
ma yin te// phag gi lo yang de bzhin no// mi byar mi 'dod dus byung na// rta yi zla ba rta yi dus// sbrul gyi zla ba sbrul gyi dus// nyi ma'i dus tshod brtsi la 'jug/ gang du 'phebs pa'i sa tshad
de// gzer gdab pa yang de bzhin no// gang zhig dngos grub 'byung ba'i tshe// rta ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin no// ming gi rnam pa so so yang// las kyi 'bras bu gcig pas na// don gyi man ngag gcig yin

no// thog la dbye ba'i rnam pa lnga// dang po ser thog/ gnyis pa lcags thog/ gsum pa zangs thog/ bzhi ba 'khar ba'i thog/ lnga pa la ni rdo rje'i thog/ de ltar rnam pa lnga ru gsungs// 'di yi rdzas rnams bstan
pa yang/ khrag gsum yungs kar rgyal po dang// snying dang gu gul nag po yang// so na dang ni de yi grogs// byi la gab pa'i khrag gam ni// na chung ma yi khrag tu gsungs// 'di yi 'phen byed rnam pa

gnyis// drag po'i sngags kyi 'phang ba dang// drag po'i dam rdzas 'phang ba'o// drag po'i sngags kyi 'phang ba ni// ma ra ya la hril brtags la// b+h+yo zhes rig pa drangs la 'phang// 'di las rdzas kyi 'phang ba
ni// dri mo'i skra shad 'ur rdo la// zhing gi ras mas skyungs byas la// shes rab yi ge yam bskyod la// lan gsum bskor la 'phang btang na// gar 'dod gnas su phebs par nges// 'di yi ting 'dzin bstan pa

ni// snying khar chos kyi 'khor lo la// me yi 'khor lo zur gsum bsgom// rtse mo steng sgor bstan pa la// yi ge dza bzhag g.yas pa la// g.yon par ra bkod dkyil du hU~M// de 'og b+h+yo la de stengs yaM// phaT
ni kun tu khyab par bsgom// ma ra ya dang grogs po ni// dza la ram zhes mthar gzhag par// ser ba 'du ba'i drag sngags yin// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo la// pad dkyil med pa'i 'khor lo ni// gong

ma bzhin du gsal bar bya// nyi shar lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'o ma rag ta bsreg pa'i tshe// bdag nyid me dpung chen po la// ting 'dzin sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// 'o ma rag ta son zhu// me long dkyil nas
blang byas la// gong bzhin rdzas kyi dkyil du gzhag/ spel ba 'dus ti hril dang spel// me mda' lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// gong bu gcig tu dril ba dang// ser thog brgyab pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dkyil du

bcug la 'phang bar bya// gang 'dod gnas su phebs par nges// 'di yi dus tshod bstan pa ni// sgrub pa'i dus ni rta sbrul la// zla ba'i dus kyang rta sbrul te// nyi ma'i dus kyang rta sbrul nges// phyed gong sbrul la nyi

phyed rta yi dus// gang zhig dregs pa 'dul don du// 'jug pa'i dus tshod 'di ldan na// rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub nye// 'di rnams dus dang ma ldan na// rang ga 'chi 'am 'khor rnams phung// yul rigs phung
bar the tshom med// thebs pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// spen pa sa khams gser gyi dus// lag pa phur pa rdo rje'i dus// mig mar nyi ma zangs dang lcags kyi dus// 'di la las rnams 'grub par
gdon mi za// shed mas srog la dbab pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// rdo rje sa khams spen pa'i dus su brdeg/ gser dngul zangs lcags mig mar dus su brdeg/ 'phro byed lcags thogs shing khams phur bu'i
dus su brdeg/ 'di la zor brgyab thebs pa the tshom med// nam mkha' sa gzhi bar snang khams// thams cad ye shes me dpung 'bar// 'dus ti hril zhes mi thogs ma nges yongs kyang 'tshig/ 'di dang ldan na
gzas pa gdon mi za// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ thog gi de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang gshin rje gshed kyis/ dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol
to// spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang// las rnams grub par bya ba'i phyir// sngags kyi sa rnams bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ kun tun bzang pos bka' stsal pa// 'phrin las thams cad byed pa

yi// sngags kyi sa rnams ngas bshad kyis// 'gro la phan phyir gus par nyon// dza yi bsnyen pa bgrangs na ni// thams cad ma lus 'gug par byed// hU~M gi bsnyen pa bgrangs na ni// thams cad dbang du sdud
par byed// phaT kyi bsnyen pa bgrangs na ni// che bas che ba'i mthu dpung 'joms// b+h+yo yi bsnyen pa bgrangs na ni/ thams cad las la bskul bar byed// ya yi bsnyen pa bgrangs na ni// thams cad las la
'dzud par byed// gang 'dod dmigs pa sprad nas ni// dza zhes bya ba'i mtha' brjod nas/ khams gsum thams cad 'gugs par byed// hU~M gis thams cad sdus par byed// b+h+yo ni rbad pa'i sngags yin

te// phaT ni spro ba'i sngags yin no// phaT Ta sprad pa'i sngags yin no// rbad ni gsod cing gcod pa'i sngags// ma ra ya dang phaT ces pas// bsad pa'i drag sngags yin par bshad// ma ra ya dang rbad ces

pa// gsod pa'i ngan sngags yin par bshad// dz+wa la raM zhes bya ba ni// bsreg pa'i sngags su shes par bya// a dang trag dang phye dang shad// lha dang dbye ba'i sngags su bshad// ma ra ya dang phye zhes pas// dgra

bo gnyen dang dbral ba'i sngags su bshad// ma ra ya dang thun dang b+h+yo// thun dang zor gyi sngags su bshad// ma ra ya dang dkrug dnganan// dgra sde dkrug pa'i sngags su bshad// u tsan d+ha ya phaT ces
pas// dgra bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags su bshad// A kar sha ya dza zhes pas// skyes pa dgug pa'i sngags su bshad// A kar sha ya hril zhes pas// bud med dgug pa'i sngags su bshad// shan ting ku ru swA

hA ni// thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA ni// thams cad rgyas par byed pa'o// pa shaM ku ru ho zhes pa// thams cad dbang du sdud pa'o// phra ma ya dang rbad dang ya// dmigs pa'i mgo

bo 'khor ba yi// las kyi sa ru bshad pa'o// rag ta tsa ra ya dang ni// rbad dang ya zhes bya ba ni/ khrag tu skyug pa byed pa yi// las kyi sngags su bshad pa'o// ma ra dza ya dang rbad dang ya// dran pa myos byed las
kyi sngags su bshad// ma ra ya dang rbad dang ya// gsod par byed pa'i sngags su bshad// stam pa ya dang nan zhes pa dang// gnan pa'i sngags su bshad// trig nan zhes pa'i gsang sngags ni// thams cad

gzir ba'i sngags su bshad// tsit+ta rbad dang gnan zhes pa// drag po gzir ba'i sngags su bshad// rbad dang nan zhes bya ba ni// btsan thabs gzir ba'i sngags su bshad// he tsa dun dang phob ces pas// ltas

ngan sgrub pa'i sngags su bshad/ khu tsa he dang phaT ces pa// ltas ngan 'phang ba'i sngags su bshad// li tsa rbad ces bya ba ni// ser ba gcod pa'i sngags su bshad// badzra li tsa rbad ces pa// thog dang ser ba

gcod pa'o// dud phrom ser ba 'dril ba'i sngags su bshad// hril dang shar dang phob dang b+h+yo// ser ba dbab pa'i sngags su bshad// shar la b+h+yo yi bskul ba ni// ser ba lam bstan sngags su bshad// che ge

mo yi lo thog la// A be sha ya a zhes pa// gzan la dbab pa'i sngags su bshad// raM raM zhes pa'i sngags ni// thog gi dril sngags dag tu bshad// hril dang shar dang b+h+yo zhes pa// thog rnams 'phang ba'i

sngags su bshad// 'dus ste hril dang b+h+yo dang phob// thog gi 'phang sngags dag tu bshad/ khyug khyug yaM yaM zhes pa ni// glog dang rlung gi sngags su bshad// 'ur 'ur chem chem zhes pa ni// 'brug gi snying po dag

tu bshad// ni sha ku ru zhi zhes pa// srin po gdong dmar snying po yin// che ge mo zhes bya ba ni// btags pa'i ming gi snying po yin// gsang ba srog gi snying po 'am// btags pa ming gi snying po yin// dmigs pa
sprod la bzlas par bya// rgyud ni gsungs pa'i sngags la// mkhas pas dbyung dang gzhug pa dang// 'khrugs dang bsdebs pa shes par bya// bka' yi gsang rgyud ji snyed pa// gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams

cad la// 'di bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dza dza/ hU~M hU~M/ baM baM/ ho ho/ ha ha/ hi hi/ hU hU/ he he ho ho/ swA hA sa ma ya twaM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya/ phaT phaT/ dz+wa la raM/ thuM ril/ thuMs thuMs/
rbad rbad/ rbud rbud/ sad sad/ rbad ling/ rbud ling/ rbad thuMs/ rbad ya/ rbad ya/ rbad shag/ rbad myogs/ rbad yaM/ rbad thibs/ rbad myogs myogs/ rbad rmugs// rbad rbud/ rbad raM/ rbad nan nan/ ru pa
sad/ bag sad/ tsit+ta sad/ thuM ril sad/ raka ta sa/ ti ta sad/ ska nad sad/ ru ba rbad/ bA ga rbad/ tsit+ta rbad/ thuM ril rbad/ rag ta rbad/ ti ta rbad/ skan da rbad/ rbad thaMs/ shig thibs/ khas

khas/ shag shag/ shig shig/ sad sad/ rngubs rngubs/ rbad khas/ tshal pa tshal pa rbad/ hring hring dza/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ a pra be sha ya phaT/ be ta sha ya phaT/ badzra aM gu sha dza/ badzra pA sha hU~M/ badzra s+pho Ta

baM/ badzra gan Da ho/ dza hU~M baM ho/ gardza gardza mA ra ya phaT/ ha na ha na mA ra ya phaT/ da ha da ha mA ra ya phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa mA ra ya phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha mA ra ya phaT/ hU lu hU lu mA ra ya phaT/ TiSh+ta TiSh+ta mA ra ya phaT/

tshin d+ha tshin d+ha mA ra ya phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha mA ra ya phaT/ pho Ta pho Ta mA ra ya phaT/ rba na rba na phaT/ rban rban phaT/ thun b+h+yo thun b+h+yo phaT/ ha sa dza la b+hi sha ha la ha la b+h+yo b+h+yo phaT/ e swA hA/ yaM swA hA/ raM swA hA/ baM

swA hA/ suM swA hA/ e ma hA/ yaM ma hA/ raM ma hA/ baM mahA/ suM ma hA/ e che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ yaM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ raM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ baM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ suM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ che ge mo e rbad/

che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ che ge mo yaM rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ che ge mo raM rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ che ge mo baM rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ che ge mo sum rbad/ che ge mo sum rbad/ che ge

mo mA ra ya phaT/ e che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ e yaM che ge mo mA ra ya yaM/ raM che ge mo mA ra ya raM/ baM che ge mo mA ra ya baM/ sum che ge mo mA ra ya suM/ suM baM raM yaM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ e yaM raM baM suM che ge mo mA ra ya

phaT/ e ag ne maN+Dal che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ yaM ka ra ma maN+Dal che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ raM dz+wa la maN+Dal che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ baM pa ti maN+Dal che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ suM tiSh+Tha maN+Dal che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ma ha

maN+Dal che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ thang thang dza/ mo ha ya che ge mo hA ya/ bag rbad nan staM pa nan// dza la pa ya dza la pa ya dza la ni staM pa ni ma hA man tra/ sha ri ra ni phaT phaT phaT/ ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/
sngags kyi sa brgyad bcu rtsa gcig bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed pos gsol ba// kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin
gyi// nyams su blangs pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// ston pa kun du bzang pos bka' stsal pa// sngon du 'gro ba'i las dag ni// rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes lha yi bsnyen bsgrub
dang// 'jig rten dregs pa'i bsnyen bsgrub gnyis// nyams su blang ba'i rim pa ni// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// phyi bsgrub nang bsgrub gsang bsgrub dang// gsang chen yang gsang gter du bsgrub
dang lnga'o// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor phyi bsgrub bo// lus la lha bkod nang bsgrub po// snying la lha bkod gsang bsgrub bo// rtsa la lha bkod gsang chen no// sems nyid lhar bsgom yang gsang

gter// sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang// cho ga las kyi rim pa rnams// rang gi bsgrub thabs gzhung bzhin bya// las la sbyar ba'i rim pa rnams// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyi// sbyor ba rnam pa
gsum gyis ni// rten 'brel 'dzom pa'i nus mthu dang// las rnam grub pa'i nus mthu yis// las rnams 'grub par byed pa'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// zhi ba zlum la dkar ba'o// rgyas pa gru bzhi
ser po'o// dbang la zla gam dmar po'o// drag po gru gsum mthing nag go/ bsten dang mchod dang las kyi rdzas// 'khor lo bskor dang thun gyi rdzas// yungs kar yungs nag khrag dang dug/ lcags phye zangs

phyed rdo phye dang// gnam lcags gri lcags phur pa dang// dug shing dag gi phur pa gdab// gang byed rang gi gzhung dang sbyar// las mkhan gang yin srog snying dang// dmigs pa gang yin srog dang ni// 'phrin
las gang byed las kyi sba// mkhas pas sde pa shes par bya// las kyi bzlas pa gang 'dod bya// bdag nyid yi dam lhar bsgom nas// sngags kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// sngags bdag dam can rgyud bskul
bas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams ni// thogs pa med par byed par bsgom// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang gsum// las gzhug sbyin srid dag gis gcad// drag po'i las ni thams cad kyi// las gzhug gcad
pa'i rim pa ni// bsregs dang zor dang gnan pas bcas// la ta bsod nams chung gyur pa'i// sngags pas 'phrin las ma 'grub na// sngon du bsod nams tshogs bsags la// de nas bsnyen bsgrub gzhung
bzhin bya// de nas 'phrin las lan gsum spogs// las gzhung snga ma bzhin du bya'o// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// sngon du 'gro ba kun byas las// dam can gnad la dbab par bya// bzlog cing gsad

par bya ba dang// dkrug cing gsad par bya ba dang// gzir zhing bsad pa'i las bya'o// de nas rnal 'byor dam pa des// rang la bar chad mi tshugs phyir// yi dam lha yi bsgom bzlas bya// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin
brtson par bsgom// tha mal lus su mi bsam zhing// snang stong gnyis su mi bsam zhing// snang stong gnyis su med par bsgom// de nas las rnams grub pa dang// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten

pa'i// sngags bdag bsrung ma dam can la// mchod pa dbul zhing dam tshig bskangs// rdo rje sa la gnas gyi bar// rang gi yi dam rgyun du bsgom// spyod lam bka' yi gzhung bzhin bya// snang stong gnyis su med
par bsgom// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ rdzas dang/ sngags dang/ ting 'dzin gyi bsgom bsgrub dang/ 'phrin las nyams su blang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// ngan sngags gtsug lag

gi rgyud phyi ma/ phyi ma'i yang phyi ma shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so//// snod ldan kun la yod na ngo mtshar chung// yongs la spel na dmyal ba'i rgyu// snod ldan med na gter du spos// ngag 'jam zhe ngan can la shor

ro re// lan gcig tshe yi dus byas nas// snod ldan yod na de la gtod// glen pa byol song lta bus slus pa re// gcol chung ta tha ra yis spel la re// I thi/ a thim/ kun sa ma ya thim/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/
shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen 'di/ rgya yis btab nas gter du sbas so//// rgya gar skad du/ e man tra mar kA la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ drag sngags mtshon cha nag po'i rgyud/
'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad sum ldan bde ba yis// zungs thub mtshan ma kun spangs shing// yon tan ma lus kun ldan pas// bde ba chen po khyod la 'dud// 'di skad
bdag gi thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med pa'i pho brang ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor rdo rje snying po la sogs pa ma sgribs chos kyi dbyings na gnas pa rnams dang/ sa lam la gnas pa rnams dang/ sgrol ba phyin ci ma log pa rnams dang/ dregs pa
'dul ba'i khro tshogs dang/ 'jig rten khram 'debs 'thob pa'i tshogs dang/ khrag skyug gshan pa srog la rngam pa'i tshogs dang/ gdug pa gsum dang bcas pa'i sde dpon dregs pa can dang/ thams cad 'dus

pa'i dbus na 'jam pa'i rdo rje snying pos/ rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam dag chos sku'i rang bzhin la// 'gro ba 'dul phyir mtshan ma'i sku// thabs kyi rgyal po bde ba che// ye shes rol pa'i las
rnams kun// rdzogs pa'i tshul du rgyas mdzod la// gdug pa 'dul ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam pa nyid mi g.yo ba las rngam tshig drag po'i ting nge 'dzin las

bzhengs te// a+ye badzra sarba du Sh+tan// zhes gsungs pas/ 'jig rten thams cad 'ur// rab tu 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem/ g.yo zhing rab tu sdeg go/ de'i tshe 'khor thams cad brgyal zhing srog dang bral
du cha'o// lus sa la brdebs shing smre sngags 'don no// rigs pa'i rgyal po bde ba che// 'khor du 'dus pas srog dang bral du nye// srog gi snying po 'di bzhengs la// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par
mdzod// ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs te rngam pa'i sgra 'di bsgrags so// kun gyi rang bzhin gcig pa la// rtog spyod snang srid kun khyab
brdal// ye shes chen po kun 'byung bas// sna tshogs sbyor ba rgyas pa'i zhing// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams kyis thos nas/ 'khor gyi gtso bo 'jam pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// yang dag bden
pa'i lam mchog las// gsang ba rin chen gab pa'i don// zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab lam// smod po drag po rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen po nyid/ dregs pa

can 'dul zhing smod pa'i las rgyas par mdzad pa'i phyir/ zil gyis gnon pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gtso bo 'di lta lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na// drag po e'i gzhal yas
khang na// stobs chen dregs pa 'dul ba'i sde// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rngam// 'khor lo rdo rje ral gri g.yas// be chon gtun shing sdigs mdzub

g.yon// zhing chen g.yang gzhi ko rlon dang// stag gi sham thabs rab tu mdzes// sbrul dang rin po che yis mdzes// snyan cha mgur chu tshangs skud dang// phyag zhabs ro nyes rab tu mdzes// dbu la he ru lnga yis

brgyan// bdud rgyal srin po'i thod par spras/ thugs mchog smug nag 'khor lo snying// dregs 'dul ljang nag rdo rje 'phreng// rus sbal rngam pa glog 'gyu ste// dbu la mkha' lding gdug pa 'dul// stag dang

seng ge rngam pa la// yang sbrul smug nag ro nye 'dren// dug sbrul rlangs pa dgra la gtong// bdud mo g.yon na nye ba ste// snying 'khyud dung dmar gtso la stobs// 'khor gyi mon pa bla 'gugs dang// 'chi bdag
tshe bdag srog bdag bcas// ma skyed gdod nas lhun gyis grub// stong pa'i ngang las rang bzhin 'char// las dang sbyor ba sna tshogs pa// ye shes rol pa'i rgyan du che// bgrod dang phyag rgya stobs

chen gyi// stobs chen snying pos rang lus srun// dus ngan las kyis mnar ba'i tshe// sdang sems can dag 'gugs byed la// las kyi 'khor lo snying la bskor// 'byung po rgyu ba'i phung po bshig/ nyon mongs lnga
gsum rang gshed dbab// pho nya'i zas kha nang du bstan// 'byung bzhi dkrug cing skyin thang dbab// las kyi mtha' ma mkhas pas brtags// gsal gsum yin pa gsum gyi gdeng// lhun gyis grub pa'i las
su bshad// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i 'phrin las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gdug
pa'i dben gnas su// mchog gsum tshang ba'i mtshams gcad la// maN+Dal mthing nag gru gsum la// phung sa gsum dang dug khrag sbru// lho ru rtse bstan rtsang mar bskor// sha chen snying snas gtor

ma brgyan// mon pa'i thod dang dpa' bo'i rta/ khyi spyang bya spre'i lug dang dar// rabs chad nag mo yug sa phag/ nal bu rgya tshil bong bu sbrul// 'bras bu gcad dang don snying la// dregs pa'i dam rdzas gzung la

dbye// lta ba chos nyid zab mo'i gdeng// dbang rdzogs pa yi rdo rje'i gdeng// ye shes lhun grub phyag rgya gsal// gcod pa spyi dang sgo yis gzer// gnod byed gzir ba de bzhin min// chos sku mnyam rdzogs
gzir mi dgos// lo thog rkam chags 'khrul ba yi// dug lnga'i nad kyis zin pa la// bde ba'i stobs med zhen chags can// log pa'i stobs gzhom drag po gzir// gshin rje la sogs dregs pa yis// rang
rang srog dag spyi srog dril// yi ge gnad kyis 'joms par byed/ khams gsum dbang byed dregs pa can// dregs pa'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs pa rang gshed rang gis byed// kun gyi srog snying e la
sdud// 'bru gsum snying rtsa mgrin par gnas// 'bru gnyis mgo dang yan la gnas// gnod byed 'bru drug shes rgyud dbab// de la sngags kyi stobs kyi gzir// rang gshed phyag cha rang la bskor// lha rten

bstan thub dgra la dbyung// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid sku gsung rdzogs par bsgom// stobs kyi drag sngags 'bum tsho bcu// snying sna dam rdzas gang 'grub dbye// spyi dril

las dang rang rang dbye// myur dang stobs dpag med pa 'byung// bsgrub bya rang gi shes rgyud la// rno dbal mtshon cha'i yi ge gnas// snying la nri gnas mgrin par hU~M// lte bar thugs dang gsang bar dza// klad

par trig gnan mgo stengs nan// rtsa bzhi mdud pa 'bru bzhi gcod// mtshon cha'i rgyal po rno dbal ldan// rtsa srog shes rgyud dran pa gcod// de bskul mtshon cha rgyud la ldang// stobs kyi sngags kyis 'phen par

byed/ e badzra sarba duSh+tan mi trig nan// e hur thums dza mA ra ya rbad/ de yi sbyor ba stobs zhan na// ming dang snying po 'bru re sbyar// 'bru bzhi mtshon cha'i stobs kyis gcad// las dang sbyor ba rtsa dang
srog/ thams cad 'dod dang mi 'jigs gcod// gang brtsams las la don med na// stobs dang bcas pa dril la rdeg/ rang lus bstan pa'i shes rgyud las// badzra sarba duSh+tan gnas// rang lugs gnas pa'i
go chas bsrung// zhes gsungs so// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// e ka he

dun ya ma snying khrag ra dza ya/ e badzra sarba duSh+tan/ trig nan/ hur thums dza/ e mA ra ya rbad srog la e baM tsa sha ru hi nri mA ra ya rbad/ srog la mA ra nri/ srog la tsit+ta gu la nri mA ra ya rbad/ srog la

e baM raM yaM khaM nri mA ra ya rbad/ srog la khyer chung khaM shag mA ra ya rbad/ nri hur thums dza/ stam pa ya nan/ a gu sha dza/ ag ne/ dza la raM/ srog la ki li ki la ya/ trig nan/ big nan/ snying gtir sbur nan/
hur thums dza/ myag thums ril rbad ya/ mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dregs pa chan la dbab pa'i 'phrin las 'di gsungs

so// ngo bo ma bcos bde ba chen po'i ngang// chos nyid ye nas lhun gyis grub// ye shes dkyil 'khor snang la rang bzhin med// sprul pa sna tshogs log rtog mkhas// tha snyad tshig rnams don gyis yang dag
ston// de ltar rtogs nas sangs rgyas nyid yin pas// de la gsad dang gnan pa med// bden don ma rtogs sdug bsngal phung por smin// lus ngag sems kyi 'du byed kyis// gzhan pas lhag pas stobs rnyed
pas// dregs pa'i lus ngag sems su snang// gdug pa'i sems kyis gnod cing rngam// de la sngags kyi sbyor ba sdeb// dregs pa'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs pa rang gshed rang gis byed// yi ge spyi yis
gzir byas la// dregs pa'i rnam shes yig 'bru gcig/ 'phrog byed yi ge 'bru gsum gyis// snying gi dkyil nas 'phrog cing 'dzin// gcod byed mtshon cha 'bru bzhi yis// rang srog rang gis gcod par

bye// dregs pa spyi yi las su bshad// dregs pa sgos kyis sbyor ba'i stobs// las dang nus par sbyar la gzud// gzir dang srog la rbad pa'i las// rang gnad gzhom pa 'di lta ste// zhi khro gshin rje phur pa
dang// ma mo bdud mo srin mo dang// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po btsan// dmu dang ru dra srin po dang// gnod sbyin skyes bu ging dag dang// phug bdag srid can gdug pa gsum// de nyid ma shes rang srog

gcod// dregs pa'i phyag cha rang la 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs so// e badzra sarba du Sh+tan/ sarba sha truM e shrI badzra kro d+ha/ oM ya ma ya/ ma ma ru lu ma dun ting ki la ya rta/

ti ra ti ka/ ru tra/ du/ de ba/ a/ dung ting me mun mun/ pa ra dza/ rag shar/ rag mor/ yag sha/ k+Sha/ yag mo/ k+Sha/ shu la dza/ badzra sad+hu/ ha ma shad tri/ ru tri ru sa nA ga phu/ de sngags kyi grong khyer de/ sngags pa

nang 'gras pa'i lha 'dre rgyud la gnod pa dang/ rtags dang sbyar zhing sngags kyi phyag cha rang la bskor// rtags rnams 'khrugs na stong srog gcig tu dril la gzir// bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ gsum
mam lnga ru drag po gtir// dang po rang bsgrub snying po drang// klad du gzir zhing dgug par bya// bos shing gzir la srog snying dbrog/ ming dang rnam shes 'bru bzhis gcod// tha ma gnan bsreg
dam bdar gces// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ dregs pa gzir ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad pa las kyis rang gshed mtshon cha rang bzlog gi 'khor lo 'di

gsungs so// phungs pa'i 'brub khung mthing nag tu// mtshon cha dmar po'i srin mo khros// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// 'khor lo rim pa gsum pa ste// drag po dbang la 'khor lo brgyad// dregs pa gang
bsgrub lto bar bca'// ming dang rnam shes bsgyur cing gsad// rang gshed rang la dbab cing bskor// de yang lus sems ma phyed na// dug lnga las kyi 'khor lo bskor// dug gsum shes pa ar la gtad/
tsit+ta gnad la dbab cing gsad// 'byung ba dkrug pas phung po 'jig/ rang sgrub dam can rang la bzlog/ tsit+ta dkrug pa'i sngags dang sdeb// gshed po las rgyal lto bar gsad// 'gu ru seng ge'i khog mig

gshig/ dam tshig dang ldan sngags pa spyi// rdo rje spun dang a ting pa// las kyi skabs sbyar 'khor lo dkrug/ 'di min las gzhan spug pas byang// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las// gsad pa las kyi srog tig

las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyin thang drag po chu 'khyags dbab pa 'di gsungs so// gnyan ra gdug pa'i gnas dag tu// rab chad thod pa spyang khu'i khrag/ gsum pa khrag gis

kha sa bsku/ khrag tu yul mi srun pa gzhug/ rta nag lug nag khyi dkar snying// ra dmar rgya bo sbrul gyi snying// dri bo rabs chad nag po'i snying// dam rdzas brten la sde brgyad rten// thod pa dum bur yugs sa

rme// dri dang rnol gyi khrag blugs la// drag sngags 'bum tsho bcu re bstim// ta tsho gsum po me thabs tshul// yul gyi rkang mdun dbus su gzhug/ dri dang bzlog sngags sngon du dbab// ma phebs sbyor ba stobs

zhan na// sde brgyad snying po gnas nas dbrog/ dmar nag dug khrag klong du bsdu// sngags rnams dkrugs la sde brgyad gzer// snying sna bsreg la 'og tu gzhug/ gshin rje gshed dang stobs chen bsgom// snying
po 'bru brgyad dbrog cing sdud// de yis cho dgod ri ltar gtibs// dril dang rtogs bsnol mar bsreg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu 'khyags dbab pa 'di gsungs so// e badzra sarba du Sh+tan/ ma ma ya ma

ra dza mu sa trig nan/ ku ma hri ta phraM phraM shar shar khaM hur thog phob/ tri sa mu tsa da la ya/ hril shar phroM phroM/ ya ma mu tsa dza tsa mun sa tri hur thums dza/ tig nan phraM phraM hril hril khaM shar hril hril b+h+yo su tri nan sa na khaM
shar hril phob/ de yis 'khyags pa ri ltar spung// ma phebs sbyor ba stobs chung na// zhing lpags rgyangs la gsum du bskor// dbus su thig bzhi le tshe brgyad// phyi rim rtsibs drug ya legs
mtshon// lte bar e dang badzra la// phyogs bzhir stobs la mtshams bzhi srog/ drug la srog dbrog gzer ba ste// tha mar mtshon cha 'bru bzhi gcod/ kha sbyar bcas la drug mes bdug/ des su las rnams
'grub par bshad// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags dbab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa rnams kyi rtags gzung ba 'di gsungs so// sngags pa rbod gtong
'dras pa 'am// dregs pa tshogs kyis rtags bstan pa// mon dang zhib chen mdze can rnams// gshin rje yi ni rtags su bshad/ khrag mtsho mon pa ma mo'i rtags// me 'bar phur pa na bur rtags// bya nag shin

chen bdud kyi rtags// 'bag seng rtsad po rgyal po'i rtags// nag mo bzhad 'phro bya nag 'thab// me 'bar 'tshegs pa bdud mo'i rtags// rje'u dang ban d+he dge bsnyen rtags// rta pa khyi spyang btsan gyi rtags/

khyi dmar khrag mtsho the brang rtags// g.yag dang bon po mu stegs rtags// rgol dang khro na rbod gtong yin// las byed gar thabs sha la rol// ded ded rtags na thub pa'i rtags// rmi lam sna tshogs spyi yi
rtags// dbang po mngon sum nang gi rtags// lus yang sems gsal gsang ba'i rtags// zhes pas rtags bzung 'khor lo bskor// gnam la shing lo gtibs pa'i sprin// bar snang sgra dang 'od dang me// sa
la khrag rem sdo ma lud// dug rlangs 'chol ba skyin thang rtags// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnan pa'i las 'di gsungs so// gzhan
gyi rbod gtong gnan pa dag/ zhi khro ya ma phur pa ni// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'og tu gnan// ma mo bdud mo srin mo rnams// bka' rten byin can 'og tu gnas// bdud dang mu stegs 'gong po rnams// ri

khang sgo srungs 'og tu gnan// rgyal po dge bsnyen dkor srungs rnams/ khyi tshangs la mkha'i 'og tu gnan// btsan dang srog bdag ri bo rnams// sha ru spyang thod gong gsum gnan// the brang chags 'gong gshin
rdog rnams// glang ru bcug la lam mdor gnan// sa bdag klu gnyan mdze 'dren rnams// bka' sten byin can 'og tu gnan// bon dang rigs 'dzin gyi 'tshang gnan// sri can chu can them 'og gnan// srin
po gdug pa'i thod pa la// ri rab rgya gram dang bcas la// thugs kyi snying po rab gnas la// gnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lor bshad// gri lcags phur gdug pa la// rdzas dgod bdug ste snying gdab// bco
brgyad rdzas kyi du bas bdug/ dregs pa gnad la dbab par bshad// bsreg pa me yi 'khor lo dag/ me thab bcas la me lha bskyed// ling ga gdug la dug chu blugs// drag sngags brab cing
bsreg par bya// las rnams rdzogs nas stong nyid la// dregs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyis kyi dngos grub bsdu bar bya// lha la stong pa'i rgya yis gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya

ba// sngags thub gzir la dbab bya ba// thod khrag dug chu stong bskor tshad// ldan pa gsum gyi zor du 'phang// nyungs kar thal chen rdo thun brab// gzugs dang thal ba dong du re// gnas pa gsang ba'i las su

rig/ ces gsungs so// mtshan nag po'i rgyud las/ las kyi mtha' sdud kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor la rgyud gtad pa// e ma rdo rje snying po che// nga yi bka' rgyud me lce

'di// rgyal ba kun gyi mdzad spyod de// kye ma rdo rje bsam dpag dka'// stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag brgyad// snying po don gyi don bsdus pa'o// brjod pa kun grol bka' dang ldan// bde ba gcig gis

bsgongs pa 'di// sangs rgyas spyod lam kun grol med// gab pa gsang ba'i lam chen 'di// rims can rdo rje snying pos bzung// nga yi bka' yi gsang rgyud 'di// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// nga yang dam

las ma yel srun// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyal po dang// stobs dpag med pa'i khro tshogs kun// dam can sgrub byed bsrung zhing gnas// rgyud kyi snying po rab tu zungs// rnam rtogs mtshan ma rang grol ba'i// rdo rje

rgyal po bde ba'i bka'// lcags thog spu gri rbad chen 'di// lha dang mkha' 'gro gsad pa yi// thun mong rigs dang thun mong kun// snying po sngags kyi gsang rgyud zung// dam tshig 'byung dang thugs brtse'o// de
skad gsungs pas/ 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// drag sngags mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad cing yi rang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// sde brgyad chan la 'bebs

shing rang gshed rang la 'bebs pa'i rgyud/ rdo rje thogs 'bebs sku'i rgyud ces bya ba lha yul du grags pa rdzogs so//// bal po ba su da ra dang bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes
kyis/ ba ra sa ru mkha' 'gro dang bka' bgros te bsgyur ba'o////
de nas dpal kun tu bzang po'i sprul pa 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang// srog gi gnas
lugs ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// srog gi gnas lugs lnga ru bshad// phyi nang 'byung ba lnga ru gnas// nang ltar lus
ngag yid gsum gnas// gsang ba snying du gnas pa'o// gsang chen a ba d+hu ti la// yang gsang gter ni sems su gnas// ma 'khrul sangs rgyas snying po dag/ sku dang ye shes dag tu gnas// ma rtogs sems

can 'khrul pa rnams// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i srog tu snang ngo// kha dog dbyibs dang yig 'bru snang// spyi dang sgo rung shes par bya// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ srog gi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u
ste dang po'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sems can kun la phan gdags phyir// 'jigs pa brgyad kyis 'jigs pa
la// mi 'jigs go cha bshad du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang/ b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsal pa// gro ga 'am ni ras dkar la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas ni// de dbus gang rung ming rus bris// rtsibs la
khro bo'i snying po dang// bsrung ba'i ming rus bcug nas kyang// bsrung bar byed pa'i sngags kyis srungs/ lha yi de ni bsrung bar bsgom// des ni 'jigs pa nad dang gdon// thams cad kun las skyob par

byed// 'dis ni 'jigs pa thams cad srun// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ pad+ma dbang chen bsrung byed na// oM pad+ma ta krid

badzra kro d+ha hA ya g+h+ri ba che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ phyag na rdo rjes bsrung byed na// oM badzra tsaN+Da che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro kha na che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM ni lam ba ra d+hA ra badzra pA ni che ge mo

la rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ oM badzra pA ni tsaN+Da che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM mahA kro d+ha che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ gser gyi bya khyung gis bsrung byed na// oM ga ru Da bdag la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ 'jam dpal gshin rjes

bsrung byed na// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ kA la ru pA che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM hri tri bi kri ta che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra ya man tA ka che ge mo la ra rak+Sha

rak+Sha swA hA/ oM ya ma ra dza sa to me ya// ya me to ru na yo ta ya// ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ rdo rje gzhon nus bsrung byed na// oM badzra kI li kI li ya/ che ge mo la rak+Sha

rak+Sha swA hA/ khro bo spyi yis bsrung byed na// oM badzra kro d+ha che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo de// la chas dril la mtshon gyis bsku// de nas bsrung ba'i bsrung 'khor
gdags// yang na bsrung ba'i skud pas gdags// yang na bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gdags par bya// ngan sngagasagatsug lag gi rgyud las/ mi 'jigs pa go cha'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal
gshin rje yi// ston pa kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkon mchog bstan pa bsrung ba dang// rnal 'byor sgos dgra gdul ba'i phyir// sgrol ba'i dbang mchog ji ltar bskur// yang dang rdzogs
kyis bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// gang zhig dgra bgegs sgrol 'dod pa// stobs ldan skyes bu dam pa des// lung dang ldan pa'i slob
dpon la// bka' yi gnang ba nod pa dang// gnang ba thob par gyur nas ni// dur khrod gnas sam dben pa ru// sngon du bsod nams tshogs byas nas// de nas bla ma mnyes par bya// rdzas dang lag cha
'tshogs par bshams// mchod rdzas rten rdzas las kyi rdzas// bka' yi gzhung bzhin bsham par bya// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// bka' yi cho ga gzhung bsrangs la// lha yi bsnyen bsgrub zhag bdun
nam// lnga 'am yang na gsum du bya// de nas slob bu dam pa des// lag tu me tog thogs nas kyang// phyag ni lan gsum btsal nas ni// slob dpon nyid la 'di skad zhu// slob dpon chen po dgongs su
gsol// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las dag gis mnga' bdag khyed// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur ba/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i stobs po che// dgra
bgegs ma lus bsgral ba yi// dbang mchog dam pa bdag la stsol// zhes gsol pa dang// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// snod ldan dam par gnas pa khyed// dgra bgegs ma lus
bsgral ba yi// dbang mchog dam pa khyod nyid dam// zhes gsungs pa dang/ slob bus kyang 'tshal lags zhes brjod do// me tog slob dpon la phul la// yon gyi mchog khas blang bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon
chen po des// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor bca'// dgra bgegs gzugs dang mi rus bca'// e yi nang du gzhugs par bya// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phyed dang// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang/ khrag thun
dug thun phur pa rnams// gsod pa'i phyag char bsgoms nas ni// sgrol ba'i sngags kyis gsad par bya// snod ldan slob bu dam pa de/ khro bo'i ting 'dzin bsgom du gzhug/ lag tu gsod pa'i rdzas gtad
nas// dgra bgegs ma lus dgrol ba yi// dbang mchog dam pa bskur bar bya// snod ldan dam la gnas pa khyod// srid gsum 'gran zla med pa yi// mthu stobs bdag por dbang bskur

bas// dgra bgegs ma lus thams cad kun// sgrol ba'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ ces brjod la/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya// mA ra ya mA ra ya

rbad/ de bzhin kun la shes par bya// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM pad man ta krid badzra kro d+ha ha ya g+h+ri ba dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri

rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM badzra tsaN+Da dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/

da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ oM ni lam ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA ni dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ ma ra ya ma ra ya rbad/ oM badzra pA ni tsaN+Da mahA tshin d+ha dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri

rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM ma hA kro d+ha dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM badzra ga ru Da dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums// da ra ya

da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM ka la rU pa dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/

mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM hri Sh+ti bi kri ta dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ oM sa mA ya many+dzu shrI mu ga ya man ta ka dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA

ra ya mA ra ya/ oM ya mA ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yi k+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM badzra kI li kI la

ya dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ oM badzra kro d+ha dgra bgegs dam sri nri tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ zhes thun rdzas dang phur pas ling kha la
brdeg/ gra bgegs thams cad bsgral bar bsam mo// de nas bsgral ba'i phung po de// mthu stobs mtshon cha dag gis gtubs nas ni/ khro bo'i lha tshogs 'khor bcas la// sha khrag rus pa'i mchod pa
'bul// gshin rje ma mo la sogs pa'i// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha srin la// bka' yi pham babs sbyin par bya// de ltar dbang bskur slob bu de// mthu stobs bdag por the tshom med// bden pa'i byin rlabs
brjod nas ni// de ring phan chad rdo rje che ge mo khyod kyis khams gsum sgrol ba'i mthu dbang thob nas dgra bgegs thams cad sgrol ba'i mthu stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces brjod par
bya'o// de nas slob dpon de la yon gyi mchog dbul bar bya'o// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i mthu'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin
rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang// las rnams 'grub par bya ba'i phyir// dug dbyung rgyan gdags bshad du gsol// ces gsol pa dang/ spyi dpal chen pos bka'

stsal pa// dug ni rnam pa lnga yin te// sngags kyi dug dang rdzas kyi dug/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dug dang ni// grogs kyi dug dang bgegs kyi dug/ mkhas pa'i dbyung bar shes par bya// las rnams grub par bya ba'i

phyir// rgyan rnams gdags par bya ba ni// rgyan ni rnam pa lnga yin te// sngags kyi rgyan dang rdzas kyi rgyan// ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang ni// grogs kyi rgyan dang bgegs kyi rgyan// mkhas pas gdags par shes
par bya// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ dug dbyung zhing rgyan gdags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bder gshegs b+ha ga wan// bsgrub
pa'i ngan sngags thams cad kyi// sngags kyi drod tshad bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// bsgrub pa'i ngan sngags thams cad kyi// sngags kyi drod tshad ngas bshad
kyis// nyon cig 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// bsgrub pa'i ngan sngags thams cad la// bsgrub pa drug tu shes par bya// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las bsgrub pa dag dang lnga// gcig tu

dril bas bsgrub pa dang// rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa'o// de dus zhag grangs bsgrub// mtshan ma rab 'bring tha ma gsum// snga ma dag dang 'dra bar gsungs// tshad du ma byin las mi 'grub// tshad las 'gal
ba'i nyes dmigs dag/ snga ma dag dang 'dra bar bshad// mkhas pas drod tshad zin par bya// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang bsgrub drod tshad bstan pa ni// bsnyen bsgrub dag dang 'phrin las

gnyis// bsnyen bsgrub drod tshad bstan pa ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o// grangs ni 'bum tsho lnga ru gsungs// dus ni lo phyed dag tu gsungs// mtshan ma dag la dam pa

gsum// rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa gsum// snga ma dag dang mthun par bshad// tshad du ma phyin skyon du bshad// tshad las sgal na yon tan mchog/ bsnyen pa'i sngags thun re re la// sbyor ba tshang bar bshams pa
ni// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i dngos grub blang// grangs ni brgya rtsa brgyad kyis thob// dus ni za ma dag gis 'grub// mtshan ma rab 'bring tha ma gsum// gnyis su med par gyur pa ni// bsnyen pa
rdzogs par gyur pa ni// stobs dang ldan par gyur pa yin// bsnyen bsgrub drod tshad yin par bshad// de nas las bsgrub byed de// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po dang// gsad gso dbab gcad la sogs
dang// mnan gzir cho 'phrul las kyi rim pa thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod par byed pa ni// las kyi sngags su shes par bya// grangs ni khri tsho bzhi yis 'grub// dus ni zhag grangs bcu gcig go/ mtshan ma

rab 'bring tha ma gsum// snga ma dag pas nye bar 'byung// tshad du ma phyin las mi 'grub// tshad las 'gal ba'i nyes dmigs ni// snga ma dag la mthun par bshad// mkhas pas drod tshad zin par bya// de nas

yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang chen bsgrub pa'i drod tshad ni// 'di ltar yang dag bshad par bya// sngags kyi rtsa ba gcig nyid la// bsnyen bsgrub gcig tu dril ba dag/ bsnyen bsgrub sngags kyi drod tshad ni// rnam
pa gsum du shes par bya// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma mthong// grangs ni 'bum tsho gsum du gsungs// dus ni zla ba gsum du gsungs// tshad ni rab 'bring tha ma gsum// snga ma dag pas myur bar

'byung// tshad du ma phyin skyon du 'gyur// tshad las 'gal na yon tan mchog/ bsnyen bsgrub gcig tu bsgrub nas ni// grangs ni brgya rtsa brgyad kyis 'grub// dus ni yud tsam dag gis gsungs// mtshan ma rab

'bring tha ma'o// stobs dang ldan par gyur pa ni// gsang chen bsnyen bsgrub rdzogs pa'o// sngags kyi drod tshad yin par bshad// de nas las la bskul byed de// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ gsad gso
dbab gcad la sogs dang// gnan gzir ltas ngan la sogs dang// las kyi rim pa thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod par byed pa ni// las kyi sngags su shes par bya// bsgrub pa chen po dag tu

gsungs// grangs ni khro tsho gsum du gsungs// dus ni zhag dgu dag tu gsungs// mtshan ma rab 'bring tha mar gsungs// snga ma dag las nye bar 'byung// tshad du ma phyin pas mi 'grub// tshad la 'gal ba'i

nyes dmigs dag/ snga ma dag dang mthun par bshad// mkhas pas drod tshad zin par bya// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// yang gsang gter du bsgrub pa'i drod tshad bstan pa ni// sngags kyi rtsa ba gcig nyid
la// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa ye nas rdzogs// drod ni rnam pa gsum du bstan// grangs ni 'bum tsho gcig tu gsungs// dus ni zla ba gcig tu gsungs// mtshan ma rab 'bring tha ma gsum// snga ma dag bas nye
bar 'byung// tshad du ma phyin skyon du bshad// tshad las 'gal na yon tan mchog/ thams cad rang la tshangs pa'i phyir// dngos grub kun nas spyir slong na// ngan sngags bdag po bdag mo

rnams// sngags pa gnyis dang gnyis su med// stobs dang ldan pa gyur pa ni// bsnyen bsgrub gcig tu bsgrubs pa yin// sngags kyi drod tshad dag tu bshad// de nas las la bskul ba ni// zhi rgyas dbang dang
mngon spyod dang// gsad gso dbab bcad la sogs dang// gnan gzir ltas ngan cho 'phrul sogs// las kyi rim pa thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod par byed pa ni// las kyi sngags su shes par bya// grangs

ni khro tsho gcig dang stong// dus ni zhag bdun dag tu bzlas// mtshan ma rab 'bring tha ma dag/ snga ma dag pas nye bar 'byung// tshad du ma phyin las mi 'grub// tshad las 'gal ba'i nyes dmigs dag/ snga ma
dag dang mthun par bshad// mkhas pas drod tshad zin par bshad// gal te byin rlabs ma byung ba 'am// las rnams grub par ma gyur na// sngon du bsod nams tshogs bsags bya// lha bsgrub spogs dang
'phrin las so// snga ma'i go rims ji bzhin du// mkhas pas las la sbyar bar bya// las kyi rim pa grub pa dang// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sngags bdag dam can nyes par bya// spogs thabs

sngags kyi drod tshad rnams// mkhas pas yang dag gzung bar bya// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsgrub pa'i ngan sngags gtsor len pa'i// bsnyen bsgrub las kyi rim pa rnams// sngon du rdzogs pa'i sngags pa

des// rgyun gyi yi dam byed pa'i tshe// sngags pas 'di ltar shes par bya// sngon du yi dam gang byed la// de yi sngags rnams bzhung bzhin bya// de nas las mkhan sngags bdag gi/ bsgrub bya gang yin srog snying

de// stong ngam lnga brgya brgya rtsa brgyad// ma brjed dran pa'i bzlas pa bya// 'phrin las gang byed las sngags dag/ stong ngam lnga brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas// bzlas shing gang byed las la bskul// de ltar rgyun du byas

gyur na// mthu dang byin brlabs dpag tu med// yi dam rgyun gyi bzlas brjod dang// sngags kyi drod tshad bshad pa'o// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ phyi dang/ nang dang/ gsang ba dang/ yang gter gyi
bsgrub pa dang/ las sngags dang spogs thabs dang/ rgyud kyi bzlas pa dang/ de rnams kyi drod tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ 'chi
bdag la sogs pa'i 'jig rten na dbang che ba'i dregs pa can thams cad la/ bcom ldan 'das ston pa kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gtad do// 'dus pa'i 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa dang 'jig rten
pa khyed rnams la/ rgyud kyi rgyal po ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud 'di gtad do// dkon mchog gi bstan pa gnyan po srungs shig/ ces bka' stsal nas/ chos nyid kyi dbyings brjod du med pa'i

ngang la ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// rtsa ba dang/ phyi ma dang/ phyi ma'i yang phyi ma dang/ de rnams kyi ma tshang ba skong
ba'i rim par gsungs pa ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya rgya rgya////
rgya gar skad du// u tri na bi man ta phro sha pu sha tan tra/ bod skad du/ drag po ngan sngags bskal pa'i dum bu'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag nges

par bshad par bya// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// sngags pa nang rgyas byed pa'i dus// lha srin mthu 'gran byed pa'i dus// sngags pa byin rlabs byed pa'i dus// ma phur gshin rjes gtubs tsam na// snga brgya

dus kyi snyigs mar slebs tsam na// grong bsnyen nang khung mthu 'gran dus// de tshe phyag cha bskor bar bya// bgegs rigs stongs phrag brgyad cu yang// ded dpon dregs chen brgyad cur 'dus// de re la yang
bdun bdun 'byung// dug dang gzir dang gsad dang gnan// sbyin sreg zor dang gser bar bstan// drag po ngan sngags gab ba mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang

dag bshad bya ba// dregs pa spyi yi man ngag la// dang por rang bsgrub man ngag gsang sngags ni// oM badzra dun b+h+yo/ ar+Ya tig sna dza dza/ sa ma ya stoM/ e badzra pa/ ro sha na ya hU~M phaT/ phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid

sgom// badzra sarba du Sh+tan/ e hU~M ra thums dza/ badzra sarba duSh+tan/ e trig nan/ badzra sarba duSh+tan/ e mA ra ya phaT/ badzra sarba duSh+tan/ e staM pa ya nan/ badzra sarba duSh+tan/ e ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ badzra sarba duSh+tan/ e

khas b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ badzra sarba duSh+tan e/ phroM phroM hril hril/ shar shar phob/ e yi 'og tu dgra bgegs gzhug/ dmigs pa pho mo'i yul gzhan gzhom// drag po ngan sngags gabab pa mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud

las/ dregs pa spyi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gshin rje gshed kyi phyag cha ni// lha mchog ya man ta kar bsgom// bsgrub pa'i sngags ni 'khor lo bzlas// ma ya ma ra dza sa to

me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+she ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ ma kha tsa e a mu kaM phaT/ ya ma ya hUr thums dza/ ya ma ya trig nan/ ya ma ya mA ra ya rbad/ ya mA ya stam pa ya nan/ ya ma ya ag ne
sha truM dz+wa la raM/ ya ma ya khas b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ ya ma ya phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ a yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ dmigs pa pho mo rang gnad 'joms// drag po ngan sngags bskal

pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ gshin rje gshed kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// lha chen mahA'i phyag cha ni// lha ni ma hA de ba sgom// drag po ngan sngags 'di yis bsgrub// de ba hU~M tri ma hA di
