hri g+hi ni hU~M phaT/ de ba e hur thums dza/ de ba trig nan/ de ba mAr ya rbad/ de ba a staM pa ya nan// de ba a ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ de ba a khe sa b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ de ba a phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/
a yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ dmigs pa pho mos rang gnad 'joms// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ ma hA de ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mu stegs

bka' bzlog phyag cha ni// lha ni kA la yak+Sha bsgom// bka' zlog rang sngags bsgrub pa'i rdzas// bim dzo ni nag po'i tsit+ta phra ma// yak+Sha ku ru rbad myogs rbad/ myags rbad/ bim dzo ni so hUr thums dza// bim dzo ni

spo tig sog nan/ bim dzo ni swo mA ra ya rbad/ bim dzo ni swa staM pa ya nan/ bim dzo ni swo ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ bim dzo ni swo khos b+h+yo/ dmyag rbad/ bim dzo ni swo phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ swo yi 'og tu gang
dmigs gzhug/ lha yi dgongs pa rang gnad 'joms// drag po las bdun 'dir bstan pas// mu stegs bka' bzlog rnam par 'khrugs// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ mu stegs kA la

yak+Sha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi ma mo'i phyag cha ni// lha ni las kyi ma mo bsgom// sngags ni bsgrub sngags mkha' 'gro'i snying// ma ma trag rag sha mu tra ma ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu

b+h+yo/ kha mu tra b+h+yo/ ma ma ru lu ma hUr thums dza// ma ma ru lu mig nan/ ma ma ru lu mA ra ya rbad/ ma ma ru lu ma ma staM pa ya nan/ ma ma ru lu ma ag ne sha truM dz+wa la ram/ ma ma ru lu ma khe sa b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ ma
ma ru lu ru lu ma/ phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ ma yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ dmigs pa pho mo rang gnad 'joms// ma mo las bdud rnal 'byor sogs// drag po ngan sngags bskal ba dum bu'i rgyud
las/ las kyi ma mo mkha' 'gro ma'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdud po legs ldan phyag cha ni// rang nyid bye ba gong rir bsgom// bsgrub sngags drag po 'di bzlas so// da sha

bag nag tshogs kyang tshogs ge sa ma ya phaT/ da sha du hUr thums dza/ da sha du tig nan/ da sha du mA mA ra ya phaT/ da sha du staM pa ya nan/ da sha du ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ da sha du khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ da sha
du phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ du yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ dmigs pa bzlas pas pho mo 'joms// bdud kyi las bdun 'phrul gyi ming// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud

las/ drag po bdun gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma bdud nag po'i phyag cha bsgom// lha ni pho las mo ru bsgyur// bsgrub sngags bdud mo'i srog sngags ni// ya bdud hA ya g+h+ri ba

du nag mo tsan tri phra ma de b+h+yo/ g+h+ri ba du hUr thums dza/ g+h+ri ba dug trig nan/ g+h+ri ba du mA ra ya phaT/ g+h+ri ba du staM pa ya nan/ g+h+ri ba du ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ g+h+ri ba du khos b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ g+h+ri ba du phroM phroM hril hril
shar shar phob/ du yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ bdud mo dmigs pas bdud mo 'joms// bdud mo las bdud mo yi gshed// rang dbang med pas drang las byed/ drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i

rgyud las/ ma bdud nag mo'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// srin po'i phyag cha rang bskor na// rang nyid las kyi srin por bsgom// srin po'i srog sngags bsgrub pa ni// rag sha phaT

du ne du ne/ ag ag ag mo san dza ya/ byi ma ra ha ha hi raM snying kha rag/ e to ma mo li byin tsa ya 'ur 'u/ rag sha ra hUr thums dza/ rag sha ra ma ra ya phaT/ rag sha ra staM pa ya nan/ rag sha ra ag ne sha truM
dz+wa la raM/ rag sha ra khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ rag sha ra phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ ra yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ srin po'i dmigs pas srin po 'joms// srin po'i las bdun srin po'i

gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ rag sha srin po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rag mo srin mo'i phyag cha bskor// lha

ni pho la srin mor bsgom// srin mo bsgrub sngags bzlas pas gtem// rag mo te keM dza dza ru lu ru lu ra tri krabs krabs rag mo ra hUr thums dza/ rag mo trig nan rag mo mA ra ya phaT/ rag mo ra staM pa ya nan/

mo ra ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ rag mo khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad// rag mo ra phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ ra yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug par bya// srin mo'i stobs kyis srin mo 'joms// srin mo'i las
bdun srin mo gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ srin mo'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// yak+Sha gnod sbyin phyag cha

ni// bsgom pa'i lha stobs ku be ra// bzlas pa'i bsgrub sngags drang ba ni// yak+Sha dzaM pa la dza len sa ma ya/ me ku be ra hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha k+Sha hUr thums dza/ ya k+Sha k+Sha trig nan/ yak+Sha yak+Sha mA ra ya phaT/ yak+Sha k+Sha staM pa ya

nan/ yak+Sha k+Sha ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ yak+Sha k+Sha khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ yak+Sha k+Sha phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ k+Sha yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug byas la// gnod sbyin stobs kyis gnod sbyin
'joms// gnod sbyin las bdun gnod sbyin gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed/ drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag

bshad bya ba// k+Sha k+Sha gdon mo'i phyag cha ni// sgom pa'i lha ni gnod sbyin mo// bzlas pa'i bsgrub sngags rgyun du drangs// yag mo gong mo snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ yag mo k+Sha hUr thums dza/ yak+Sha mo k+Sha trig nan/ yag mo

k+Sha mA ra ya phaT/ yag mo k+Sha staM pa ya nan/ yag mo k+Sha ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM// yak+Sha khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ yag mo k+Sha phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ k+Sha yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/

yag mo'i stobs kyis yag mo 'joms// yag mo'i las bdun yag mo'i gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin nag mo'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas

yang dag bshad bya ba// klu bdud phyag cha bskor ba ni// bsgom pa'i lha ni bya khyung ma// klu bdud mgo bo bya khyung bsgom// rgyun du las sngags 'di brjod do// nA ga le/ duM pa le/ shun shu thu/ ba yu kha bi ti ti stan

pa/ khram hu phu hU~M phaT/ na ga phu hUr thums dza na ga phu trig nan/ nA ga phu mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga phu staM pa ya nan/ nA ga phu trig nan/ nA ga phu mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga phu staM pa ya nan/ nA ga phu ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ nA ga

phu ges b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ nA ga phu phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ phu yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ nA ga stobs kyis nA ga 'joms// nA ga'i las bdun nA ga'i gshed// rang dbang med par rang las
byed// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ klu bdud kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// btsan gyi phyag cha bskor bya na// bsgom pa'i lha ni lha btsan ya shud

bsgom// drag po bsgrub sngags rgyun du bzlas// tsan tri hri tri raM kha rag tra du zi rbad/ ma ma trag sha za bzhi mtsho la badzra/ tsan tri tsa hU~M thums dza/ tsan trig tsa trig nan/ tsan tri tsa mA ra ya phaT/ tsan tri tsa staM pa ya

phaT/ tsan tri tsa ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ tsan tri tsa khes b+h+yo/ srogs myogs rbad/ tsan tri tsa phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ tsa yi 'og tu gang dmigs gzhug/ btsan gyi stobs kyis btsan rnams 'joms// btsan
gyi las bdun btsan gyi gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ drag po btsan gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dmu yi
phyag chas dmu la bskor// bsgom pa lha'i stobs dmu rje btsan po bsgom// dmu yi drag sngags rgyun du bzlas// mun nan mo/ tsu ngan pu tsi/ phu tsa shad shad ba ta rbad thum ri li li/ mun mun pa

hur thums dza/ mun mun pa trig nan/ mun mun pa mA ra ya rbad/ mun mun pa stam pa ya nan/ mun mun pa ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ mun mun pa khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ mun mun pa phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/
ba yi 'og tu dmu ming gzhug/ dmu stobs drag pos dmu rnams 'joms// dmu yi las bdun dmu yi gshed/ rang dbang med par rang las byed// dmu yi phyag chas dmu rang bskor/ drag po ngan sngags bskal

pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ drag po dmu'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rigs 'dzin ru dra'i phyag cha ni// ru dra'i gnyen po ban der bsgom// rigs 'dzin srog snying rgyun du bsnyen// ru

dra la kha rag ni a gu sha krag sha sa ma ya dza dza/ hU~M nri ru tra ni hur thums dza ru dra nri trig nan/ ru dra nri mA ra ya phaT/ ru dra nri staM pa ya nan/ ru dra nri ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ ru dra nri khas b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ ru dra nri
phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ nri yi 'og tu ru dra gzhag/ rigs 'dzin stobs drag rigs 'dzin 'joms// rigs 'dzin las bdud ru dra'i gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// rigs 'dzin phyag cha

ru dra rang la bskor// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ rigs 'dzin ru dra'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ra dza rgyal po'i phyag cha bskor// ra dza'i gnyen po rgyal

por bsgom// rgyal po'i srog snying 'dzab drang ba// oM trig tsa pa la ag shug me/ khaM ne rA dza tri pa la ra dza sa ma ya dza dza/ rA dza ra hur thums/ rA dza trig nan/ rA dza rA mA ra ya rbad/ rA dza ra staM pa ya nan/ rA dza ra

ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ rA dza ra khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ rA dza ra phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ ra yi 'og tu rgyal po gzhug/ rgyal po'i stobs kyis rA dza 'joms// rgyal po'i las bdun rgyal po'i
gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// rgyal po'i phyag chas rA dza bskor// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ rgyal po'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya

ba// ging chen phyag cha bskor ba ni// the brang gnyen por ging chen bsgom// ging chen srog snying gnyis med 'dzab// sa bstan a tri sa du tri bu/ dgra la ging chen srog bdag yang la shar/ sa dan du hur thums dza/

sa dan du trig nan/ sa dan du mA ra ya phaT/ sa dan du staM pa ya nan/ sa dan du ag mi sha truM dz+wa la raM/ sa dan du khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ sa dan du phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ du yi 'og tu the brang
gzhug/ ging chen stobs drag shar de 'joms// shang ging las bdun the brang gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// ging chen phyag cha rang la bskor// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum

bu'i rgyud las/ dgra lha rdo rje legs pa'i le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam sri'i phyag cha bskor bar bya/ dam sri'i gnyen por ma mo bsgom// dam sri srog snying bsgrub 'dzab

drang// ro tri ro la ya ma pa yaM tri ya sri dza rbad/ ru tri sri hur thums dza/ ru tri sri hrig nan/ ru tri sri sa ma ra ya rbad/ ru tri sri staM pa ya nan/ ru tri sri ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ ru tri sri khas b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ ru tri sri

phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob// sri yi 'og tu dam sri gzhug/ dam sri stobs drag bal mo 'joms// dam sri'i las bdun phung 'dre'i gshed// rang dbang med par rang las byed// dam sri'i phyag cha rang la
bskor// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ dam sri 'dre mig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'gong po phyag cha bskor bar bya// 'gong po'i gnyen por srog bdag

bsgom// 'gong po srog snying bsgrub 'dzab drang// haM shaM haM shaM tri/ oM se rgyal ba sha ni tri tri thang lang du na kaM kaM yaM ra tri re// haM shaM tri tri hur thums dza/ haM shaM tri hrig nan/ haM shaM tri tri stam pa ya nan/ haM shaM tri tri ag

ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ hAM shaM haM tri tri khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ haM shaM tri tri phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ tri'i 'og tu 'gong po stobs drag sprul 'gong 'joms// 'gong po'i las bdun 'gong po'i gshed// rang
dbang med par rang las byed// 'gong po'i phyag cha yang rang la bskor// drag po'i ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ phung 'gong 'khrug byed 'joms pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang dag
bshad bya ba/ khyad par gab pa'i las bzlas ni// bsam gtan lo gnon ro langs gsum// bskal ba dum bu'i man ngag yin// bsam gtan dag lag dgongs pa drug/ gang bsgom gsal byas phyag phur

la// rgya mdud stod la stobs po che// rgya mdud 'og la dbang chen bsgyil// dpal la gang gnod 'dre bsgom la// de lta bu yi phur dril pas// gnyen po'i stobs kyis 'drer 'gyur na// dang po'i tri yi 'od 'phros
pas// mdun gyi mA ra gsal byas te// lha 'am bgegs dang bral bar gsal// dgug bstim lus sems bral bar bya// gnyis pas phur dril gnad dbab ste// rims dang nad du 'bebs par
bsam// gsum pa phur 'dril btsan dug gis// dug sna tshogs pas myos stsos sam// bzhi pa mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// char phab bsams la gsad par bya// lnga pa drag po mer bsregs pas// skad cig yud
la thal bar bsam// drug pa 'byung ba rlung gtor bas// dug mtsho khol mas khyer bsam la// srid pa chags 'jig 'byung ba dkrug/ lha med 'dre med phan gnod med// chos nyid rtogs med
mnyam pa'i ngang// bsam gtan de drug spyi ru gces// dgug gzer la sogs las thabs bdun// bdun bsrung spyi dang mthun par sbyar// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ drag po bsam
gtan gyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// log non phyag cha khyab par yin// lha srin gtem thabs khyad par gsum// badzra sarba duSh+tan/ e e/ hur hur thums thums dza dza/ e

e/ trig trig nan nan/ e e/ ma ma ra ra ya ya rbad rbad/ e e/ staM pa ya staM pa ya nan nan/ e e ag ag ne ne sha sha truM truM dz+wa dz+wa la la raM raM e e khes khes b+h+yo b+h+yo/ srog srog myogs myogs rbad rbad// e e

phroM phroM phroM phroM hril hril hril hril shar shar shar shar phob phob/ 'di bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// snying po 'bru gcig gtem pa ni// e hur thums dza/ a trig nan/ e mA ra ya rbad/ e taM pa ya nan/ e a ne sha

truM dz+wa la raM/ e khes b+h+yo/ srog myogs mA ra ya rbad/ e phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ 'di bzhin gzhan la'ang sbyar bar bya// sgom gtem 'bru gcig gtem byas na/ ya hUr thums dza ya trig nan/ ya mA ra ya

rbad/ ya staM pa ya nan/ ya ag ne sha truM dz+wa la raM/ ya khas b+h+yo/ srog myogs rbad/ ya phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob/ 'di bzhin 'og nas kun la sbyar// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ log non

gyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dang bshad bya ba// ro langs rme 'thab nang stobs phyag cha 'gran pa'i tshe/ kho'i bsgrub sngags log gis bzlog la gtam par bya// rang gis bsgrub sngags rnal mar

bya/ kho yi bsgrub sngags bzlog pa la// gzir dang srog phrog gsad par bya// phaT hU~M ya nang sha ro ni pa badzra/ e stoM/ ya ma sa dza dza sna rgya a/ b+h+yo bdun badzra oM/ dza thums hur e tan du sarba badzra/ nan trig e

stan du rbad swa badzra/ rbad ya ra ma e/ stan du rba sa badzra/ nan ya pa staM/ e stan du rba sa badzra truM sha ni ag e stan du rba dza/ rbad myogs srog b+h+yo khes/ e bstan du rba sa badzra phob shar shar hril hril phroM phroM/ e

stan du rba sa badzra/ e yi 'og tu dgra bgegs gzhug/ dmigs pa pho mo yul nas 'dzom// ya ma ra ni tsa yak+She ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ru tu me ya/ ya me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ dza thums hur ya ma ya

nan trig ya ma ya/ rbad ya ra ma ya ya ma/ nan ya pa staM pa ya ma ya/ raM la dza tru?M sha ni/ ag ya ma ya/ rbad myogs srogs b+h+yo/ ya khes ya ma ya/ phob shar shar hril hril phroM phroM/ ya ma ya/ a yi steng du gang dmigs
gzhug/ dmigs pa rang gnas pho mo 'joms/ de bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ ro langs rme 'thab nang stobs phyag cha 'gran pa'i le'u ste nyer

gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thun mong spyi yi phyag cha ni// dpal chen he rur gsal bsgom la// 'phrin las gzhung bsrang rang sngags bzlas// oM badzra kro d+ha ma ma shrI he ru ka/ badzra kro d+ha sha

ri staM/ oM ru lu ru lu/ hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ 'di mjug phyag cha'i las sbyar bas/ khro bo khrag 'thung gtso 'khor bcas pa'i phyag char 'gro// phyag na rdo rje gsal sgoms la// 'phrin las gzhung bsrangs drag sngags

bzlas// oM ni laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra phA ni hU~M phaT/ tad+ya tha b+h+yo b+h+yo ban/ 'di 'jug phyag cha'i las sbyar bas// mthu stobs bdag po'i phyag char 'gro// pad+ma dbang chen gsal bsgoms la// 'phrin las gzhung bsrang

bsgrub sngags bzlas// oM hri pad+ma ta krid badzra kro d+ha ha ya g+hi ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ 'di gzhug phyag cha'i las sbyar bas// pad+ma dbang chen phyag char 'gro// rdo rje gzhon nu gsal bsgoms las// 'phrin las

gzhung bsrangs bsgrub sngags bzlas// oM badzra kI li kI li ya sarba bi nan baM hU~M phaT/ 'di gzhug phyag cha'i las sbyar bas// phur pa'i 'phrin las phyag char 'gro// ya man ta kar gsal bsgoms las// 'phrin

las gzhung bsrangs rtsa sngags bzlas// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma ta b+hany+dza phaT/ mug ye 'di gzhug phyag cha'i las sbyar bas// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i phyag char 'gro// bya khyung 'khyil pa gsal

bsgoms la// 'phrin las gzhung bsrangs bsgrub sngags bzlas// oM ga ru Da badzra dun ting ka a ku sha dza dza/ 'di gzhug phyag cha'i las sbyar bas// bya khyung gser gyi phyag char 'gro// drag po ngan sngags bskal

pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ bka' 'khor drug gi thun mong spyi'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// che mchog pad+ma phyag rdor dang// phur pa gshin rje bya khyung gsal// bsad dang gso dang
dbab dang bcad// ltas ngan gzir dang nan dang bdun// gcig la'ang 'byung bar shes par bya// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ spyi'i las kyi tho byang bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga

pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// spyir ni rdo rje gtsug lag dang// drag sngags gtsug las gnyis las rdo rje gtsug gi ni/ chos nyid spyi gtan la 'bebs shing spyi rgya gcod do// drag sngags gtsug lag
gi ni/ gtso bor las rnam pa bdun dang/ swo brgya dang lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ sde dpon bcu dgu'i rdzas dang/ sngags dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtags dang/ 'khrul 'khor dang/ srog dang nges tshig gtan la

phab// de'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam grangs ni// rtsa rgyud phyi rgyud phyi ma'i rgyud// ma tshang kha ni skong ba'i rgyud// de rnams gsal byed ston pa'i rgyud// de la drag sngags bshad pa'i rgyud// de rnams kun las

bcud phyung ba// bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud 'di gsungs// drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ rgyud rnams kyi byung tshul dang/ rgyud rnam pa gnyis kyi las gnyer dang/ dregs pa las la mngag pa'i

gnad rnams dang/ rgyud kyi rnam grangs dang/ don bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// pad+ma thod 'phreng bdag gis ni// 'di nyid rdo rje gdan du bsgyur ba// sgor zhugs 'gro ba drangs pa dang// rnal 'byor
rnams la phan gdags phyir// sngags kyi gtsug lag drag sngags gtsug lag dang// bstan pa bsrung phyir phan gnod gnyis lags so// dam can rnams kyi thugs kyi dkyil du zhog/ gter chos drag sngags

mngon bstan 'di// las 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog/ rgya bdun thob la rang thems// rin chen gter la chong/ drag po ngan sngags bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud las/ slob dpon pad+ma thod 'phreng gis bsgrub pa
po la phan gdags phyir/ gdams pa bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud bsgyur pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// rdzogs so//

rgya gar skad du/ su na ma ma raM ka sa ba ba li rak+Sha tan+t+ra ma hA rA dza/ bod skad du/ srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga pur zhes bya ba/ gnod spyin gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan

'das gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol na/ ri rab chen po'i rtse mo lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas/ bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i 'og min

las mi dma' ba'i gnas/ rus pa dang/ rus gong dang/ thod pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i khang pa chen po brtsegs pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i khang bzang na/ mi la sogs pa'i ro gsar rny-ing gi gdan la/ bcom ldan

'das dbang gi rgyal po chen po rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/ sku stong gsum gyi ri rab tsam zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ sku dmar thag chad pa'i nyi ma bas

dmar ba/ dbu dbus ma la rta chen pos brgyan pa ni// ljang khu la rngog ma le brgan du 'tshe ba// dpral ba zhur ba las 'od dpung sna tshogs pa 'bar ba/ phyag na pad+ma dang/ dgra sta dang/ gtun shing dang/ zhags

pa dang/ thod khrag dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa/ g.yang gzhi dang stag lpags glang po che'i pags pa bsnams pa/ sbrul dang/ thod pa dang/ khrag dang/ zhag dang/ thal bas brgyan pa/ mche ba gtsigs shing gad
rgyangs sgrog pa ni/ ha ha he he hring hriM hU~M phaT ces zer zhing/ gnod sbyin rnams rang dbang med par dbang du bsdu bar mdzad par bzhugs so// de'i bran dang/ yang bran dang/ g.yog dang/ pho nya

dang/ yang g.yog dang/ pho nya dang/ bka' nyan dang/ phyag brnyan rnams kyis rtsa bkug pa'i gnod sbyin gyi tshogs mang po'i mang po ni 'di rnams te/ lha'i mchog tshangs pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi mchog gang pa

bzang po dang// rgyal po'i mchog li byin ha ra bzang po dang/ bdud kyi mchog ha nu bag sha dang/ btsan gyi mchog yam shud dmar po dang/ gza'i mchog ra hu la nag po dang// rgyud skar gyi phrab shi kha mthor

byed dang/ 'gong po'i mchog rdo rje legs pa dang// ma mo chen mo nag mo mdung 'dzin ma dang/ 'phra men chen mo lce spyang nag mo dang/ gnod sbyin chen po bya thul can dang/ bdud mo chen mo ro langs thal mdog

ma dang/ btsan gyi btsun mo gser gyi phra tra can dang/ gza'i yum chen mo legs ldan gshog pa can dang/ rgyu skar gyi btsun mo kha na hu lu kha dang/ dge bsnyen gyi yum gangs dkar 'byor ldan ma dang/ de dag

la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin dbang che ba dang/ mthu dang ldan pa rtsal drag pa mthu rtsal thogs pa med pa/ srid pa gsum gyi srog la dbang byed pa thams cad dang/ gzhan yang sems can la 'tshe bar nus pa/ srog

la dga' ba sha za ba khrag 'thung ba'i tshogs mang po dang bcas pa 'khor der tshogs so// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' bsgo ba/ khyed gnod sbyin rnams kyis dam tshig nos la/ bstan pa'i snying po bsrung bar

gyis shig/ de dag gis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ bdag cag ni nyid kyi dam tshig kyang mi len pa bstan pa bsrung bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyid ni byams pa dang ldan pa/ sems can la thugs brtse
ba/ gnod pa thams cad sel bar mdzad pa lags/ bdag cag ni khro ba dang// zhe sdang ba dang/ gsod pa dang/ gcod pa la dga' ba dang/ sha khrag la dga' ba sha dag 'byung ste/ 'di dang bral bar gyur na
bdag cag mi 'tsho zhing myur du 'gum par 'gyur ro// de bas na dam tshig len par mi nus so// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal pos thugs ka nas 'od dpung bskal pa'i me ltar

'bar ba bkye bas/ zhabs 'og tu bcug nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma ta krid badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hri dza/ dbang zhes rngam pa'i gdangs kyis bka' stsal pas thams can
bred hag sdangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin bgyi'o// dam tshig kyang len par nus so zhes zer nas/ thams cad kyis khas blangs so// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos rang rang gi dam tshig dang skal pa
phog nas// 'di skad ces gsungs so// hU~M/ nga ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// gnod sbyin rigs rnams ma lus pas// nga yis bsgo ba kun sgrubs shig/ tshangs pa

nag po mdung 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa kun spel te// nad dang rims ni mi 'byung zhing// dgos pa ma lus grub par gyis// gang pa bzang po lce spyang gis// yo byad 'bru dang bang mdzod dang// gser
dang shing thog rkang 'gros dang// dgos pa'i dus su spel bar gyis// li byin har dang bya thul can// brag g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// srog la dbang bar ngas
byas so// ha nu bag sha thal mdog ma// bu tsha rigs brgyud mi 'byung zhing// srid pa gtan nas rlag pa ru// las kyi skal bar ngas phog go/ yam shud dmar po phra ta can// bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra bo
rnams// ye 'gro sum brgya sna drongs la// dgra bo brlag par skal phog go/ ra hur la dang gshog pa can// phyogs mtshams ma lus kun rgyus la// sad ser ba yi sna drongs la// bstan pa bshig pa che la

phob// phra ba shing kha 'thor hu lu kha// gang la yang ni dbang gyis la// ya cha stab bsnol dbang gyis la// dgra bo ma lus phung du chug/ rdo rje legs par gangs dkar gnyis// 'dron dang tshong dang dgra bla
gyis// de yis dgos pa kun bsgrubs la// pha rol dpung rnams pham par gyis// gnod sbyin gtso bo chung mar bcas// blon po brag dang yang g.yog bcas// ma lus khyed rnams thams cad kyis// dgra
bgegs sgrol zhing bstan pa spel// zhes las kyi gnyer gtad do// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar dbang gi bgyi 'o dbang gi rgyal// las rnams ma
lus mtha' dag la// thogs pa med par bsgrub par bgyi// bdag cag don du su gnyer ba// de yi don rnams bsgrub par bgyi// bdag cag gis ni bstan pa spel// dgra yi tshogs la bgyi'o zhes khas blangs
nas dam mnos so// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga pur las// srog bdag rnams sngon btul zhing las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas lha'i mchog tshangs pas// rgyal po

li byin lha'i ha ra la/ bdag ni lha'i dge bsnyen chen po lags te/ dam pa'i chos bskyang pa dang// gang rnal 'byor pa rnams dbu 'phangs bstod pa'i phyir/ bdag rang gi nus pa ci bdog pas las rnams bgyid
na/ 'on kyang rgyal po khyod la bdag gis mthu sbyin par bgyi// dbang bskur bar gyi/ khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi srog gi bdag por mnga' gsol bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshangs pa
chen po zhes bgyi ba yang rgyal po khyod nyid lags te/ sngon bskal pa gnyis 'das pa'i sngon rol na bskal pa po'i 'od bgyi ba'i dus su yab rgyal po ga za de ba dang/ yum bde ba'i klong 'phreng ma

gnyis la yid kyis 'tsho ba'i 'chos pa'i bu cig skyes te/ shes bzhin dang gzugs byad du ldan pas/ bram ze bya ba mtha' dag la mkhas par bslabs te/ ri ma la ya'i rtse mor phyin nas der dpal phyag na rdo rje

la mthu 'gran pas ma thub ste/ phyag na rdo rje la gsol pa/ bdag ni mu stegasakyi ston pas legs par brlags shing stobs dang ldan na/ de ci'i phyir nyid kyis stobs kyi cha 'dzin tsam yang nye bar mi 'byung ba 'di
ci las gyur pa lags/ phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ nga ni byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing sa la gnas pa yin na/ khyod la 'gran pa'i stobs ga la yod// bdag byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas

sa thob par bgyid do// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dbu las rin po che dung gi cod pan mu tig dang gser gyis spras pa phud de// rgyal po'i mgo la bskor nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de// ming tshangs

pa dung gi thor tshugs can du btags te byin gyis brlabs so/ khyod ding phan chad sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin pas/ nga yi rin po che'i cod pan 'di ma phud kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung
bar bya ba'i phyir// srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi srog dang dbugs la dbang bar dbang bskur ro// byin gyis brlabs so// rgyal pos kyang gsol ba de bzhin du bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
la gnod par bgyid pa dang/ rnal 'byor pa'i dbu 'phangs smod pa/ dam tshig khyad du gsod pa rnams gsad par bgyi'o// brlag par bgyi'o// rab tu gzhom par bgyi'o// zhes khas blangs te bstan pa mthar

phyin par bya ste/ de rgyal po li byin ha ra nyid la so// de'i phyir tshangs pa tshangs pa zhes bgyi ba yang nyid lags pas/ bdag gis mthu dang rtsal gyis byin gyis rlobs/ sngags 'dis kyang rgyal po la dbang bskur

ro// oM badzra ti dz+wa la raM pra ma na rag sha shang ka la ya hU~M rA dza ma hA nri rbad thum thuM rbad shag sen sen dzA dzA hU~M hU~M/ zhes lha tshangs pas rgyal po li byin ha ra la mnga' gsol bas/ snga ma bas bcu 'gyur gyis mthu

rtsal cher brnyes so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi mchog gang pa bzang po dang nor bu bzang pos kyang/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra la khyod ni mthu dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/

longs spyod dang ldan pas dbul po rnams la nor ster bar mdzad/ rmang po rnams la rigs brgyud 'phel bar mdzad/ bdag cag gis kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngon bya rgod phung po'i
ri'i ngos la shing drung cig skyes pa las/ shing de'i bdag po gnod sbyin gos sngon can zhes pas dbang bgyis nas mchis pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las shing
de'i shun pa bshus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du phul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dbul po rnams kyi bsam pa mthar phyin par gyis la/ nga'i bstan pa 'di yang

rgyas shing dbu 'phang bstod par gyis shig/ khyod kyi ming yang gnod sbyin gang pa bzang po btags so// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes khas blangs so// de'i phyir gang pa bzang po zhes bgyi
ba yang rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra nyid lags te gzhan ma mchis so// de yang bdag gi mthu dang byin rlabs ci bdog pas rgyal po la mnga' gsol bar gyi/ bdag gi gsang ba'i sngags mthu byin rlabs dang

ldan pa 'di yang rgyal po chen po la 'bul bar bgyi'o// oM g+ha na g+ha na rak+Sha g+ha na pa tra ra tsa ma hA ya sa pa ti ma de shod pa ti ha ra hA ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes gnod sbyin gang pa bzang po sems can la thugs

brtse bas rgyal po li byin ha ra dang/ srid pa'i bdag po chen por mnga' gsol bas/ gang rgyal po bsgrub par byed pa la dgos pa rnam gnyis rtsol ba la thogs pa med pa'i stobs snga ma bas kyang brgya 'gyur

gyis che bar gyur to// de nas bdun kyi mchog ha nu bag shas/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni sems can gyi rigs brgyud la dbang bskur ba rlag
par byed pa lags te/ de lta bu'i mthu rtsal ci mchis pas rgyal po khyod nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi/ byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ mthu rtsal bskyed par bgyi/ dgra bgegs gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la

gnod par bgyi ba dang/ theg pa chen po sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la rku 'phrog dang brdeg brdung byed pa rnams kyi rgyud gcad par bgyi/ rigs gcad par bgyi/ de yang bdud ha nu bag sha pad+ma gar

gyi dbang phyug ces bgyi ba yang rgyal po khyod kyi lags te/ sngon srin po gang kang ka mgo dgu zhes bya ba sems can la gnod pa sna tshogs pa byed pa dang/ ma srin mo mnga' 'dzin ma zhes bya ba gnyis zas su dug

za/ skom du khrag 'thung ba gnyis 'tshogs pa las/ bu ming sring tshe'u ma gnyis skyes pa las sring mo ni bdud gza' kun rgyu mu brgya ma bya ba yin/ ming po ni bdud kha rag nag po bkrag med bya ba yin pa las/

sring mo ni gshin rje'i chung mar blang/ ming po ni gnam sa gnyis la dbang byed pa cig byung pa las/ kun la rab tu mnod pa cig yod pa las/ dpal phyag na rdo rje bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni mthu stobs dang ldan
pas phyi'i sgrol ging chen por dbang bskur ro// ming yang bdud ha nu bag sha zhes bya bar gdags so zhes dam tshig byin no// de yang gzhan ma yin pa lags te/ rgyal po khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus
na ming de skad btags so// da yang bdag gi nus pas bka' stsal pa bzhin du las rnams mthar phyin par sgrub bo// 'di dpal gyi bka' nyan yin te bdag kyang 'da' bar mi nus te/ rgyal pos kyang 'da'

bar ma mdzad cig/ bdag gis bsngags dam pa gsang ba'i mchog 'dra ba la dbang sgyur ba 'di yang rgyal po la 'bul lo// oM ser ra phra ba gsum ma ka rang wang sed sad ne sad ne mA ra yA mA ra ya nr-i tshal le

mA ra ya hU~M dza hU~M dza phaT phaT/ ces bdud kyi rgyal po ha nu bag sha bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po'i bkas/ rgyal po li byin ha ra la mnga' gsol ba dgra bo gang yin pa la brgya brgya 'am stong yang rung ba/
rigs brgyud bstan nas brlag par byed pa'i mnga' snga ma bas stong gi bsnyes so// de nas yang btsan gyi rgyal po yam shud dmar pos rang gi 'khor du ma dang bcas pas/ rgyal po li byin la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bdag ni thog ma nas srid pa'i sems can thams cad la ye 'grogagasum brgya drug cu thob shor mang po gtong ba lags te/ de lta bu'i nus pa rnams kyang rgyal po chen po la mnga' gsol bar bgyi/

byin gyis brlabs par bgyi/ nus pa'i mthu skyes par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yam shud dmar po zhes bya bar gyur pa lags na/ sngon bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu 'das pa na yab gser gyi rgyal po 'chang zhes
bgyi ba de'i btsun mo spu pa ste/ brgyan can zhes bgyi ba gnyis la sras mched gnyis mnga' ba las/ gcen grags ldan ni dam pa'i chos la dga'/ gcung grags skyes ni mu stegs kyi chos la dga' bar gyur pa
las/ de nas dus nam zhig na mched de gnyis cho lo btab ste/ gang rgyal ba'i chos la gang pham pa 'jug par byas pa las/ gcung brgyal bar gyur pa las gcen pos kyang gcung gi chos la ma dad bzhin du
'jus/ yang dus gcig na btab pas gcen po rgyal nas da nga'i chos lugs dkar po 'di la stos zhes gsungs pas/ gcung pos ma thub ste bros pa las/ gcen gyis bdas de bzung nas gcung gi zhal nas
gcen pos bdag gsad kyang yas kyi chos lugs la mi 'dzul/ de bas gcen nam sangs rgyas pa'i dus su bstan pa la gnod pa thams cad kyi srog dbugs bdag gis dbral bar bgyi/ chad pa gcad par
bgyi zhes khas blangs so// der gcen grags ldan gyis gcung po dbang bskur nas/ nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa la su gnod par byed pa'i srog gi gshed ma khyod kyis gyis
la bstan pa 'phel bar gyis shig/ ces gsungs nas zangs kyi ral ka dang/ byu ru'i 'khar ba lag tu bskur te/ ming yang yam shud dmar por btags te/ de yang gzhan ma lags te/ gcen
grags ldan ni bcom ldan 'das lags so// gcung grags skyes yam shud dmar po ni rgyal po nyid lags na/ de bas na yam shud dmar po zhes bgyi ba yang/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra nyid lags so// da
bdag gi ye 'grog dang/ thob shor mang pos rgyal po khyod la mnga' gsol/ bdag gis gdug pa'i sngags zhes bcas pa 'dis/ rgyal po li byin gyi brlabs par bgyi/ dbang bskur bar bgyi/ mthu bskyed par

bgyi/ oM de ba hri mang gan dza/ mu sa mu sa/ ma ra ya ma ra ya na ya/ che ge mo'i srog breng breng/ thum b+h+yo dza dza/ zhes rgyal po li byin ha ra la btsan du ma dang bcas pas byin skyed pas/ ye 'grog dang thob shor byed

pas mnga' brnyes te/ snga ma bas kyang khri 'gyur gyis mnga' brnyes par gyur to// de nas gza'i mchog ra hu la nag pos/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni'u kang

dang/ gshed gzhi dang/ sad ser ba dang/ rtsa dang/ mu ge dang/ 'khrug pa bye brag sna tshogs la dbang bgyid pa lags te/ de rnams kyis kyang rgyal po chen po la mnga' gsol bar bgyi/ dbang bskur bar bgyi/

byin gyis rlabs par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ra hu la chen po zhe bgyi ba yang rgyal po chen po nyid lags te/ sngon bskal pa 'di nyid kyi dang po la pha klu pi ta ra nag po zhes bgyi ba dang/ ma srin mo glog gi
sgom gnyis la bu gcig btsas pa las/ de rab tu mi srun cing rngam pa gcig yod pa las/ nam zhig na lcang lo can gyi pho brang du gdan tshoms bcas nas mdzad pa la des rgyal ka byas pa las/ pha ma gnyis

kyis kyang ma thub par gyur/ der phyag na rdo rjes gsang bas kyang ma thub ste/ ri rab rtse la bros pa las/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes thugs rje ye shes kyi 'od zer gcig 'phangs pas spyi bo nas zin te ma thog
go/ des bu de rab tu sdug bsngal nas phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so// bdag ni rab tu sdug bsngal bas/ 'di las thar bar mdzad du gsol/ 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal drag po 'di
las thar gyur na/ bdag ni dpal phyag na rdo rjes ci bsgo ba nyan no// zhes gsol pas/ mnan pa las thar par gyur nas skad cig gis phyag na rdo rje'i drung du phyin pa dang/ des 'di skad ces gsol

to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bdag gis ci bgyi ba rngo thog lags so// phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal ba dang/ da phyin chad khyod ni dge bsnyen chen po yin pas nga'i bka' nyon la sdang bar
sems pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa thams cad kyi lo thog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rkang 'gros rnams med par gyis shig rlag tu chu gcig/ phung po dang bda' bar gyis

shig/ de lta bu'i las nus pa cher yod pa'i phyir ming yang ra hu la nag por btags pa yin no zhes gsungs so// ra hu las kyang de ka bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so// de nyid skye ba 'dir gzhan ma lags

te/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra nyid lags so// de bas kyang bdag gi nus pa dang/ mthu rtsal dang/ byin rlabs ci bdog pas khyad par du rgyal po chen po khyod la mnga' gsol bar bgyi'o// thabs thob par
bgyi'o// byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// bdag gis dgra bgegs cham la 'bebs pas/ lo thog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rkang 'gros rnams brlag par byed pa'i sngags 'di yang dbul gyis/ rgyal po chen po li

byin ha ra bzhes su gsol/ oM d+ha na d+ha na pu tse pu tse me shi rang ka na ka le dum pa le hu ya hu ya ra khungs man du swA hA/ zhes gza' rA hu la nag pos rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra la mnga' gsol bas sad ser

dang/ lo nyes dang/ 'khrug pa la mnga' brnyes te/ rgyal po li byin ha ra sngar bas kyang 'bum 'gyur gyis mthu che bar gyur to// de nas rgyu skar gyi mchog phrab shing kha 'thor byed kyis/ rgyal po li byin ha ra la 'di

skad ces smras so// bdag ni bar snang la gnas shing rlung gi 'khor lo la zhon te/ log par lta ba rnams la ya cha dang/ btab bsnol dang/ bye brag sna tshogs pa la dbang bgyid/ mos par bgyid pa lags te/

bdag gis kyang las 'di dag gis rgyal po la dbang bskur bar bgyi/ gzengs bstod par bgyi/ nus mthu skyes par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phra yod pa las phrab shing kha 'thor byed ces bgyi ba yang rgyal po
khyod kyis lags te/ sngon bdag gis mkhas pa rnams dris pa'i gtam rnying pa las/ yul ba ra na se na rgyal po dga' ba'i dpal zhes bgyi ba de la 'khor 'bum phrag bdun bdog pa'i nang na blon po kha shing
has bgyi ba de la bu rig pa dang ldan pa yig yod pa las/ bu de 'chi ba'i nad drag pos btab ste 'chi bar smon lam btab pas bdag 'chi ba'i dus su sngon nas kyang smon lam btab/ da ltar yang 'debs

pas bdag shi nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i skar ma pra shing kha 'thor byed ces bya bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa rnams tshar gcod par shog cig par smon lam rtag tu btab pas/ de shi nas

skar ma phrab shi kha 'thor byed du skyes nas nam mkha' la rgyu zhing sems can thams cad la yang ya cha dang btab bsnol sna tshogs gtong ngo// de nas 'chi ba'i dus su smon lam btab pas/ bdag 'di nas 'chi
ba'i dus byas nas phyi ma la yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar shog cig/ ces smon lam btab bo// de bzhin du skye ba sum stong smon lam btab pas/ da lta yang rgyal po chen po nyid du gyur
pa lags so// de'i slad du mi dbang dang spyod pa gcig par gyur pas mthu dbul bar bgyi/ dngos grub brtan par bgyi/ dbang brtan par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa de dag thams cad dbang

du bya ba dang/ bsam pa mthar phyin par bya ba'i sngags 'di yang dbul gyis bzhes shig/ oM ba su shad shad/ tri nrir ma ra ya dza/ nri kha mu la thum bu thuM/ ma bu ma ra ya dza dza/ zhes rgyu skar phrab zhing kha 'thor byed

kyis/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra la sdang ba thams cad 'dul ba'i mnga' gsol bas/ sngar bas bye ba 'gyur gyis ya cha dang btab bsnol bya ba la thogs pa med pa'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra
ru gyur to// de nas yang 'gong po rdo rje legs pas/ rgyal po li byin ha ra la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'gron thams cad kyi dbang byed/ srog chags thams cad la 'tshe bar byed/

mngal thams cad 'phrog par byed pa lags te/ de nas 'di thams cad kyi nus pa dang grub pa rnams kyi rgyal po ni rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra nyid mnga' gsol par bgyi'o// byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// de

ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngon bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen po mdzad pa'i dus su lha chen po zhig la bka' stsal pa/ lha khyod ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis tshe 'di la 'chi ba'i dus byas na
rdo rje legs pa zhes bya ba'i sde dpon du gyur nas/ bstan pa thams cad 'phel bar byed par 'gyur te/ de nas kyang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bstan pa thams cad 'phel bar byed/ rgyas par byed par 'gyur
ro// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas srog thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur la/ bstan pa yang rgyas par byed do zhes lung bstan pas/ khyod nyid lags par mngon no// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ da bdag gis ma
'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas pa la gzhol bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams kyis don dang ched du bdag gis bran lha bur bsgo ba nyan no// pho nya lta bur mngag pa yang yud tsam gyis phyin par
bgyi'o// g.yog lta bur phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo// bdag gis nus pa rnams kyis kyang rgyal po chen po'i mnga' bstan par bgyi'o// bdag gis gsang ba'i mchog mngon tu las rnams grub par byed pa'i sngags

'di yang dbul gyis/ rgyal po chen po thugs dam bzhes su gsol/ oM badzra rag sha badzra brag k+Shi k+ShaM/ badzra sA d+hu dgra bo la b+h+yo/ thums ma ra ya dza dza/ zhes rdo rje legs pas rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra la dgos
pa thams cad grub pa'i mnga' gsol bas/ snga ma bas sa ya khrag khrig gis mnga' ni brnyes/ thabs ni thob/ gdug pa ni 'dul/ dgra bgegs ni gtan nas brlag pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur

to// de nas 'khor de na gnas pa'i bgegs dang rang rang gi rtsal dang ldan pa/ sha la rab tu dga' ba/ khrag 'thung ba/ rang srog la bab na rang gi srog gcod pa yang thogs pa med par nus pa/ mang po tshogs

pa 'di lta ste/ in tri sems pa dang/ 'gur la gsung ba dang gnam gyi ya bzangs skyes cig pa dang/ brgya byin nor gyi bdag po dang/ btsan tog yul tog re dang/ khris pa gse to re dang/ mang pa tshes to re

dang/ 'dus pa'i lan to re dang/ spyi rings len to re dang/ mang pa bskal to re la sogs pa 'byung po dang the brang stong phye dang dgu dang/ yul gnon dang grong khyer gyi gdon spu bu rnams kyi kyang mgrin gshibs
nas gsol ba/ bdag cag la sogs pa rnams kyang rang rang nus pa dang ldan pas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis po yas kyi bran bgyi'o// pho nya dang g.yog bgyi'o// slad bzhin du 'brang ngo// ci
bsgo ba nyan no// zhabs tog 'tshal lo// bdag cag gi gsang ba'i bsngags las thams cad 'grub pa byed pa'i sngags 'di bzhes su gsol lo// byin gyis brlab tu gsol lo// oM la rla/ de bas nA ga ra su

ra ya/ k+Sha ra rak+Sha na ga shad tre tri ma ra ba su ru ru/ su tra sha ma ma san ti/ hi he hu he haM ha swa swA hA/ zhes bgegs kyi rigs phal po che rnams kyis rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra'i g.yog dang bran du khas blangs pas/

rgyal po chen po rab tu mnga' brnyes nas ci bya ba'i las la thogs pa med pa'i rngam brjid dang ldan par gyur to// de nas rgyal po li byin ha ra la lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis mnga' phul te srog bdag chen por

bskos te/ thabs thob bo// mthu brnyes so// dper na chu bran thams cad 'dus nas mtha' rgya mtshor 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra mthu rtsal thams cad phul bas mnga' phob nas 'di
skad ces gsungs so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa thams cad tshar gcod nus par thogs pa med do// bdag gis thams cad skye ba bdun brgyar yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar khas

blangs so// bdag ni dpal phyag na rdo rjes ming gi dbang bskur ba ni tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can zhes bgyi'o// rgya gar gyis mtshan gsol pa/ ma ha pra ma rna zhes bgyi'o// rgya nag pos mtshan gsol ba/ rgya

rje le ru sha 'theng zhes bgyi'o// sum pas mtshan gsol ba/ sum ru 'brong mthen zhes bgyi'o// zhang zhung gi mtshan gsol ba/ shal ge chen po bgyi'o// bon pos mtshan gsol ba/ nyi spang sad ces bgyi'o// skye
bos mtshan gsol ba/ shangs kyi dkar po spyan gcig ba zhes bgyi'o// li yul du mtshan gsol ba/ li sangs kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi'o// hor gyis mtshan gsol ba/ ga gan gser slag can zhes
bgyi'o// mo brgyad kyis mtshan gsol ba/ bdud sa mun chen po zhes bgyi'o// gzhan yang ming gi rnam grangs mang gis kyang/ dang po yab yum gyis mtshan gsol ba ni/ srog bdag chen po li byin ha ra zhes
bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyi srog dbugs la dbang gyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig pa dang/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sku la sdo ba dang/ chos skor dben gnas kyi
srog phrog pa rnams dar cig tsam gyis srog dang bral bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang 'chi ba'i dus zhag bdun nas bdag gi srog la dbang bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga

phur las/ lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis srog bdag tu dbang bskur zhing sngags phul ba dang/ rang gi ming gi rnam grangs su bstan cing srog bdag tu khas blangs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dbang gi

rgyal po rtag mchog dpal gyi bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ khyod la dgos pa'i yan lag ma lus par nga'i spyan sngar smros shig/ de
la yang phan gnod rnam pa gnyis kyi don ma lus par shog cig/ rgyal po li byin ha ra yis gsol pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// bdag gis dgos pa'i don rnam pa gnyis ma lus par dpal pad+ma dbang gi rgyal

po'i spyan sngar brjod par bgyi'o// de las bsgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i sngags dbul lo// de la 'di ni rgyal po chen po li byin har gyi srog gi snying po lags so// i tri tsa pa la a shug me swA hA/

de la 'di ni rgyal po li byin ha ra gsang ba'i srog gi snying po lags so// oM bri sha ma ha ra tsa swA hA/ 'di ni rgyal po nang gi srog gi snying po'o// oM ma tri du ste bya ra ya swA hA/ 'di ni li byin ha ra las la bskul

ba'i spyi'i snying po yin no// oM ma hA ra ba thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ da ra pho srog la thibs mu ga ma ra na sa rad na/ dgra bo'i snying la shag shag tshal ba dum/ dgra bo'i bkag la sen dza ru thibs tshugs dgra bo'i khrag la

'jibs/ ba ba dun dza/ tsa ta snying la thun/ rag ta khrag la thun b+h+yo thun b+h+yo/ rmugs rmugs/ 'di ni rgyal po'i thun sngags so// oM ma ma rag thun b+h+yo/ mahA ra dza thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma hA bA+eM ha be hU ru tra b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'di ni rgyal

po drag tu bskul ba'i snying po'o// oM ma ha phra ma na/ rag sha rag sha rag ta ra dza mu tra ma hA shri te tso ka la bing dgra bo ma ra ya/ hab hab/ 'di ni bya thul can gyi srog gi snying po'o// oM yag sha ma ting pa ni ra ma ma

swA hA/ oM tad ya tha re'u me'u kha la rag ta baM tsa dgra bo'i snying la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ bya thul can gyi gsang ba'i srog sngags so// oM shri sna re ma ti su ru shi b+h+yo b+h+yo swA hA/ 'di ni bya thul can las la rbad pa'i

sngags so// oM khra na sad+ha swA hA/ ma ra d+ha ma ra d+ha/ dgra bo thum ril baM mA ra ya tshal tshal sang sang b+h+yo/ 'di ni bya thul can gyi thun dbab pa'i sngags so// oM rak+Sha thun dza shri ra thun/ ma sa baM thun/ d+ha ru la thun/

bi ma ru dgra la thun b+h+yo phaT phaT/ 'di bya thun can drag tu dbab pa'i sngags so// oM bi ma ru rtse kha tha ma ma mo nag po tsa la yaM/ srog chu ma snying la thibs/ kha 'dar kha 'dar/ so chum so chum mug mug chug

sdoms/ baM ri li li dgra bo ma ra ya phaT dza 'di ni 'khor na gnas pa'i srog bdag khu le lag dgu'i srog gi snying po'o// oM khu le ma hA be ra swA hA/ ag gi sngags la/ oM ya ka ru ta swA hA/ ug gi sngags la/ oM

mu sha ma la swA hA/ traM ze'i sngags la/ oM traM ze ba ta ta swA hA/ shang ze'i sngags la/ oM shang ze shaM ka ra swA hA/ da khod kyi sngags la/ oM da khod swA hA/ ni khod kyi sngags la/ oM ni khod pa ra hi he swA hA/ srog bdag

nyid sngags la/ oM sUr+Ya tsan tre kha mu le swA hA/ 'di rnams bsrung ba'i sngags la/ oM kha du she sha sha sha/ phram pra ma ru khra kha khra kha swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas nor bsgrub pa'i sngags la/ oM dzaM b+ha le dzab

sha ba la go/ me srum srum tru truM trum swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas rigs brgyud dbrog pa dang rabs bcad pa'i sngags la/ oM ma hA kA la ka sa ra me ha la bdud rnams rngam rngam swA hA/ rgyal pos ye 'grog

sum brgya drug cu dang thob shor btang ba'i sngags la/ oM aM ma ra yaM be ra srog tsa la kha sa kha sa me ru me ra swA hA/ rgyal pos ser ba dbab pa'i sngags la/ oM phra ra phe sha thor b+h+yo/ hu ra tsa na la b+h+yo/ nal tsan b+h+yo/

kha shar tra be shar shar nal btsan b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rgyal pos ya cha btab bsnol ba'i sngags la/ oM ma hA phra shing kha me ru kha la ya tsi ta ma sha dgra bo phral phrol/ shag shig b+h+yo/ rgyal pos byes yul gar 'gro yang bsam pa

bsgrub cing dgra bgegs mi 'byung la/ oM na se na se/ haM shing haM shing/ ga ra ga ra ma ra ma ra/ hu lu hu lu phaT b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rgyal pos gal te bdag gam gzhan la 'tshe bar gyur na/ de bzlog pa'i sngags la/ sum pa

ha ra dza ra ma hA ra dza ba ra ba sha zhil zhil shan ting swA hA/ ma hA rA dza shan ting swA hA/ bdag gi gsang ba'i sngags mthu dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa las/ brlab pa tsam gyis 'grub par thogs
pa med pa'i sngags ni de lags so// dpal rta mchog rgyal pos kyang byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga phur las/ dgos pa'i sngags ma lus
par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rgyal po li byin ha ra nyid kyis phyi'i bsgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// de la dang por rgyal po li byin ha ra nyid sgrub par 'dod pa'i sngags pas

dbang dang dam tshig nos la/ lta ba yang pa spyod pa mtha' dag la goms pa/ slob dpon gyi thugs zin pa/ rgyal po chen po la thugs rab tu dad pa bsgrub pa'i gnas ni/ gangs kha shar du bltas pa rtse mo bcu

gsum mam/ gsum du 'dug pa'am/ yang na rtse mo brag dkar po ral po ral rtsa yang spang du 'dug pa 'am/ rtsi shing sna tshogs pa skyes pa/ kha shar du bltas pa rgyab ri brgya mkhar brtsegs pa 'dra ba rgyud ma chad
pa'am/ yang na gur ram brag dkar po a rung phu kha shar du bstan par song la/ yul 'di'i sa bdag dang lha klu la gtor ma dang gser skyems btang/ bden pa bdar/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas phyogs 'di

sgrol ba'i ging chen po/ rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra zhes bya ba rnam 'byor gyi dgra lha/ rigs 'dzin gyi srog shing 'di bsgrub pas/ sa bdag dang lha klu yul phyogs 'di na gnas pa rnams gzhan dag tu 'pho bar

gyis la/ sa gzhi 'di yang dge zhing bkra shis par gyis shig ces brjod la stegs bu rtsigs/ yang na dra phying ngam/ ras sam/ dar raM/ gzhi ma gding de'i steng du nas dang/ 'bras dang/ gro la sogs pa'i 'bru

sna tshogs pa'i gcal blug/ de'i steng du ga phur dang/ 'dza' ti pa la dang/ rgya spos la sogs pa'i dri spos dgram/ dar dkar gyi yol ba bre/ bla ri dang 'phan gdugs ci 'byor pa yang bri/ rgyal po chen po li
byin har gyi bris sku 'am/ lugs sku cig kyang shar nas nub tu gzigs par gdags so// bshos bzang bre gang ba cig la bshos rab ri rab ltar byas la/ phyogs thams cad ni mar khus byugs/ de'i dbus
su smyug ma tshigs gsum pa cig la/ phong bya rgod kyi ldeb phong dang/ za 'og dang/ bags dkar blud kyis brgyan la gzugs la gdags/ gzhan yang sha dgod dang thud phrul la sogs pa spyan gzigs kyis

mtha' ma bskor/ spos dang me tog mar me dang/ rnga gling dang bcas pa sku de'i mtha' mar bzhag go/ tsan dan dkar dmar gyi chu kham phor du blug pa'i snod gnyis bdun du bzhag/ nyungs kar dang skye tshe ma

nyams pa'i snod kyang bzhag/ gzhan yang sgo nga sna tshogs dang/ khur ba'i rnam pa dang/ sgog pa dang/ sman dang/ spos rnam pa mang po yang bsogs la/ de nas dang por dpal rta mgrin nam/ pad+ma he ru kar sku

gsal bar bskyed la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad brjod la/ bdag gi byin gyis brlabs/ lus bsrung/ de nas rgyal po dbang du bsdu ba dang bcun pa'i las bya'o// de nas dang la rgyal po'i chos dang mthun par spyan
drang/ de nas phyag btsal/ de nas gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ de nas skyems drang/ de nas mchod pa rnams dbul/ de nas bstod pa bgyi/ de nas bzlas pa mang du bya'o// de nas dam tshig bsre

ba dag tu bgyi ste/ tshig bshad pa dang bcas par gyi'o// de nas rgyal po shal ge gsang ba'i rtags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bgyi'o// rdzas kyis mchod cing rtag tu bzlas so// ha li hu li bam bral ni

dza/ la li pra ma ni/ re tse thal ba ni/ ko ti ko la sha/ ti kam sham tri mu tri ra tri/ ham sham ham sham du dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza/ dam nyams dgra bo la rbad do// kye kye phyogs phyogs pha gi na// nyi ma shar

phyogs pha ki na// shar lha de ni dkar po ste// dkar po de ni spyan gcig pa// skyes bu'i pha dang yab smos pa// gnam gyi dkarapo spyan gcig lags// ma ni srid pa'i ban mo ste/ bu ni dkar po mig gcig pa/
bzhugs ni nyi ma'i dkyil na bzhugs/ sprul pa zla ba'i zer la bzhugs// 'greng ni mi la sbar thab byed// dud ni phyugs la gnya' gzang byed/ chibs su dkar po mdo long chibs/ chibs kyi sdo long la// shod

kyi sgo ba btags/ chibs kyi phyi long la/ rtsis bis khram bam bkal// skye 'gro kun gyi bdag po ste// srog bdag chen po dam la gshegs/ khyod kyi 'phrin las skal phog pas/ dam nyams dgra bo sgrol la brtson/

zhe sdang gdug pas dgra la gshegs// gti mug rmongs pas dgra bo rmongs su chug/ nga rgyal dregs pa dgra bo lha dang phrol// 'dod chags len pas bu chung mchan nas brkus// phrag dog rtsub pas dgra bo'i srog

rtsa chod// ban chung bdag la stong dang grogs la gshegs// dang por ma byung gang nas byung// ma yuM byams sprin lha khang du// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur nas// dkar po mig gcig ma rungs khyod/ dam tshig

nyams pa'i tsit+ta dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra ni// bdun brgyud tshun chad rtsad nas gcod// snying khrag thams cad dbang gyis shig/ skyes bu thugs kyi dgyes sde mo// shar gyi dkar mo spyan gcig

ma// chibs su dung sha skya mo chibs// sku la dung gi la'u gsol// mu tig mdzes pa'i lan phran can// dung gi lan phran tse re re// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i steng na bzhugs// ma thog myur du da tshur byon// g.yas nas

stag smad mchong zhing gshegs// g.yon nas sprul smad 'khyug cing gshegs// stag la zhon cing dred la 'khor// srod la byon cing tho rangs rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgrub sde mo// sngon tshe thugs dam bdag dang
gcig/ da lta bdag gi yi dam lha// tshur gshegs dam skongs 'phrin las mdzod// dam nyams dgra bo srog rtsa dmar po chod// dgra snying dmar po dum bu gtubs// shar nas nub tu kha bltas nas// nub kyi

dgra bo phung par mdzod// the rang dgu brgya'i phyag brnyan 'gyed// nyams pa'i dgra bo snying nas drongs// tra ma brgya yi phyag brnyan 'gyed// blos tri lgang thabs dgra la thong// gzer thabs sna tshogs

dgra la thong// chibs su nyi zer zla zer chibs// 'od kyi zhags pa rkyong zhi 'debs// btsan dug sde bzhi'i phyag brnyan 'gyed// dam nyams dgra po'i khrag rlon gsol// rgyas pa'i dgra bo snying rjen la// srog dang
dbugs la skyes bu rol// rgyal po sde bzhi phyag brnyan 'gyed// 'bog cing bsgral ba'i dus la bab// gsang mtshan rdo rje rlung ltar bskyod// de ni nyams pa'i dgra bo yi// srog dang dbugs la rol du
gsol// de ni bdun brgyud rtsad nas chod// skyes bu'i thugs dam dus la bab// ces 'phrin las bcol lo// de nas yang dar dkar gyis g.yab mo shar nas g.yab cing spos dud bltams la mchi ma phyung/
brang brdungs la thugs dam gnad la bor ro// bka' dang rgyas pa'i dgra bo 'di// dus btab dus las yo la re// mnas bor dam las bgyangs sa re// dus btab ma bor 'gyangs pa na// dang por khas
blangs dam mnos pa// 'gyangs so 'gal lo li byin har// dam las log pa'i nye 'phangs sad// smras pa rdzun no shel ge'i mchog/ de phyir dus btab ma yol bar// dgra bo'i srog rtsa dmar po chod// snying

chung tshems kyi bar du chod// lcags kyi so bdar dgra la dor// zangs kyi mid pas khyud mid 'khral// dgra bo bdun brgyud rtsad nas chod// dgra bo maM sa sha rus phrol// dgra bo'i lhu zug ya long khyer// dus la

bab po li byin har// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// ri rgyal ma la ya yi rtser// phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du// bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs te// dbu la dung gi cod pan can// rgyal po'i dbu la bskor nas

kyang// nga yi rin chen cod pan 'di// ma phud bar du bstan pa srungs// dam pa chos kyi dbu 'phangs smod pa dang// chos bskor dben gnas bskor la rlom// dge ba'i bshes gnyen sku la sngo// rnal 'byor nga la

brnyas pa byed// 'di ni dus btab dus las yol la re// 'di ni mnas bor mna' las 'gyangs sa re// dus la bab po myur du sgrol// rgyal po li byin har hri phung shag b+h+yo/ khraM b+h+yo taM b+h+yo/ ma b+h+yo ma ni b+h+yo/ phring b+h+yo/

sri mo b+h+yo/ ma ni b+h+yo/ mu na b+h+yo/ mu tri haM ma tring tring b+h+yo/ yang thugs dam bshi sa bstan pa// kye/ srid pa'i rgyal po yal gam can// srog bdag chen po skyes to re// phyag na rdo rje ban d+ha bsnams// pad+ma dbang gi

bka' bzhin du// dam tshig chen po bdag bskul phyir// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// las la ma g.yel dus la bab// ma ra na pra ma ra tsa tsit+ta pa li a ma sa ma ya/ sa ma ya a gu sha dza dza/ zhes brgya
rtsa brgyad kyis rang dbang med par 'ong ste/ phyag rgya bzhis gzugs la bcing ngo// de nas yang thugs dam gsang ba'i dbyings nas bskul lo// kye/ skyes bu'i ming dang mtshan gsol ba// g.yung
drung srid pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// bzhugs ni shar phyogs zho mkhar rtse na bzhugs// rgya gar chos kyi rgyal pos mtshan gsol pa// tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can// gtsug lag bon gyis mtshan gsol

ba// shar gyi stag srin khra bos bya'o// skye bo yongs kyis mtshan gsol ba// nyi 'phang sad kyi 'phrul mo che// shar gyi rgyal po spyan gcig pa// mi gcig po la ming mang po// de yi sring mo lcag mo ma// skar ma

legs kyi lcam cig ma/ bud med de ni dkar mo la// g.yu yi de ni smin ma can// shar gyi phar phyed tshur phyed na// skyes pa gzhon nu kun gyi mdangs 'phrog ma// na chung gzhon nu kun gyi tshe 'phrog ma// byis pa
gzhon nu kun gyi srog gcod ma// bcol lo khyed la las bcol lo// de yi ming po bral po ba// shar gyi dkar po spyan gcig pa// sku la na bza' ci gsol na// skyin dkar rgya las grub pa'i slag pa la// seng
ge dkar po'i gong lag can// mtha' ma stag gi sham bu btags// gong ma g.yu yi rdo rje can// skyed pa g.yu yi skabs tham bcings// glo la gri seg bsnol ba btsugs// phyag na shel gyi 'gying dkar

bsnams// nam gyi phar phyed tshur phyed na// shel gyi rnge chung brdung zhing bar snang khams nas gshegs// yas kyi mche bas brang gi lhe'u la slebs// mas kyi mche bas smin ma'i dkyus la zug/ bdud kyi rgyal po
chen po ste// 'khor du rgyal bran mang pos bskor// rgyal phran dbang du sgyur zhing gshegs// g.yas kyi bka' sdod gnam the dkar po lags// g.yon gyi bka' sdod gnam la byang chub lags// gnam the dkar

po man chad nas// the brang spun bdun yan chad du// nyid kyi sku las sprul pa'i sras// nyi spang sad kyi 'phrul po che// sku ni cir yang sprul pa'i sku// thugs ni cir yang dgongs pa ste// thams cad de ni mkhyen pa'i

dbang// mi rdzu de ni dgu ru rdzu// mi 'phrul de ni dgu ru 'phrul// dgogs kyi de ni khug ma la// mi rang de ni khug ma la// mi rang de ni skya bor rdzus// nang gi de ni dro ma la// bu chung de ni sreg par rdzus// nub kyi

de ni khug ma la// 'e 'u thong de ni rgya bor rdzus// sbrid dang de ni sha ra ra// mi rdzu de ni dgu ru rdzu// rgyal pos rdzus shing 'phrul spyod na// dam nyams de ni dgra las sprul// rgyal po rno zhing gcod spyod na// dam

nyams de ni dgra la mchod// rgyal po smyo zhing 'bog spyod na// dam nyams de ni dgra la smyos// rgyas pa'i dgra bo sho ra re// rgyal po chen po dgra la phob// rgyal nad chen po dgra la thong// smyo 'bog chen po dgra la
gtang du gsol// dam rdzas 'bar ba 'di long la// dam las ma 'da' sdig ma byed// dam bcas de ni sa ma ya// sha pa ri sha pa ri/ ging ka ra b+h+yo/ khraM b+h+yo/ che ge mo la b+h+yo/ zhes rbad par

bgyi'o// nyungs kar gyis dgra bo'i ling ga la brab cing drag bslas so// dkar po gang yang rung ba cig gis thugs dam zhag par bskang ngo// dgra bo'i ming byang gro ga la bris la dug sna gsum gyi chus bran/ de
nas rmi lam mam// ltas su nyi zla 'char ba 'am/ lder so 'am/ 'bag mthong na tha mar bshad do// btsan po 'am/ zhang blon nam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam// dmag dpon mthong na 'bring ngo// rgyal po nyid

mthong ngam/ nyams su byung na rab tu bshad do// de lta bu mthong nas de dang dam bsres la 'di skad bshad pa dang bskul bar bgyi'o// hU~M/ thar pa'i lam la rab gnas byang chub sems// bskal pa thog ma med

pa'i sngon rol nas// bstan pa bsrung bar nyid kyi zhal 'ches pa// rgyal po chen po mnga' bdag li byin har/ khyod kyi thugs dang 'gal ba nongs pa shor// nyes bar gyur pa ci bgyis pa// mkha' lding dkar po
'di la rten bcas nas// bskang ngo bshags so tshangs pa stsal du gsol// bdag gi yid la brnag pa'i dgra bo 'di/ khyod kyis bzhes nas bdag ni rgyal bar mdzod// bdag cag tshe ring lo brgya 'tsho ba
dang// longs spyod rgyas shing rgyud du 'phel bar mdzod// mi nag 'dus pa'i ya kar ma btang zhig/ dgra bo dam nyams 'di yis dpyad pa re// slob dpon lta dang mched kyis bskyod da re// bdag gis bcol
ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ces bskul zhing las bcol na/ las gang ci bsam pa thams cad thogs pa med par grub par nges so// de nas dus thams cad du yi dam byed na rgyun du de kho na ltar
bya'o// dgra la rtags phyin nas de nas bdag gi stan du mi bsgrub na ya stags dar dkar po'i steng du spungs nas gshegs su gsol ba bya ste/ kye/ gshegs so da ni gnam du gshegs// mi yul dag gi skyin
gting na// pho ngan kha yi dri mas phog/ mo ngan lag gi chams pas phog/ rgyal po dag dmangs su 'bab// thang dkar dag thang la 'dril// bdag gi bsam pa 'grub lags na// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs
stod lags pas// zho mkhar rtse la gshegs su gsol// zhes yas thags sa gtsang mar bskyal lo// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga phur las/ rgyal po phyir bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi
pa'o//// de nas yang rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra nyid kyis rang nyid kyis rang du bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// thog mar slob dpon yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dpa' sran tshugs pa/ lta ba
mchog tu yangs pa de gnas lngar byas pa yang rung/ rang gi khyim mam grong du byar mi 'ong bar gsungs so// de nas gnas gzhung dang mthun par byas te// de lta bu'i gnas su sa'i cho ga bya/
maN+Dal brtsig/ chag chag gdab/ 'phags pa dkon chog gsum la mchod pa 'bul/ de nas chag chag gdab/ hU~M/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i mthu bo che// dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i rtsal drag po// gsang ba thugs su
bdag sgrub phyir// rin chen shel gyi dkyil khor la// mu tig khu 'phang chag chag gdab// rgyas pa bstan pa 'phel 'jog cing// thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad cing// li byin 'phrul gyi rgyal po ni// bdag

gis nang du bsgrub bya'i phyir// gsang ba brtsegs pa'i maN+Dal la// bdud rtsi sman gyis chag chag gdab// oM rad na maN+Dal hU~M/ gnam thig gdab pa/ hU~M/ thabs kyi rgyal po li byin har// sa la gnas pa'i byang
chub mchog/ rnal 'byor bsam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig 'debs so// dkyil 'khor dbus dang phyaugs mtshams dgu// srog bdag dgu po bzhugs pa'i gnas// de la gsal
ba'i thig 'debs la// de la mdzes pa'i mtshan dgod do// zhes thig gdab bo// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni le tshe dgu par bya/ dbus tshon dkar por bris la/ shar ser po lho sngon po/ nub dmar po/ byang

ljang khu/ mtshams bzhi smug nag/ sgo gzhan dang mthun par bri/ le'u tshe re la gru gsum re bris la bzhag/ de nas tsan dan dkar po 'am/ shug pa'i phur bu dgu la srog bdag dgu pa'i snying po bris la dar
dkar po le'u re gdags so// de nas bzhugs su gsol ba/ hU~M/ dbus ni shel rig shel gyi khang pa nas/ khams gsum srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po li byin har// bstan pa bsrung phyir
gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi le tshe la// dgra bgegs gdul phyir bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+tha ldan/ hU~M/ shar phyogs gser gyi khang pa
nas// rgyal rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po khu le shod// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor shar gyi le'u tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir bzhugs su gsol// lho
phyogs g.yu ri g.yu yi khang pa nas// bram ze srog la dbang mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ag ne yang// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor lho yi le tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir
bzhugs su gsol// nub phyogs zangs ri rigs kyi khang pa nas// rje rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po yul ge yang// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs
nas kyang// dkyil 'khor nub kyi le tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir bzhugs su gsol// byang phyogs mthing ri mthing gi khang pa nas// dmangs rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen
po trang ze yang// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor byang gi le tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir bzhugs su gsol// hU~M/ shar lho gnod sbyin
grub pa'i gnas// rin chen rang gnas khang pa nas// bud med srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po shang ze yang// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas
kyang// dkyil 'khor shar lho'i le tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir bzhugs su gsol// hU~M/ lho nub gnod sbyin gnas pa'i gnas// rin chen mthing shing khang pa nas// byis pa'i srog la mnga' mdzad
pa// rgyal po chen po da khyod kyang// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor lho nub le tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir bzhugs su gsol// hU~M/
nub byang gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i gnas// rin chen byu ru'i khang pa nas// rgyal po chen po khyod nyid ni// bstan pa bsrung phyir bshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor nub

byang le tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir bzhugs su gsol// byang shar gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i gnas// rin chen mu men khang pa nas// byol song srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po nyi zla yang// bstan pa
bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor byang shar le tshe la// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+tha lhan/ zhes bzhugs su gsol

lo// de nas shug pa'i phur pa bzhi la dar ljang khu le'u re re gdags la sgo bzhir gdab bo// rgyal po'i 'khor na gnas pa'i bran g.yog rnams la so so'i las dang rang rang gi spyod pa yis/ rgyal po mchog
gi bka' las ma 'das par/ dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir/ sgo bzhir bzhugs su gsol/ zhes phur pa gdab bo// de nas dar gyi skud pa gsum bsgril gyis mtha' ma bskor/ bla rgyan dang 'og rgyan ci mang du
dgram/ mda' dar sna can ci mang du mtha' 'khor gzugs/ dung dang pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra mang du bsag go/ de nas dbus kyi rgyal po la bshos bzang bre gang ba la ri rab lhun po ltar byas pa cig la/
dbus su smyug ma tshigs dgu pa'am/ gsum pa cig bzhur la/ mtshams kyi 'khar thabs nya mig ris su bris la bzhag/ de'i rtse mo bya rgod kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ dar dkar gyi gdugs cig gdags/ dngul gyi
g.yer kha cig dang/ rnga ma dkar po phon cig dang/ bags bu dkar po'i slud bu tshigs bar ma la gdags/ tshigs tha ma la dgra bo'i mig rus tsan dan nam shug pa la bris pa dang/ skra shad dam
gos dum btags la bzhag/ smyug ma tshigs gsum pa brgyad mtshal dang rams kyis sgo sprad dar thabs su bris pa dang/ rtse mo phong gsum la brag tu byas la dar le'u re yang gdags/ bar ma la ra dkar mo'i

slud bu dang/ dung dang zangs la sogs pa'i rin po che re re gdags/ tha ma la dgra bo'i ming byang shug pa la pho bri/ glang ma la mo bris pa de gdags so// ri rab sor bzhi pa re la btsugs la bzhag/ yang lcang

ma 'am 'phang ma mtho re ba bzhi la 'tshal mas rams kyis g.yu rung ris su bris la/ phod re re dang/ ra lcags kyi shas dang/ dgra bo'i ming byang bris la gdags sgo bzhir bzhag go/ gzhan yang thud dang/ nya
dang/ bu ram dang/ 'bras chan dang/ sman sna tshogs kyis gtor ma'i nang du za 'og dang/ dar sna/ pag bu dkar shas dang/ rin po che slug pa'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir bzhag/ gcig dbus su bzhag/ nya

phyis sam/ dung phor ram/ dngul skyogs sam/ yang na kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du gser bdar ba'i skyems phud lnga phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bzhag/ yang na snod de'u zhig tu mtshe rtse mo ma nyams pa nyungs kar

gyi sgang shags/ chu phud/ gangs chu/ chu mig mgo shar du bltas pa'i chu gsum blug la/ rgyal po'i srog gi snying po dang drag sngags bdun rgyun du bzlas pa'i phyir bdag kha shar du bltas pa'i mdun du gzhag
go/ gzhan yang spos dang/ me tog dang/ mar me dang/ dri chab dang/ rnga gling dang/ de rnams phyogs bzhir dgram par bya'o// lug dkar po 'am/ bya dmar po 'am/ ra dkar po sna dmar cig la mtshe'u dang/

rba mtshal lam/ rams kyis byugs la sker dar dkar po'i khug mar mtshe nyungs dang/ klu sman sna tshogs pa dang/ dgra bo'i ming byang bcug la skyer gdags la/ nub tu dar dkar po la lce ser po byas la rgyal
po'i gzugs bris la shing rings la btags/ mdung rtse la snying cig btags la gzugs so// de nas dpal ldan rta mgrin du bdag nyid bskyed la sngags bzlas/ bstod pa mang du bgyi/ de nas rgyal po'i
sngags mang du bzlas pa'i phyir las la 'jug pa'i phyir khrus byas la dar dkar gyi ber gon/ le brgan gyi thod bcings la rnga brdung bar bya'o// de nas dang por snyan gsan dbab/ bdag cag dga' dang gus
pa'i sems kyis gnas dam pa 'dir spyan drang bar bgyi zhing gshegs su gsol ba ni// rgyal po chen po li byin ha ra/ khams gsum gyi srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srid pa gsum gyi mthu bo che thams cad kyis
dbang bskur ba/ lha'i yang lha chen po/ srog gi yang srog bdag chen po/ rgyal po'i rgyal po nyid dang/ 'khor srog bdag chen po brgyad de/ gzhan yang rgyal po'i bka' skyong bar mdzad pa rnams
dang/ thugs rje'i dbang gis bdag gi dgra bo 'di bsgral pa'i phyir gnas 'dir gshegs shig/ byin gyis rlobs shig/ bdag bsten gyi/ lhar bskyed rten no// yun gyi lhar mchod do// mgon dang skyabs su

gsol bas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// badzra sa ma dzaHdza hU~M baM ho/ de nas spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hU~M/ nam mkha' mthong ting shel gyi lding khang nas// rin chen mu tig khu 'phang sha ra ra// g.yu lo mu

med na bun thibs se thebs// nyi zla 'bar ba'i gza' skar ta la la// de ltar rab tu mdzes pa'i khang bzang nas// dung long khu 'phang brtsegs pa'i gdan stengs nas// dgra bo'i don tsam thugs rje cha tsam
'bar// rgyal po chen po li sangs li byin har// nyi 'od rgyal khams ma lus bskyang ba dang// rnal 'byor bdag gi bsam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// 'dir byon tshur gshegs bdag gi grogs la gshegs// phyogs

bzhi mtshams brgyad so so mnga' mdzad pa/ khu le shos dang ag dang ug ge dang// trang ze shang ze dang khod ni khod dang// nyi zla la sogs srog bdag chen po brgyad// rang rang 'bum phrag mang po'i tshogs dang

bcas// bdag gis dgra bgegs bsgral phyir gshegs su gsol// oM e h+ya hi ma hA ra dza ti sha sa ma ya stam/ badzra sa man dza/ badzra a g+hu sha dza/ badzra pa sha hU~M/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+Da ho/ zhes brjod pas/
rgyal po dpon g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mngon sum du byon par bsam mo// de nas phyag btsal ba/ na mo stong khams khyab par sems can don la brtson// nga dang bdag med srog dbugs spyod la

dga'// na bza' rin chen dung gi 'jol ber gsol/ khyod la dang ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// kun la khyab pas nga dang bdag tu lta// zhe sdang gdug pas srog la za bar byed// sems can kun kyang khyod la
rab tu mchod// mchod 'os dbugs 'phrog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor skyong bstan pa'i don la rab tu gnas// 'jig rten khams su gnod pa sna tshogs byed// skyur dang khrag gi dri tshor dpag tshad
'gro// 'khor na gnas pa'i mi min tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo na mo na ma swa hwA// de nas bzhugs su gsol ba/ kye/ 'dir bzhugs 'dir bzhugs gdan la bzhugs// dung gi ber chen rim dgu
la// dar gyi bod stan mthon ting can// de 'dra sdig can khri rkang la// rgyal po dgyes par bzhugs su gsol// dung la gser spras khrom gyis bstod// rab mdzes srog bdag bzhugs pa yang// bdag gi
bsam pa ma grub bar// gzhan du ma gshegs brtan par bzhugs/ khyod ni rgyal ba'i bran g.yog ste// shing rdo 'khar ba zha nye zangs// lcags kyi khri chen rkang gsum pa// ma yengs brtan par
bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+tha lhan/ de nas chab gsol/ gtsang mar sbyar ba'i chab gtsang 'di// ro mchog dngas ma brgya ldan pas// rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil

bar mdzod// swa b+hA shud+d+ho haM/ de nas gser skyems phyogs nas blangs nas 'di skad do// hU~M/ 'bru bcud dam pa'i skye 'phang 'di/ kha dang mngar skyur tsha ba'i ro// ljags kyi dbang po mnyes par mdzod// 'byung
ba'i bcud sdud sa le sbram// longs spyod mnga' thang rkyen du che// de yi gser skyems dam pa 'di// 'bul lo li byin har la 'bul// bzhes shig srog bdag chen pos bzhes// bskang ngo rgyal ba'i thugs dam
bskang// 'bul lo srog bdag brgyad la 'bul// bzhes shig mthu chen brgyad kyis bzhes// bskang ngo blon po brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang// 'bul lo 'khor na gnas pa rnams la 'bul// bzhes ni lha srin

yongs kyis bzhes// bskang ngo pho rgyud rnams kyi thugs dam bskang// bskang ngo mthu dang byin rlabs stsal du gsol// oM ma hA su tri su ma ra gan dzi be ba swA hA kha hI kha hI/ rgyal po dag gi bsam pa rnam par dag
pas sbyar// mos pa dag pas sbyar ba'i phud 'di bzhes la/ bdag la phan pa'i skyabs mdzod cig/ mthun pa'i grogs mdzod cig/ gnod pa'i bgegs sgrol cig/ sdang ba'i dgra sgrol cig/ skyid pa'i
longs spyod spel cig/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rigs brgyud 'phel bar mdzad du gsol lo// de nas gtor ma slangs la// spos dang/ me tog dang/ mar me dang/ rnga brdung ba la sogs pa dkrol la/ nam mkha'

sngon po ya ka'i phyong re phyong// rin chen gser gyi nyi zla ta la la// gza' dang rgyu skar mang po sig gi sig/ lho sprin na bun khu rna thibs se thibs/ kha dog sna lnga'i gzha' tshon khyug ge khyug/ dung gi khu 'phang se ra

sha ra ra// thams cad smin pa'i char pa si li li/ gtum pa 'brug gi sgra chen ldi ri ri// 'bar ba glog gi 'od chen khyug ge khyug/ rab tu mdzes pa'i me tog sna tshogs skyes// dri bsung spos me mang po rgyun mi

'chad// thams cad gsal byed me mar mun pa sel// ro mchog ldan pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs bkram// rnga dang rnga chen dung dang 'khar ba'i rnga// sil snyan pi wang rab tu sgra snyan dang// bla re 'phan gdugs
mdzes pa dang// nor dang phyug dang 'bras bu rnam grangs rnams// rab tu brtse zhing mos pas sbyar byas te// dga' dang gus dang bsam nas 'bul lags na// rgyal po rgyal bran mang po bcas pas bzhes su
gsol// srog bdag g.yog dang bcas pas bzhes su gsol// li byin har dang khu le lag dgu dang// de la sogs te sde dpon 'khor bcas kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dges pa mdzad du

gsol// mahA pU tsa khA hi khA hi/ de nas bstod pa dbul ba kye/ dri ma med pa shel ltar dag/ thugs rje chu yi rgyun bzhin 'bebs// bdag dang bdag 'dra gzung 'dzin spangs/ khyod ni sa la gnas pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' lags// thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa srungs// rgyas par mdzod cing lo thog spel// dregs pa chen po lha chen po/ khyod la de ring bdag bstod do// sku la dar dkar ral ka gsol// phyag na
dbyug pas gdug pa 'joms// chibs su dang kar gser mdongs chibs// skal ldan gang zhig sgrub byed pa// rin chen lta bur dgos 'dod skong// smod cing 'phya bar gar byed pa// de la nad rnams sna 'dren

cing// dar tsam gyis ni phung par mdzad// de 'dra rgyal po khyod la bdag bstod do// rin chen gshog pa rab tu gdengs pa yis// klu 'dul rgyal po khyod la bdag bstod do// rma bya rab tu mdzes pa'i thul bas
brgyan// bran bzhi mngal du phung po nying mtshams sbyor// dar dkar rab tu mdzes pas gu zu la// g.yu bran mdzes pa'i sham thabs mang pos spras// dar sna bya thul can la bdag bstod do// 'khor na gnas
pa'i srog chags chen po brgyad// shel dang dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i sku// srog gi shan pa mdzod la dgra bgegs sgrol// dkar po chen po brgyad la bdag bstod do// stong phrag brgyad bcu'i bgegs rnams
mang po yang// rang rang nus pas rgyal po'i bran du mdzod// sprin ltar gtibs nas stong grogs mdzod// ma lus 'khor du gtogs la bdag bstod do// de nas smon lam gdab pa ni// rgyal po chen po srog gi

shan pa 'gro ba yongs kyi bdun// sems can yongs kyi gcan gzan srid pa thams cad kyi pho bo byed skos bdag/ sha la zas su za zhing khrag la skom du 'thung ba rgyal po chen po li byi har// chen po 'khor srog
bdag chen po brgyad dang/ gzhan phal po che'i rigs ma lus pa 'khor du 'dus pa rnams dang/ ma lus lus pa med pa thams cad gsan cing dgongs su gsol/ rgyal po nyid sngon nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa lags pas// da yang sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa'i mchog 'di la gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs bdag dang 'gras shing dus btab pa
'di dus 'di las ma yol bar lus gtubs shig/ srog chod cig/ tshig sgrogs shig/ khrag rngubs shig/ nang grol drongs shig/ klad pa gshogs shig/ snying phyung zhig/ rdul phra mo bzhin du lhogs la dus btab
'di las yang ma 'gyangs par bsgral ba'i 'phrin las mdzod cig/ tha ma yang rtsa ba dgu brgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad du gsol lo// mchod pa 'bul ba'i rdzas 'di dag kyang mos pa dang dad

pas ni bshams// rgyu dang rkyen dka' ba sna tshogs mi sbyar/ ting nge 'dzin dang bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i ni byin gyis brlabs de 'bul lags na/ rgyal ba'i rgyan mnga' thang chen por bzhes su gsol/ bdag

cag gis kyang rgyal po chen po khyod kyi thugs dang 'gal ba nongs pa shor ba khas blangs 'gyangs pa/ 'ben bcas pa phyis pa/ phud la nyams pa mchod bskul nor ba/ tshig gis 'khangs pa/ sems kyi dmar ba/

gtsang sbra chung ba/ le lo ches pa la sogs pa rab tu 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags so// tshangs so/ byang ngo// chag pa sos so// yon srong bar mdzad du gsol lo// rgyal po khyed rnams kyis thugs thag gsung
mi 'gyur sku mi bskyod par gzhan gyis bskul ba la ma gsan par/ bdag gis bsam pa mthar phyin par mdzad du gsol lo// de nas bar 'dir srog snying nas 'dzab bgrang zhing mdun gyi snod du nyungs kar
bsog go/ lug dkar po 'am/ bya dkar po 'am/ des thugs dam bskang zhing rta 'ben bca' 'o// de nas thugs dam bskul ba ni// spos gtang rnga rdung la 'di skad do// hU~M/ 'bod do de ni rje la 'bod// 'bod

do de ni snyan ma sra// rje la de ni mi 'bod du// tshe rabs gong nas bsgrub kyang bsgrub// bskal pa gong nas bsnyen kyang bsnyen// bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i don lags pas// 'thongs shing bred pa byung ba'i tshe// 'bod

do rje cig snyan ma sra// g.yab bo rje cig spyan ma rtul/ hU~M/ phyogs phyogs shar phyogs pha gi ni// mkhar ni rin chen dung gi mkhar// 'gram ni rin chen lcags kyi 'gram// sgo ni bse sgo dmar po la// byu ru 'bar

ba'i brtan pa rtsal// bad ni g.yu bad sngon po la// mthong khungs nyi zla gsal bas bgyi// zur ni mchong zur smug po la// baiDUr+Ya yi zil ba chags// sku mkhar phyogs kyi bla 'og na// mtho bar thang dkar bya mi

lding// dma' bar de la byi mi 'dzul// bar du gnyan po sbrul mi 'khril// logs la bzor po mi mi 'dzeg/ de 'dra'i mkhar la mtshan gsol ba// sogs mkhar shel lde ru rdzong lags// nang na khri cig khri zang
ba// rin chen dung khri dkar po lags// bse'i rkang bzhi phar re phar// dar dkar klod stan nengs se nengs// g.yas na lhang 'tsher lhang lhang pa// dang dkar gser mdongs bya ba lags// srab ni gser la

mthur ni g.yu// stan ni mchong la sga ni dngul// sha dag g.yas na mtshon drug btags// sdang ba'i dgra la mtshon thag rgyob// sha dag g.yon la nad rkyal btags// sdang ba'i dgra la nad rkyal rgyob// g.yon gyi
gzugs ni dir ba ni// nya mig seng 'bar bya ba lags// shel gyi khyi la g.yu ral can// mche ba dung gi mdur du bzhi/ sdang ba'i dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod// so ni lcags kyi sog le 'dra// sdang
ba'i dgra bo'i sha la zo// zangs kyi spar chen gdengs pa yis// skad cig tsam la phyogs bcur phyin// mjug ma dung gi zhags pa yis// brdabs pa'i lha srin sde brgyad 'dar// g.yas pas grong du spun bu
lhag/ skye na gser gyi a long la// dngul gyi dril bu 'bum rgyas brgyan// dkrol bas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes/ kha nas du gzugs gsung bsgrags te// dang po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'jig/ bar mas rgyal

chen rigs bzhi brlag/ tha mas sa bdag rngu zhing 'bod// spu yi nyag ma re re las// thog gi tsha tsha re re 'phros// dam nyams dgra yi bla la rbad// dbus kyi dung mkhar dkar po las// yab cig li byin ha ra
bzhugs// sku ni gangs ri bcag pa 'dra// g.yu yi smin ma khyug ge khyug/ bse yi sen mo shad de shad// dung gi so bzangs thams se thams// sku la dar dkar ral ka gsol// dbu la brjid ldan 'gying thod

bcings// rtsal chen seng ge mtha' bzhag can// dpa' rtsal stag gi thong kas brgyan// skyems ting spu ris chags bu la// gyi man 'phrul gyi chags sgrol mnan// gser gyi ka chen mdzes pa la// rin chen g.yu
yi tshar tshar can// sku yi skyed la bcings shing bzhugs// stag ral khra bo g.yas na bkra// gzig shubs mdzes pa g.yon na 'khyug/ dung gi spa lcags dkar po la// g.yu yi lcag 'phran mdzes pas

btags// klad la bskor zhing sa la brdeg/ thugs ni ma re lde me la// sku ni khro gtum drag rtsal can// bskul lo pho brang dbyings nas bskul// bcol lo sdang ba'i dgra bo bcol// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i spyan snga ru/
khas blangs dam bcas ma mnyel bar// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// da ni chas so dgra la chas// dang dkar gser mdongs lcags robs la// g.yas na mchog bkra gra gug la// g.yon nas lung
mar lto srog la/ khengs par khongs la phog par rgyob// dgra bo'i snying la gzer chen thob// nga yis ma nyes 'di yis nyes// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dis bshig gi/ dkon mchog dbu 'phangs 'dis smad

do// yang mtshan nas brjod ming nas gdon// phyag na rdo rje mtshan gsol ba// gsang ba'i ming gis mtshan gsol ba// tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can// sku la skyin dkar slag pa gsol// phyag na rdo rje be con
bsnams// bdag gi dgra la gzer nad thong// rgya gar chos kyis mtshan gsol ba// ma hA pra ma sna zhes bgyis// sku la ber gyi ga sha gsol// phyag na rdo rje rtse dgu rnams// sdang ba'i dgra la 'thims
nad thong// rgya nag dag gi mtshan gsol pa// rgyal po li du sha 'theng lags// za 'og ber chen slag pa gsol// bse yi mdung mo dbal rings bsnams// sdang ba'i dgra la rgya nad thong// sum

pa dag gis mtshan gsol ba// sum r+ya 'brong theng zhes su bya// pags bu dkar se'i slag pa gsol// phyag na dngul gyi stag me bsnams// sdang ba'i dgra la le brgan thong// zhang zhung dag gis mtshan gsol

pa// shal ge ched po zhes su bya// sku la me ni tri'i ral ka gsol// phyag na tsan dan beng chen bsnams// sdang ba'i dgra la gag pa thong// gtsug lag bon gyis mtshan gsol ba// nyi phangs sangs kyi skyes cig
po// sku la dngul dkar ral ka gsol// phyag na tsan dan dbyug pa bsnams// sdang ba'i dgra la lhog rgal thong// skye bo yongs kyis mtshan gsol pa// dkar po chen po spyan gcig pa// sku ni ma bcos dkyus
mar bzhugs// phyag na dbyug pa stobs chen bsnams// sdang ba'i dgra la ltas ngan phob// li yi yul du mtshan gsol ba// li sangs rgyal po chen zhes bya// sku la dar dkar thul ba gsol// phyag na gshog
pa'i sog le bsnams// sdang ba'i dgra la thog ser phob// hor gyi yul du mtshan gsol ba// ga gen gser slag can zhes bya// ma tang shal gyi thul ba gsol// phyag na sbrul nag zhags pa bsnams// sdang ba'i
dgra la zha grum thong// mon gyi yul du mtshan gsol ba// bdud kyi rgyal pos sa mun rje// nang par zla ba'i 'od la gshegs// dgongs mo nyi mo'i zer la gshegs// phyag na nyi zer zhags pa bsnams// bdag

dang 'gras pa'i dgra bo 'di// btab pa'i dus las ma 'gyangs par/ khyed kyis bsgrub pa'i dus la bab// nga yi sems dang 'gal ba byas// 'di la 'phrin las ma mdzad na/ khyed kyi rkyen dang mi 'tsham pa// dang
por dam bcas 'gal bar 'gyur// bcol lo bskur lo dus la bab// ces bcol zhing ba rnag pa drag po bya'o// phyi ltar bskur ba'i drag du bskur ba 'dir bya'o// da ni yum bskul te/ hU~M/ rgyal po thugs
