kyi dgyes sde mo// li byin har dang gnyis su med// dgyes pa skong zhing las rnams byed// gsang ba thugs kyi yum cig ma// sku lus shel la smin ma g.yu// so thags dung la nu 'bur mchong// ngag gi skad snyan
gsum re snyan// gser gyi rna cha wangs se wangs// mu men do shal rgyangs se rgyangs// zangs kyi sgra ga khyug ge khyug/ bse yi mon mor shad de shad// sku la na bza' ci gsol na// bya rgod 'bum gyi go
cog can// rma bya 'bum gyi mdongs kyis brgyan// gser gyi gser skas mtha' bskor nas// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i cha ga can// na bza' mdzes pa de gsol nas// gsol ba'i 'phrin las shugs kyis
mdzad// phyag g.yas shel gyi bum pa ru// bdud rtsi dam pa'i bcur blug nas// gtso bo mnyes byed rnal 'byor tshe 'phel ma// phyag g.yon shel gyi zangs gri bsnams// dgra bo bdun brgyud rtsad
nas gcod// zhal gyi rlangs pa nad du 'thul// mi nad sna tshogs char du 'bebs// nyid kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dgra bo nyams pa sho ra re// bdag gis dus btab 'gyangs sa re// zhes sngags brjod cing
drag tu rbad do// de nas 'khor gyi srog bdag brgyad bskul ba/ hU~M/ shar gyi phyogs nas thugs dam bskul// rgyal po chen po khu le shod// gser gyi mi bo ser po la// lag dgu rgyal khams yongs la

khyab// lag pa la las mchan gyi bu dang phrog/ lag pa la las 'og gi chung ma dang phrol// lag pa la las phugs kyi srid dang phrol// lag pa la las bang gi sring dang phrol// lag pa la las sgo yi nor dang

phrol// lag pa la las skyes pa brgya yi srog rtsa gcod// lag pa la las na chung brgya yi srog rtsa gcod// lag pa la las bdag dang 'gras pa'i dgra bo 'di// don snying spar gyis thob las shog/ sku la sha ba'i

slag pa gsol// phyag gcig shan pa'i gri chung bsnams// bdag gi dgra la sa ma ya// lho yi phyogs nas thugs dam bskul// rgyal po chen po ag ne ni// sku ni g.yu ltar sngon po la// za 'og sngo khra'i ber chen
gsol// sngon po mdog gcig 'gying thod bcings// phyag na brdeg pa'i mda' gzhu bsnams// sha la dga' la khrag la mos/ khyod kyi thugs dam srog la dgyes// bdag gi dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod// dus la
bab po sa ma ya// nub kyi phyogs nas thugs dam bskul// rgyal po chen po ug ge ni// sku ni zangs dkar dmar po la// za 'og dmar khra'i ber chen gsol// dmar po le brgan 'gying thod bcings// phyag na

'gug pa'i lcags kyu bsnams// sha dang khrag la dad re che/ khyed kyi thugs dam srog la dgyel// bdag gi dgra bo srog rtsa chod// dus la bab bo sa ma ya// byang gi phyogs nas thugs dam bskul// rgyal po chen

po trang ze ni// sku la mthing shun ljang khu la// za 'og ber chen sku la gsol// ljang khu ji 'dan 'gying thod bcings// phyag na 'debs pa'i zhags pa thogs// sha dang khrag la zas skom byed/ khyod kyi thugs dam

srog la dgyes// bdag gi dgra bo bsgral du gsol// dus la bab po sa ma ya// shar lho'i mtshams nas thugs dam bskul ba ni// rgyal po chen po shang ze ni// sku ni ra gan dkar ser la// gu ling ber chen sku

la gsol// thang dkar rgod kyi bya thul gsol// dpral na rgya long ta la la// ltag na dril chung kra la la// phyag na gtubs pa'i phal tshab bsnams// dgra sha za la dgra khrag 'thung/ khyed kyis bsgral ba'i dus
bab// lho nub mtshams nas thugs dam bskul// rgyal po chen po da khod kyang// bud med 'phrul gyi ma mo la// dpral ba'i dbyings na spyan gcig gzugs// sngon po chu ris ber chen gsol// sku

la stag gi rmog zhu gsol// phyag na gshog pa'i sta re bsnams// sha dang khrag gi dri tshor na// dar cig tsam gyis stong gsum 'gro/ khyod kyis bsgral ba'i dus la bab// nub byang mtshams nas thugs dam bskul

ba ni// rgyal po chen po ni khod kyang// byu ru'i mi bo dmar po la// 'bar ba'i rmog zhu dbu la mnabs// thang dkar rgod kyi ldem phu btsugs// phyag na 'tshag pa'i khrol ma bsnams// hab kyi skye 'gro'i sha la

za// hub kyis skye 'gro'i khrag la mthung/ khyed kyis bsgral ba'i dus la bab// bdag gi dgra bo khug la sgrol// dus la bab po sa ma ya// byang shar mtshams nas thugs dam bskul ba ni// rgyal po chen po nyi zla

yang// dngul gyi mi bo dkar po la// seng ge dkar po'i slag pa gsol// mtha' zhag dar gyi pho long 'phrul/ khri gcig smug po'i 'gying thod pa// la po che yi thod rlon can// phyag na mthor byed phyag cha
bsnams// dar tsam sha dang khrag med na// rang las rang yang 'tshig cing 'drum/ khyed kyis bsgral ba'i dus la bab// bdag gi dgra bo khug las sgrol// dus la bab po sa ma ya// zhes las kyi thun sngags

bzlas par bya'o// hU~M/ srog bdag brgyad gyi btsun mo ni// sku ni dkar sham mdzes pa la// rin chen dung gi lan tshar can// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i thul pa gsol// phyag na bdud rtsi bum pa ru// bdud rtsi dam
pa'i bcud blug nas// rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub gsol// g.yon na rgya zor khug bsnams shing// dgra bo bdun brgyud rtsad nas gcod// bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod// de nas yang 'khor rbad
pa// hU~M/ bka' 'khor skyong ba'i las mdzad ma// la la blon po 'gyings bas 'bring// la la skyes pa mtshon gyi 'debs// la la byil pa rkyal ka byed// la la longs spyod nor rnams 'phrog/ la la thob shor

gdong zla byed// la la bdud btsan sna 'dren byed// la la phyogs bzlog srog la rgol// de 'dra gdug pa'i skyes bu rnams// ya bzang skyes cig man chad nas// grong rgyun spun bu yan chad kyis// bka' dang dam

las ma 'da' bar// dam nyams dgra bo 'dir khug la// srog dang bral ba'i dus la bab// dgra bo'i ming byang la mtshe dang nyungs kar brdeg/ tha mar lug de bsgral/ de'i phud kun rgyal po li byin ha ra nyid kyi
gtor mar stsal lo// chang phud srog bdag brgyad kyi gtor mar stsal lo// tha ma sgo bzhi gtor mar stsal/ de nas yang mtshan dang ldan pa cig rtar gzugs/ de ltar dgra la rtags ma byung gi bar bgyi/
rtags phyin pa dang rta 'byung/ gtang rag gtang/ rdzas thams cad sdud las mtshon 'phyag pa dang/ yang rdzas thams cad gangs rtse 'am/ ri rtse 'am/ mi mi 'ongs pa'i sar sa gzhi chag chag btab

pa de'i steng du spungs la bzhag go/ 'di ltar bsgrub pa byas nas rtags ni zla ba gsum na 'ong nges so// zhes gsungs so// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga pur las/ rgyal po nang du bsgrub pa'i

le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang rgyal po li byin ha ra nyid kyis gsang ba bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi mchog tu gyur pa 'di gsungs so// de la thog mar sngags pa yon tan dang ldan pa des/ gnas ni dur khrod dam/
ma mo'i gnas sam/ shing rkang gcig gam/ grog po phugs rdugs sam/ rang nyams dga' ba'i gnas su sa'i cho ga gzhung dang mthun par bgyi/ dkyil 'khor brtsigs/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa

dbul/ rgyal po yang phyi ltar mchod/ de'i nub mo rgyal po nang ltar mchod cing bsgrub po yang na sum cha re bsgrub/ yang na gsang ba'i bsgrub pa ni bsgrub pa chen po thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa lags pas/

'di la rab tu brtson pa bya bar gsungs so// gsang bar bsgrub pa mi 'gal lam zhe na mi 'gal te/ sngon dpal chen pos btul nas sgrol ba'i gying du dbang bskur/ lag tu rdo rje byin/ lce la bdud rtsi bzhag
pa yin no// de bas na sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don du sgrol ba'i ging du dbang bskur nas gsang bar bsgrub pa mi 'gal bar gsungs so// de nas rag tas chag chag gdab/ hU~M/
dur khrod gsang ba mchog go dkyil 'khor dgu brtsegs su sgrol ba'i ging chen po li byin ha ra rnal 'byor bdag gi mos pas bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chags pa'i rak+tas dkyil 'khor chag chag 'debs/ ma hA rak+ta
maN+Dal b+h+rUM/ de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ hU~M/ gsang ba'i thugs dbyings gnyis med kyang// thams cad sgrol ba'i ging chen li byin har// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir gsang bar bdag bsgrub bo// mi
mnyam med pas dkyil 'khor thig 'debs so// gru gsum brtsegs pa e zhal 'bar ba dgu// drag po las rnams mthar phyir lhun gyis grub// sgrol ging dgu rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas bya'i phyir// gru gsum

brtsegs pa dgu ru thig gdab bo// sa ma ya maN+Dal hU~M/ dbus phyogs 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod 'phreng 'bar ba dang bcas pa sgo bzhi sgo khyud bzhi/ dur khrod kyi brgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan par bya/
dbus mthing nag gru gsum me 'od 'bar bar bri/ 'khor lo bzhi dang sgo bzhi yang/ gru gsum re re bri bar bya'o// de nas mchog gi phur bu dgu la srog gi bdag po dgu ming dang sngags khrag bris la dgram
mo// de la 'di skad do// hU~M/ sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// bcom ldan dpal chen spyan snga ru// bstan pa bsrung zhing khas blangs pa'i// sgo ba ging chen gshegs su gsol// gru gsum brtsegs

pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag gi dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// nyi zla rol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM ging ka ra ma hA ra ga dza li byin ha ra sa ma ya tiSh+tha lhan/

phyogs phur bzhi blangs la/ hU~M/ shar nas sgrol ging khu la shod// lho nas sgrol ging ag ne dang// nub nas sgrol ging u ge dang// byang nas sgrol ging tra ze rnams// so so'i 'khor dang bran g.yog bcas// pho nya
mngag gzhug phyag brnyan rnams// sgrol byed gnas nas gshegs su gsol/ khyed kyi mthu rtsal bsgrub pa'i phyir// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru gsum la// nyi zla rol pa'i gdan stengs su// dges shing gdan la

bzhugs su gsol// ya ha rA dza tsa ri sa ma ya tiSh+tha lhan/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas sgo bzhi phur pa blangs la/ hU~M sgrol las mdzad srog bdag bzhi// traM ze dang ni da khod dang// ni khod dang ni nyi zla dang// so so'i
'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i sgo bzhi ru// gru gsum brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi zla rol pa'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// sngags gong

dang mthun/ de nas dam rdzas bsag pa/ dbus su snying sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma'i nang du lug dkar po'i snying srog rtsa dang ma bral bar byas pa'i srog rtsa'i nang du dgra bo'i ming rus gro ga la bris la gzhug/ de

gtor mar rtse mo gyen du bstan la bzhag/ dar dkar po 'am tshil chen gyis kha bcad la bzhag/ yang shar du khrag sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ nub tu rus pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ byang du mkhal ma sna tshogs

pa'i gtor ma/ de nas yang shar du mchin pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ lhor sha sha rmen bu'i gtor ma/ nub tu mtsher pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma// byang du tshil dang rkang sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ de'i nang du
bshos bu khyid re ba re gzugs/ de la smyug rgod la phong dang/ pags pa dkar po dang/ ming byang btags pa re gzugs/ phyogs ma nor bar sa'i 'jim pa'i steng du bzhag/ gzhan nang du bsgrub pa dang 'dra/
shar du lug dkar po/ lhor bya dkar po/ nub tu ra dkar po/ byang du khyi dkar po bag zan la gzugs bya'o// dngos por yod na rab/ gcig med du mi rung ngo// skye ru dgra bo'i ming rus bdags so/ kham pa

la dgra bo'i gzugs su yod pa byas la/ ming rus snying khar bris la lho nub tu 'brub khung du gzhung dang mthun par brtsigs la bzhugs/ sha khrag sna tshogs gtor chen gyis zhal gab dang rak+ta'i gsang nan dang
bcas pa cha gcig byang shar gyi mtshams su bzhag go/ gzhan ma'i rdzas ni gong ma'i bsgrub pa dang 'dra bar bsham mo// de nas bdag dpal chen po'i sku ru bsgoms la mchod pa byin gyis brlab/

dpal bsnyen cing bzlas pa mang du bya'o// de nas rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba// hU~M/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs sgrol ba'i ging// rgyal po chen po li byin
har// srog dang dbugs kyi mnga' bdag po// so bdar sdang ba'i dgra la brdar// srog rtsa dam pa chem chem thum/ btsun mo dpal ldan lha mo che// 'khor dang bcas pa bran dang g.yog/ 'khor dang slob dpon
sde dpon dang// ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// bdag gi dgra rnams bsgral ba'i phyir// mthun pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// grub pa mchog gi gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// thams cad
sgrol ba'i gnas mchog 'dir// thugs dam gnyan la dgongs te gshegs su gsol// oM e h+ya hi ging ka ra ma hA rA dza badzra sa ma ya dza/ de nas brtan par bzhugs su gsol// thams cad sgrol ba'i gnas
mchog dam pa 'dir// ro dang nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan mchog la// sgrol ging bdag po gtso gzungs 'khor dang bcas// sems can donaphyir brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bdag la sdang bar sems pa'i
dgra bo 'di// bdun brgyud rigs dang rtsa ba ma chod par// gnas kyi gnas su bag tsam ma gshegs par// bdag cag bsrung pa'i gnas 'dir brten par bzhugs su gsol/ sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya tiSh+tha lhan/

de nas zil gyis mnan pa// hU~M/ nga ni dbang phyug chen po 'di// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur ro// nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// sgrol ging dregs pa li byin har// ha cang
dregs pa ma che bar// bsgo ba'i las rnams mang du gyis// ma hA sa ma ya ha na hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag btsal ba/ mthun par bar snang mkha' la 'ja' tshon 'dra// yongs dag yongs su mkhyen pas rab tu
bkres// nam mkha'i dbyings nas 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa// sgrol ging dregs pa'i rgyal po li byin har la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyar dgun ston dpyid dus las dbang sgyur ba'i// rang gzugs ci yang ston pa'i

'phrul mo che// ral pa dmar po dbyar gyi sprin phung 'dra// dpal ldan yum chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// srog bdag rgyal mo 'khor gyi dang po ste// gzhan ma pha rol rnams kyi sha khrag za// srid pa gzugs

kyis thams cad skrag par byed// sgrol ging chen po brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho/ pra ti dza ho/ nA ma/ de nas dam bca' ste/ dang po kho na nyid kyi dam bcas ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang dam mchog
bca' bar bgyi// nyid kyi dang por dam bcas ma 'da' zhig/ bdag kyang dam las 'gal mi 'gyur// dpon g.yog lta bu lags so brjed ma ngas// spun zla lta bu lags so gdungs ma

chung// grogs po lta bu lags so gzhung ma ngan// rang dam rang gis 'da' bar ma byed cig/ ma hA sa ma ya sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas phud du bdud rtsi blug la/ dang po dpal chen po la mchod pa 'di skad do// gsang
ba'i ban d+ha'i bum pa ru// 'dza' gad bdud rtsi'i phud kyis gtam// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi btab// ye shes lnga ru byin gyis brlab// 'bul ni li byin har la 'bul// bzhes nas mthu dang dngos grub

gsol// sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ yab kyi sku la gnyis med dgyes par 'khril// yum cig dpal ldan re ma ti la 'bul// bzhes nas mthu dang dngos grub gsol// sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ yab yum thugs
las sprul pa'i sras// srog bdag chen po brgyad la 'bul// bzhes nas mthu dang dngos grub gsol// de nas ba lam sa blangs nas/ hU~M/ snod kyi dam pa gtor gzhong du// dam rdzas tshang bas ba ling
bshams// thugs dam bskang ba'i rdzas chen 'di// srog bdag yab yum 'khor bcas la// dad pas 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// ma hA ba ling+ta khA hi/ de nas mchod pa bya ste/ rnga dang dril bu la sogs pa dkrol
la/ hU~M/ nam mkha'i khams kyis gar khyab pa'i// stong gsum 'jig rten thams cad kyi// bla re rgyal mtshan phan gdugs dang// pi wang la sogs rol mo dang// ka shi la sogs na bza' rnams// 'bul lo li
byin har la 'bul// bskang ngo yab yum thugs dam bskang// gnyes par gyur cig srog bdag rnams// ma hA pU tsa khA' hi/ de nas bar der smon lam gdab/ sems can gsum gang yod pas bskang ngo// de
nas bar der sha khrag gis kyang mchod la bstod pa yang bya'o// bzlas brjod ci mang du bya'o// de nas thugs dam bskul ba/ bcol lo bskul lo thugs dam can// sgrol ba'i ging chen mthu bo che// ma g.yel
ging chen dus pa bab// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// ba ra ni de thod pa'i mkhar// zhing chen 'bar ba'i ka gdung la// zhing chung dral ma sgo mar
gtams// tshal chen kha bad mdzes pas bskor/ khrag dang zhag gi 'bab chu 'am// tsit+ta'i tshogs ni ri ltar spungs// maM sa'i tshogs ni mkhar ltar brtsegs// rus gong mang pos bkral du bkram// rgyu ma'i

tshon thag rgyangs se rgyangs// rtsib ma'i gur phub ldi ri ri// zhing lpags gdan gding nengs se nengs// de 'dra'i nang du gdan la bzhugs pa ni// brkyang bskum chen po rngam stabs can// sku stod glang chen pags
pa gsol// sku smad stag gi sham thabs can// zhing chen pags pa sked la dkris// phyag g.yas lcags gri rnon po bsnams// dgra bo'i srog rtsa dmar po chod// g.yon na lcags kyi rde'u chung
bsnams// srog bdag thams cad dam la sdud// dpral bar khrag gi thig les brgyan// skom du khrag la dga' ba'i rtags// nywa bzhi thal ba chen pos byugs// 'phrin las shugs kyis thogs pa med// sma ra
khrag dang zhag gis byugs// zas su sha la rab tu dga'// mig rtsa rig rig bltas pas kyang// sems can kun gyi don snying 'phrog/ rkan sgra tog tog brdabs pa yis// phyi ma'i dus su mi thog par// sangs
rgyas bstan pa bshig pa rnams// yud kyi dgra bo bdun brgyud brlag/ gzhan gyis ma bcol ma bskul bar// bskul kyang de la mngag bar mgyogs// bdag gi dgra bo las ngan la// srog la chan pas gdabs
su gsol// de yi bka' nyan gsum sdod pa// lcags kyi spre'u dgod ri tsam// zangs kyi spar mo gdengs pa yis// dgra bo'i srog rtsa dmar po chod// dung gi sma ra rab tu 'bar// lcags kyi tsha tsha rab tu

'phro// nyi zla'i mig la rtsel po'i kha// sems can thams cad khyur mig gtong// sna nas dpra yi sgra bton pas// ri lung med par ser bas 'gengs// glag dang seng ge pho nya gnyis// rna khung g.yas dang g.yon
nas 'byung// bdag gi sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// byang bu dmar la bskyon pa 'di// dus btab dus las ma 'gyangs par// srog dang bral ba'i dus la bab// ces sngags bzlas shing rbad do// de nas yum bskul
te// hU~M/ smug nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// byang shar mtshams kyi nag mo ni// lcags mtsho khol ma'i dkyil na bzhugs// g.yu mkhar rmang gzhi bse las bgyis// g.yu mkhar log bzhi ldems se
ldems// bse yi kha bad skar mas brgyan// shel sgong gtams pa'i mkhar gshed nas// rin chen gser gyi khr-i stengs nas// za 'og dar gyi gdan bting nas// da yi phyi rol phyogs bzhi nas// mi mgo rta mgo
bungs su brtsegs// mi khrag rta khrag mtsho ru bskyil// mi tshil rta tshil gsar pa bsreg gin gsol/ khyod la gsol bas mi bral kyang// sngon gyi 'phrin las dam bcas bzhin// mi bskyod gnas nas bskyod
'tshal gyis// 'dir spyon rnal 'byor dam la gshegs// sku ni mthing nag 'tsher ba la// g.yu dang lcags kyi ral pa can/ khrag dang zhag gi zar bus brgyan// sku la zangs nag mthing nag gsol// 'ja' tshon
'bar ba'i cha ga can// lcags kyi rkang sgrogs si li li// nad dang rims kyis kha rlangs can// phyag cha g.yas na kham bam bsnams// stong khams rgyug cing khram la thog/ g.yon pa thod rlon khrag
mthor ma// lcags kyi dre rta rkang gsum la// gser srab sbrul gyi gong rmed can// byu ru'i sha dag pu lu lu// nad sbam mtshon sbas 'phongs la bkal// snga long nad kyi rkyal pa ni// dgra bo kun la
nad gtong ma// phyi long sbrul gyi dra ba can// mtshon drug mang pos bka' bzhin 'grub// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig pa la// skyod cig dre zhon gnas nas bskyod// dbu skra gsig cing gshegs su gsol// gang la
dmigs pa de la yang// de yi 'khor gyi sprul pa brgyad// lcags kyi mon pa nag po brgyad// dur khrod brgyad kyi gter bsrung ba// bdud g.yag nag po brgyad la zhon// lag na ral gri be chen thogs// lcags

kyi hal tram rgyug cing 'phen// brda mi phrad pa'i mod la gsod// drongs shig khugs shig dgra bo'i tshogs// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ma// dur khrod 'bar ma'i gzhal yas nas// dpal gyi phyag brnyan re ma
ti// gtum mo mi sri phag rgod so// ral pa sprin dmar 'khrigs pa 'dra/ khyod kyi lag pa g.yas la gsod// zhags pa lcags kyu glog 'gyu ma// re thul nag po gos su gon// lag na khram bam rnge chung

bsnams// dur khrod tsha ba'i mnga' bdag mo// nyin zhing khyo bdun skyungs na nyal// mtshan zhing khyod bdun khyab par sbyor// srod la nag mo dribs so zhon// gung la phra mo stag slag can// tho rangs zhal

bzhad mthing skya ma// lag na khram bam rnge chung bsnams// phyag na shong byang dgra la 'thor// nyi ma zla ba bzhon pa mo// gling bzhi kun tu khyab par 'gro/ khyod yang shel dang rus pa'i ming// dam tshig nyams pa'i

snying yang 'byin// gnod sbyin dkar po'i sku la 'debs// tho rangs rgyu ba'i dkar mo ni// dung gi mdog la shel gyi sku// seng ge dkar mo'i thul chen gsol// nyi zla 'bar ba'i dbu brgyan can// phyag nas shel

gyi phur pa 'dril// nyi ma zla ba'i zer la chibs// srog bdag dkar mo'i btsun mo yang// dus ngan snyigs ma'i gnas 'di ru// bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra bo la// da lta nyid du rtags phyung zhig/ tshil tshil ma
sha ma sha khug khug tha sha rbad ces bskul lo// de nas 'khor bskul ba la// hU~M/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'phel mdzad cing// rnal 'byor bstan pa dar bar gtong// srog bdag thugs dam gnad la bskul/ khu le

shor kyis dgra rnams snying phyung zhal du gsol// dgra rnams mig med long dang thibs su chug/ u ges rak+ta dmar dang pho log thong// trang zes rgyu ga gzer nad dgra la thong// shang zes bal nad gag pas dgra

bo bdun brgyud chod// dang khod kyis ni bal nad rims nad sna tshogs dgra la thong// ni khod kyis ni le brgan mda' gri char pa dgra la phob// nyi zlas rab tu smyo 'bog cho 'phrul dgra la thong// sgrol ging
brgyad kyis bdag gi dgra rnams myur du gsol/ khyed dang bdag tu mnyam zhing dbyer med kyang/ khyed kyi shugs las grub pas la thogs pa med// bdag gi dgra bo las ngan 'di// nad rnams sna
tshogs myur du sod// rigs brgyud yan chad rlag par gyis// rigs rnams phal cher nad gtong khrag dang zhag la dga'/ khyed kyi thug chom dgra la rab tu dga'// bdag gi dgra rnams rab tu bdun brgyud

chod// ma hA sa ma ya rak+Sha ma hA rA dzA thun thun phrol phrol zhes bskul lo// de nas dgra bo lha dang bral ba dang/ de nas bsgrub pa thon kar phur pa rnams rim par dkyil 'khor nas dbyung zhing gdab pa/ hU~M/ khro

bdag chen po li byin har// drag po'i phur bar mnga' gsol pas// dgra snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab// btab pas myur du brlag gyur cig/ kI li kI la ya tsit+ta mu ga li byin ha ra lhan lhan// hU~M/ khro

bdag rgyal po khu le shod// gsod pa'i phur bar byin rlabs te// phrag khyim g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas khrag skam myur du sod// badzra mu tsi sha la rog rak+ta rngubs lhan lhan/ hU~M/ srog bdag rgyal po
ag+ne yang// 'bugs pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol nas// nu ma g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas mkhris pa masha' yas gsod// tsi li tsi li maM sa sha la thibs thibs/ hU~M/ srog bdag sgrol ging u ge
yang// rnon po'i dbal du byin brlabs nas// spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab pas kyang// klad gzer mgo nad 'dar bus sod// ma sha mu rgu d+ha/ tshal tshal pa ka sme ra hu hu/ hU~M/ srog bdag shan pa traM ze
yang// 'debs pa'i dbal du byin bskyed nas// mkhal khung gnyis su gdab par bya// btab pas chu 'gag skyed nad gsed// byi ma las ra ku ya ma thibs nag shad phaT phaT dza dza/ hU~M/ khro bdag srog gshed

shang ze yang// zur gsum rtse mor byin phab ste// mchin pa'i pho gdung rtsa la gdab// btab pas mchin nad khrag gi gsod// ma sa la kra ma hA ra tsa bu ber dgra bo mA ra ya phaT dzA/ hU~M/ khro bdag srog gshed da

khod kyang// thogs med brdeg par mnga' gsol nas// sha sha rmen bu'i dkyil du gdab// gtad pas sbos nad grum bus sod/ kha la ru rtse ka ma la shan bu shag bu phaT dza/ hU~M/ bdag dgra bla'i rgyal po ni khyod

ni// rtse gsum ngar can gzi byin bskyed// mtsher ba'i dbus su btab pas kyang// mtsher nad lkug dang smyo 'bog sod// me kha kha me ru rtse bag sha ru ta rag me mu ru mu ru/ hU~M/ gsal ba'i srog bdag nyi zla

yang// phur pa'i lha ru dbang bskur nas// rkang pa'i mthil du gdab par byed// zha grum sgur nad 'theng grum sod// b+ha lu ra ge ra rak+ta maM sa sha khrag rngubs rngubs dza/ zhes phur pa btab nas thun sngags kyis
brab/ thun brdeg brlag par bya'o// ling kha gtubs la gtor mar rtsal lo// ri gsum gyi rtse mor gtor ma bskyal/ bshags pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor bsdu la sa bsrung// de nas lug po'i snying

dar khung du bcug la rtag tu mchod bskul na bsam pa thams cad 'grub bo// rtags kyang zla ba re re na 'ong ngo// grub pa'i rtags ni sgra dang 'od 'byung/ sa g.yo/ sprin g.yo/ tshub nag chen po 'khri zhing

'ong// mi dkar po mthong ngam rmi/ spri'u 'am/ phag rgod dam/ bya dkar po mthong yang grub pa'i rtags so// 'di ni rab tu gsang ba'i bsgrub pa kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa rgyal po nyid kyi zhal dang 'dra ba yin
no// rab tu gsang ba'i rgyas btab bo// i li/ srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga phur las/ rgyal po gsang bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas li byin har gyis dkar po rnam pa

gsum gyi cho ga 'di gsungs so// hU~M/ dkar po shel ldan dam pa 'di// bskang ngo rgyal po'i thugs dam bskang// rgyu mchog shel ldan dkar po 'di// pha ni rgya rje ru rtse dang// ma ni 'da' ste ru rtse dkar
gnyis// 'tshos shing yid kyi sprul pa las// dung gi sgong nga gcig tu 'byung// de lo gcig khyod skor lon pa las/ kha ro ma rdol zhabs su lug/ lug ces dang po de la btags// rwa gnyis gyen du 'khyil ba
yis// gnam lha dkar po gyen du 'degs// mig gnyis 'phred la rig rig lta// ma rig mun pa'i skon la lta// thams cad gsal bar sgo 'byed do// rna ba'i dbang po krong nge krong// sgra rnams dag la rab tu
nyan/ kha ma ro la lce 'jib pa// ro mchog brgya ldan gsang ba'i dbyings// sna yi dbang po dri la snom// lcags kyi mig bzhi sa la 'thig/ bdud bzhi ma lus zil gyis gnon// spu ni dung lo 'khrig pa

yis// sems can kun gyi gsos su che// drod dang dbang po 'khor bcas pas// lha srin sde brgyad dges pa skong// nang cha rgyu ma gnye ma tshil// sha khrag chu rgyud mang po mtshan dang bcas// mchin pa mkhris pa glo
ba snying// mkhal ma grod pa pho ba dang// sul mnga' rji sha shan shan rnams// srog bdag ma lus 'khor dang bcas/ khyed kyi dgongs pa bdag skongs shing// bdag gi dbyar dam so sor gsol// bdag ni
dang por dam bcas nas// ding 'dir 'dus pa phan chad nas/ khyed kyi thugs dang 'gal ba rnams// dkar po bya gag dam pa 'dis// bskang po rgyal po'i thugs dam bskang// mchod do li byin har la
mchod// dkar po bya gag rjes shul dang// tshe sun ne tsho rjen blo khrag rnams/ khu le shod la sogs pa yis// srog bdag brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang// bskang bas ging gi dbyar dam sobs// ding nas bsam
pa ma grub par/ khyod la btas 'jug 'ben du 'chas// nam zhig rtags thon bsam pa grub// de dus khyod la gtang rag gtang// phul ba tsam gyis bsam pa 'grub// bdag ni thabs mkhas

skyes bu de/ khyed kyi dgongs pa bdag sgrub phyir/ khyed kyis bdag phan pa'i skyabs dang grogs mdzod cig/ hU~M/ thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam 'byor bdag/ mthu rtsal ldan pa'i srog bdag khyod// thugs dang 'thad

pa'i mkha' lding 'dis// bskang ngo bskang ngo thugs dam bskang// bskang bas dngos grub bdag la stsol// bya yi pha smos pa/ gser gyi bya pho thang de dar ba lags// bya yi ma smos bas/ g.yu'i bya mo gung mo ron

ter bshos// sgo nga gsum du byung// bse sgong khra bo de// dma' yang mi dma' ste// bar snang khams su rdol// sha zan mchu gug byung// zangs sgong dmar po ste// mtho yang mi mtho ste// rgya mtsho'i gting
du rdol// 'dam zan mchu leb byung// dung sgong dkar po ni// mi mtho mi dma' ste// ri rab kha la rdol// sgum thun mchu zlum byung// sgum thun rgya ma ste// mi dang chad ma byas// bdud btsan dmu yis
bskor// bar snang 'phyos te song// bar snang mi bu rigs brgya la// res phan res mi phan// de yi nang gshed nas// ze bzangs bya yi rigs// rag pa gsal gdangs pas// nyin mtshan shan yang

'byed// dbyar dgun drod kyang 'dzin// der mi dang chad don byas// mi yis bya gsol la// bya yi glud du chad/ de yi nang shed na// byad dkar za g.yag 'di// rin chen dung gi kha dog 'di// dang po rgyal po
shel ge yi// rtags dang mtshan mas btab pa yis// zangs kyi gtsug phud don shal 'di// rgyal po srog bdag 'khor dang bcas// bskang na dgyes pa'i rgyan cha yin// bya'i mig mas yar bkab pa ni// srid pa
mas nas chags pa yin// bya mig dmar la gdangs pa ni// skye 'gro khrag gis skyed pa yin// bya lus bum par 'dug pa ni// ri rab lus la rdzogs pa yin// 'jug ma rgya zor bkug pa ni// dpag bsam ljon
shing yal ga yin// spu gzhan dkar la gnyan pa ni// srog bdag thugs ni mar ltar 'ju// bya mchu ser la gug pa ni// bskang ni gser du 'gyur pa'i don// rgyal po rgyu ba'i dus su// sgra snyan ltong

ltong sgrogs pa ni// ming dang srog dang bdag skad sbyor yin// de 'dra'i mkha' lding dung mdog 'di// rta ru 'dzugs so 'ben du 'cha'// sku la bskang ngo thugs la mnyes// rgyal po chen po li byin har// thugs
dam bskang ngo dgyes par rtogs// bdag cag bsam pa mthar phyir mdzod// hU~M/ sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// mtshan ldan shel mdog ra dkar 'dis// rgyal po srog bdag li byin har// thugs
'thad 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// pa ni shan dar ru rings dang// ma ni skyin ma 'gram rings bshos// ri'u ni srin re kham po dang// gnya' re'u ldan mar gnyis su byung// ming sring gnyis shig
'tshos pa las// bu ni gnam ru dkar po skyes// mi yi glud dang khams su bkab// ras kyang khas blangs dam bcas so// ra lus dkar la gtang ba ni// rgyal po'i thugs la skye 'chi med// mi 'gyur brtag pas

skyon dang bral// ru gnyis dkar la ldem pa la// dar tshon sna lngas brgyan pa ni// rgyal po'i ru mtshon yin par shes/ kha na bla sgra drag por sgrogs// rgyal po drag tu khros nas kyang// don snying par gyis 'debs

pa'i rtags// lcags kyi rmig pa tshe tshe bzhi// phyogs bzhir rgyal pos mngags pa'i rtags// spu nyag rtsub la ring ba ni// rgyal po bka' 'khor las la 'gying// rkog tshar bungs dang ldan pa ni// thabs kyis 'gro

ba 'dul ba'i rtags// sha tshil mtshams su che ba ni// 'khor rnams 'bangs su 'khol ba'i rtags// skye na gser gyi dril chung 'khrol// lha srin sde brgyad mchod pa'i rtags// so sgra khrig khrig 'khrigs pa

ni// dgra bo zhe la gnon pa'i rtags// g.yas dang g.yon du snom byed cing// phri sgra drag tu sgrogs pa ni// bse yi mchi ma skyugs par rgyug/ drag tu kha nas sle sgrogs pas// sha ni khrag dang bsres nas
gsol// bskang ngo rgyal po'i thugs dam bskang// mchod do srog bdag dgyes par skongs// mnga' bdag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// thugs kyi dges pa bdag skong gis// bdag gi dgra bo rtsad nas
chod// rta ru 'dzugs so 'ben du 'cha'// dam las ma 'da' 'phrin las mdzod// sa ma ya zhes dam bca' 'o// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga pur las/ dkar po rnam gsum gyi cho ga'i le'u ste
bdun pa'o//// de nas srog bdag chen pos gzhan la phan par bya ba dang// sri'u gso ba dang/ gzhan gus pa 'dud na gcod pa 'phro gcad pa'i thabs rnams gcig tu dril te gsungs pa/ mchod pa dang/

gtor ma dang/ ya stags rnams phyi'i bsgrub pa dang mthun par bshams/ de'i steng du zan snyim pa tsam cig la ri rab kyi gzugs byas te/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar me mar lnga btang la thog nas za 'og gi
gur dbub/ 'og nas shing la gzings byas te// der btsugs nas tha mar chu shar du 'bab par bskyal la gtang ngo// dang por 'phags pa la mchod pa dbul/ de nas sngags pas thod dkar po bcings la

ber ram gos su dkar po gon la 'di skad do// nam mkha' ni 'phangs re mtho// sa gzhi ni rgya re che// ri rab ri lhun re sdug/ rtsi shing ni grangs re mang// phyogs phyogs ni pha gi ni// nyi zla 'char ba'i 'og shed
na// mkhar cig gnam du zangs se zangs// dung mkhar dkar po zangs se zangs// logs bzhi ni bse la bgyis// 'gram bzhi ni lcags la bgyis// zur bzhi ni mchong las bgyis// sgo bzhi
ni gser las bgyis// ka ba bzhi ni gser las byas// gdung bzhi ni gser las byas/ kha bad ni g.yu las byas// rin po che yi dral cam can// nyi zla 'bar ba'i mthong khung can// de 'dra'i mkhar gyi nang

shed na/ khri cig gnam du zangs se sangs// de yi ni thog shed na// stan cig nems se nems// zab stan khra bo nems se nems// de yi ni thog shed na// rta cig ni rgyus dang brengs se brengs// rang dkar zhur

po dkyus dang breng nge breng/ de yi steng shed na/ rdul stan dkar po stab/ rta sga ni wangs se wangs// mi po dkar po las// g.yu yi smin ma can// bse yi sen mo can// mtshal gyi thig le can// dung gi so thabs
can// sku la ni ci gsol na// dar dkar ni ral ka gsol// dbu la ni ci bcings na// ji gdan ni ji thod bcings// stag ral ni g.yas na ni// bkra dang ni lam me mam// gzig shugs ni g.yon na
'khyug/ 'khyug pa'i 'od 'bar lam// 'phyog ma dang ni g.yas pa ni// dung gi spa lcag la// g.yu yi ni lcags 'bras btags// gnam la ni bskor bskor nas// sa la ni brdeb par byed// gnam la ni 'phyar

yang 'phyar// 'phyog ma ni g.yon pa ni// sa la ni bshal yang bshal// ched bag ni ched g+ha na// drag tu ni khros pa'i tshe// lcags kyi mi bo chen po la// sku la ni ci gsol na// rgya bye stod kyi slag pa la// 'bu byi'u
smad kyi sham bu btags// sku ni rings la bsnams// dbu la rmog mo gza' rings mnabs// phyag cha ni g.yas pas ni// lcags kyi zangs gri rnon po brnams// dgra bo'i srog rtsa dmar po chod// g.yon na

lcags kyi rnge'u chung brdung// bdud btsan thams cad pho nyar 'gyed// mchod do bdag kyang chang gis mchod// bskang ngo bdag kyang gser gyis bskang// de 'khor gnas pa'i rgyal po ni/ khu le shod kyi lag dgu

dang// ag ge dang ni ug ge dang// trang ze dang ni shang ze dang// da khod dang ni ni khod dang// nyi zla la sogs 'khor dang bcas// mdun na khyi spyang zhungs se zhungs// log na sha rkyang si li li// rgyab na spra spre
'du ru ru// steng nas dar dkar ling nge ling// mchod do ni chang gis mchod// bskang ngo ni gser gyi bskang// mchod do bskang ngo dpon dang g.yog/ bdag dang yon bdag 'khor bcas la// dmangs po bu med
bu stsol cig/ dbul po nor med nor stsol cig/ skra lo g.yu med g.yu thog cig/ nor srid thams cad 'phel bar mdzod// rgyal po'i sku ni rin chen sku// rin chen skus ni dgos 'dod skongs// rgyal po'i thugs
ni mar khu'i thugs// mar khu'i thugs kyis bsam pa bsgrub// rta ru rten no dpal du mchod// g.yu ru 'dogs so dung du 'bud// dar du 'phyar ro mgon skyabs 'chol// gnod pa'i bsam sbyor ma
mdzad par// bdag cag bsam pa mthar phyin mdzod// dag par bshams par sa ngas dang// gsal bar bshams pa'i me mar dang// gser rgod g.yu rgod nya sha dang// rgyal po'i mnga' thang skyems phud

dang// thugs rnams 'ju ba'i mar khu dang// klu mchod mched dang nyungs kar sngo// bsam pa sgrubs shig li byin har// sri'u gsos la bu tsha spel// nor phyug 'bru rnams rgyas par mdzod// nyi spang sad dang zla

spang sad// shel spang sad dang mahA rA dza/ li byin ha ra ma hA shan ting swA hA/ zhes ci bcol ba thams cad bsam pa mthar phyin par 'gyur ro// yas thags gong ma bzhin du gtang/ bskal tshig yang gong ma
gtang// dkar po gang yang rung ba cig rtar bzugs/ bsam pa grub nas gtang rag dbul bar bya'o// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga phur las/ sems can la phan par bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas srog bdag chen po li byin ha ra yis thugs rab tu gsang ba'i rgyud 'di bcangs pa'i yon tan dang/ ma bcangs pa'i skyon dang/ dbyas shing skur pa btab pa'i nyes dmigs rnam grangs 'di
gsungs so// sa gnas byang chub sems dpa' mchog/ 'gro ba 'dul phyir srog bdag gzugs// lha srin sde brgyad kun gyi gtso// rgyal po'i rgyal po li byin har// nga nyid kyis ni bstan pa'i rgyud// bstan pa
bsrung phyir ngas gsungs te// 'di ni dpag bsam shing bu 'am// yang na yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// sems can kun gyi bsam pa 'grub// yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'o// 'di de rtag tu su 'dzin pa// rgyal po bas

kyang mnga' che ste// longs spyod thams cad rgyas pa ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dra// 'di de 'dzin par su byed pa// rta dang ba glang ra dang lug/ rkang 'gros rnams ni rab tu 'phel// bang mdzod rnams ni de

bzhin rgyas// 'di la rtag tu mos pa ni// rgyal po nga yi sras yin la// nga yang rtag tu de la sems// de ni rigs dang brgyud 'phel te// shi na bu spun drug gam bdun// yang na brgyad kyis bdur 'gyur te// de
las nyungs par mi 'gyur ro// de yi dbang btsan mchu che ste// dgra bo brgya 'am stong yang rung// de dag ma lus thams cad kun// dus btab dus las mi yol bar// bsad nas bdag nyid rgyal bar

'gyur// bde ni tshe ring lo brgya thub// yang na brgyad cu thub par nges// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// nga yi bstan pa'i rgyud 'di ni// su zhig 'dzin par mi 'tshal la// dpyas shing mi gus mi 'dzin
pa// 'di 'dra spyod par mi byed pa// de ni rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur// de yi lus la mdze nad dang// shu ba g.yan pa 'bras dang phol// smyo 'bog gzer nad drag pos 'chi// de ni rab tu tshe thung

'gyur// bsam pa thams cad mi 'grub ste// dper na rdza so ma gtang ba// blug ma thag tu 'jig dang mtshungs// de bzhin rkang 'gros rnams dang ni// 'chi 'am yang na stor ba 'am// yang na dgra rkun dag gis
'phrog/ 'bru zan bang mdzod ci yod pa// de bzhin yang na me yis 'tshig/ zhing yang sad dang ser ba shwas// sa gzhir bcas nas brlag par 'gyur// rabs chad bu tsha tshams shing 'chi// 'jig rten pa rnams
dpyas par 'gyur// 'gron dang byes su 'gro na yang// don rnams mi 'grub dgra yis 'joms// na tsha drag pos 'debs par byed// de la mthu dang dbang med de// dgra rnams kyis ni hal rgad byed/ kha tshos
sdig pa sngangs na yang// pha rol 'jigs par mi 'gyur te// dpe zla ded cing ngan dmigs 'dren// tha mar srog gi bar chad byed// de la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams// spangs kyis mi spongs mtha' dag

'byung// de bas rgyud kyi snying po 'di// dus ngan tha ma nam zhig na// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar rgyas kyang// skye bo bden pas mi 'dul te// chos nyid bden pa mi nyan tshe// de tshe rgyud 'di spyad par bya// 'jig

rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// bsgrub pa mang du spyad na yang// mthu med skye bos dpyas gyur te// de'i tshe rgyud 'di spyad par bya// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// sems can bsod nams mar 'grib ste// ban

d+he nang 'thab mthu 'gran byed// gcig la gcig smod dpyas 'phran byed// gcig dgra gcig gi sgong byed dus// de tshe nga yi rgyud 'di 'byung// zhes rgyal po li byin ha ra nyid kyis gsungs so// srog las kyi
rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga phur las/ rgyud bcangs pa'i phan yon dang/ ma bcangs shing smad pa'i skyon dang/ dus nam 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// srog las kyi rgyal bu srog bdag gser gyi ga
phur zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ yA k+Sha sarba rA dza ha la dz+wa le tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gnod

sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i snying gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje khro bo mi

bzad pa drag po sprul pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing gdug pa can 'dul bar dbang bskur te/ lag na rdo rje gtad pa de ri ma la ya'i rtse mo na gnam lcags 'bar ba las grub pa'i khang pa
na/ 'khor lo byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dregs pa can gyi sde brgyad dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/ gnas de yang stod gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge'i 'gran sar

gyur pa/ smad 'dab gshong na gcan gzan stag gi 'gran sar gyur pa/ rtsi shing dang/ rtsi thog dang/ sman dang/ sdong bu dang/ yal ga'i 'khrungs sar gyur pa/ de na 'dab chags rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad

dang// 'khor ba dang/ lding ba dang/ 'dzum pa dang/ mdzes pa dang/ 'chag pa dang/ 'phur ba dang/ 'drad pa dang/ skad sgrog pa dang/ 'drad cing ro za ba'i gcan gzan gyi rnam pa kun kyang rgyug pa dang/

'dzin pa dang/ bzung ba dang/ gsod pa dang/ sprug pa dang/ tshoms pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ mdzes pa dang/ nga ro sna tshogs 'don pa de dag go/ de lta bu'i ri de'i rtse mo na gnam lcags las grub pa'i khang pa
'bar ba yod de/ de yang dbyibs gru gsum mthing nag me 'bar bar 'dug pa/ ngos gsum du zla gam du 'dug pa la me 'bar ba/ logs la zhe sdang can sbrul sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'phyar ba/ rgya phyogs bcur

yongs su ma chad pa/ ye shes las grub pa/ steng gnam lcags 'bar ba'i thog 'begs pa/ khrag gi bar na glog 'gyu ba/ sprin sna dang/ na bun dang/ kha rlangs snang ba/ dug gi ser ba rgyun mi chad par 'bab pa/

dug mtsho khol ma'i nang na chu srin la sogs gdug pa can thams cad dkyis gang ba/ khrag gi rba glong 'khrug pa'i nang nas byung ba'o// de na gnas pa'i dregs pa can thams cad ni gdug pa gsod pa la dga'

ba/ brtse ba med par sha dang khrag la dga' ba/ khrag dang sha'i dri tshor na skad cig tsam la gling bzhi la rgyug pa/ nyin dang mtshan du mi gsod pa la brtson pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs kyis/ kha nas sngags

dug dang 'dra ba 'don pa'i gnod sbyin gdug pa can sha dag gi gnas dang rten sar gyur te/ de dag thams cad dpal phyag na rdo rjes srog phrogs te btul nas/ dam tshig byin de dbang bskur nas rdo rje gtad
de dam la btags nas/ thams cad rdo rje'i ming can dam tshig dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung la rem pa/ dam nyams pa gsod pa la brtson pa/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i yul du thog dang ser ba

'bebs shing nad sna tshogs gtong ba la brtson pa/ sngags pa dam pa'i pho nya byed cing nyin dang mtshan du de la bsrung bar byed pa/ de dag kun gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i bsrung mar gyur to// gnod sbyin thams

cad kyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i snying rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de'i dus na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po yak+Sha 'bar byed ces bya ba zhe sdang che ba mthu dang/ nus
pa dang/ stobs dang/ dbang che ba zhig yod pa las/ dus der shin tu 'dod chags skyes te/ ri de'i rtsa ba'i dug mtsho khol ma'i nang na klu mo mig gcig ma zhes bya ba dang/ rigs kyi srin mo dmar

mo sham snying 'phrog ma zhes bya ba gdug pa dug can 'dod chags che ba/ gsod pa la dga' ba/ mthu che ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ gdug po mo khyad par du 'phags pa zhig yod do// de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yak+Sha

'bar byed ces bya ba des/ gnod sbyin rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba mgyogs pa de pho nyar brdzangs nas// des de la smras pa/ kho na re'u cag gnyis las dbang che zhing gzi brjed nus pa che ba 'jig rten 'di na

med na/ 'o skol gnyis srid pa'i 'khrig ma cig spyad na mi rung ngam zhes mngags pa dang/ klu'i srin mo na re/ 'u 'u cag gnyis las zhe sdang dang 'dod chags che la gdug pa can 'jig rten 'di na med pas phrad

du mi btub bo// phrad nas srid pa smin na skye 'gro ma lus pa zos te 'gro ba'i bu cig 'ong bas/ skad cig kyang 'u cag gnyis mi phrad pa'i thabs med do zhes lan bdun gsol ba dang/ yak+Sha 'bar byed shin tu

'dod chags skyes de 'khrugs nas cang ma gnang ngo// de skad cig gis der phyin to// de nas de gnyis lho phyogs dug chu khol ma'i mtsho 'gram du nyin zhag gsum du 'dod chags spyad de/ so sor tshim nas rang

rang gi gnas su dong ngo// der srin mo lus mi bde ste/ zla ba bdun lon tsam na dug chu'i 'gram du song bas/ mngal nas lcags kyi sgo nga kha dang mig dgu pa cig skyes shing btsas so// skyes nas des ma'i sha
'brab cing pha'i snying rje 'dzag par byas te/ yar nam mkha'i mthongs su 'gro nas mi thub la/ mar sa rim pa dgu'i 'og tu mi thub cing skad 'byin to// de pha mas gsos sems can thams cad skrag par gyur

to// de nas mas yak+Sha 'bab byed la gsol pa/ 'u 'u cag gnyis kyi srid pa'i phrug gu 'di bsgral bar ma gyur na/ srid pa stongs par byed cing za bar byed pa cig 'ong bas/ 'dis thams cad phung bar byed par

gyur ta re zhes smras pas/ pha yak+Sha 'bar byed na re/ 'u 'u cag gnyis la 'di la gzhan gyi bya thabs med pas/ gnam lcags 'bar ba'i yang thog na bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje bzhugs pas/ de spyan
drangs la gdul lo// zhes smras pas/ ma srin mo yang thabs de la dad cing dga' bar gyur to// de gnyis sgo nga de lcags kyi thag la btags te skad cig gis thag la btags te skad cig gi gnam lcags

'bar ba'i khang par phyin to// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag byas shing bskor nas sdug bsngal ba'i sgras bdag cag gnyis 'di lta bu'i srid pa'i phrug gu gcig srid pas/ khyed kyis 'di 'dul bar zhu zhes smras
pas/ dpal phyag na rdo rje thugs rje cher skyes nas gsungs pa/ khyed gnyis ma 'jigs shig/ ces dbugs bton nas/ 'di ngas btul la sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgod cing bstan pa bsrung

ba'i bsrung mar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje spyan drangs te byon pas/ sgo nga de ni nam mkha' la 'phar te 'dar zhing sprul la skad sna tshogs 'don no// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes

gnod sbyin gdug pa can 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ dgongs pa mdzad nas zhal nas/ oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ ces gsungs te/ phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje de sgo nga la

brgyab pas/ de ma thag tu mdun du lhung ste gas pa'i nang nas mi'i lus la mjug ma sbrul du 'dug pa/ stod lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa kha gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa/ mig dang sna nas nad sna tshogs

'thul ba/ kha nas lce 'dril ba/ mA ra ya zhes sgrog pa cig spyan sngar 'drad kyis byung ngo// sgo nga de'i spris ma las gyur pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre thams cad du gyur to// de kha 'dar zhing brgyal lo// brgyal ba
sangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye/ bcom ldan drag po mthu bo che/ khyod kyi 'bangs su bdag mchi'o// 'bangs la thugs rje ma chungs shig/ dam tshig 'tshal dang

nan tan mdzod// ces zhus pa dang/ de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes gnod sbyin gdug pa can dam tshig la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de la dbang bskur de dam tshig la btags

nas lag tu rdo rje gtad de/ ming yang rdo rje gnod sbyin ha la 'bar ba zhes bya bar btags so// de phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba ma thub pa rnams kyi srungs ma dang las mkhan du

bskos te/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mnas bor khas blangs so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rdo rje ha la 'bar ba des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la mgo bas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis srog gi snying po dug dang 'dra ba/ mtshon dang 'dra ba/ mda' dang 'dra ba 'di bzhes la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dregs pa dam tshig can de'i dus la bab kyis/ srog gi snying po de me tog tu phul cig dang ngas byin gyis brlabs zin to/ zhes gsungs so// de nas des smras pa/ hring hring a la la/ khang so ma

ti g+hi ta i du dza/ de ni bdag gi srog nas 'bod pa'i snying po lags so// bdag rbad pa'i snying po ni/ g+h+ri ma g+h+ri ma hA la hA la/ yaM yaM tse tse la ya g+h+ri ma ta/ rbad mA ra ya spu ru ti tse a pa laM mA ra ya mA ra ya rdu tse rdu tse
mA ra ya/ rbad pu rbad pu mA ra ya/ de ni bdag gi sems can gsod pa'i sngags lags te/ gnod sbyin gyi skad de rig pa gzhan dang mi 'dra ba lags so// zhes gsol to// de nas pha ma rang gis

kyang phyag byas te gsol pa/ bdag cag gi kyang 'di'i grogs bgyi zhing bu bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ snying po phul lo// badzra yak+Sha dz+wa laM d+haM d+haM mA ra ya/ pha'i snying po lags so// badzra rAg mo nA ga b+ha te b+ha
to li li rbud/ ma'i snying po lags so/ zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so ma 'ongs pa'i// dus su sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrungs// rnal 'byor dam pa'i bya ba

gyis// dam nyams bstan la gnod kun sod// gnyis med chos nyid sems la bsgom// dge bcu bya zhing sdig pa spang// dam la gnas shing rang sems thul// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin khyed// cag dam las ma 'da' zhig/ gal te dam
las 'das gyur na// rdo rjes mgo 'gas snying khrag ni// yad de zad byas dmyal bar 'gro// oM badzra tsan Ta pha ma ya d+ha d+h+rus kA lI ma sa ti hri d+ha dza ha hU~M phaT/ khyed ni sngags des

gcun par byed// oM tri d+ha tas ma ma ka li yak+Sha b+h+raM ti ha ya dza laM su tri b+ha he hU~M phaT/ des ni cho 'phrul zhi byed pa'o// de nas 'khor na gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyas 'di skad phul lo// oM swA hA yak+Sha che d+ha be ra nas

taM tsit+ta dzi wa sa ha hU~M phaT/ bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin bgyi// kun gyis mgrin gcig gsol ba ni// nyid kyis gsungs pa bzhin du bgyi// ma bgyis nyid kyi bka' chad shog/ rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro bar

shog/ ces dam bcas so// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i snying rgyud las/ dam tshig la btags pa'i gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan phyag rdor gyis de bsgrub

pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig gdug pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pa'i don du/ khyod kyi bsgrub pa 'di ltar bya// gnas ni ri nag sog po gdong/ khros 'dra dred mo langs 'dra 'am// srin

mo ral pa gsigs 'drar bsngags// dam rdzas ra dang khyi dang glang// rta nag mi nag lnga yi snying// de lnga'i khrag dang thun rdzas drag/ zhi byed spre'u'i snying rma bya'i sgro/ khyod dang bdag gi gtor ma dang// bdud rtsi
chang bcas gces pa yin// dur khrod sa las gru gsum ni// nyis brtsegs nag po lho nub lta// zla gam dmar po gsum ldan pas// de la me ri sbar khab ni// thal chen dur khrod sol bar byug/ dbus su mon
nag thod pa ru/ khrag dug sna tshogs thun bca' 'o// rang gi skra bshig stan bting la// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer 'jigs med// bstan thod nang ling ga der khyod do// dam rdzas sbyin zhing sngags gsum
bzlas// thun la brab cing de gsang gsos// sngags dbal mi bzod rdzas gsum bya// cho 'phrul chen na zhi byed bya// de dus rtags ni 'di lta ste// hor chen mkha' la rgyug skad dang// mon pa
bdud ni 'bod pa dang// mig dmar gar byed srin rdo dang// bdud rdo nag po 'phen pa 'ong// dngos su byung na rab yin no// de dus dgra bo'i yul du yang// phu ru brag gi g.ya' bral zhing// mda' nas sngar

med tshul nag ljang// bar du rgya mtsho 'khrug pa yin// dgra rnams tso pur rang 'gyel dang/ khrag skyug tsha rims 'brum nag dang// nad dang mi nad sna tshogs 'byung// de dag myur 'ong dgongs pa bsgrim// gtor

ma dam rdzas de la sbyin/ khrag 'phang ling ga 'og tu mnan// de ni bu nyid rkyang bsgrub ste// mu stegs dgod ltar bsgrub 'dod na// mgo dang gzhug med gsum po dril// zhes sdang che bya lha yang med// zhag ni

bdun gsum chos mi bya// myur la mthu che khu ldog che// g.yung ste sangs rgyas zhi ltar bsgrub// shis la yun ring snying rje dang// chos la 'bar bar bya ba yin// mgo gzhug bsnyen pa bsgrub pa dang// bsad pa

las sbyar gsum du bsgrub// lhar bcas sngags bzlas legs pa yin// cho 'phrul che na zhi sngags bya// ma grub shing sa la sogs gyis// gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i snying gi
rgyud las/ bu ha la 'bar brkyang bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang ni khyed rnams nyon// pha ma bu gsum sbrag sgrub pa// byin che nus pa che bar 'dod// gru gsum gsum du spyang thod
gsum// ra sogs g.yas la ling ga bya// dbus dang g.yas g.yon gsum du ni// bu dang pha ma'i gtor ma bca'// mda' nag gsum la dar nag g.yab// snying lnga sha sna btsas rjen rul// 'o ma klu sman gsum
dam rdzas// shi shing phung pa gsum gdab cing// bya rog khyi nag bskyal ba ste// mi lpags phyogs su dgram bar bya// bdag nyid dpa' bau cher gnas bzlas// de gsum 'brub khung nang du bsam// bstim
mchod las bcol ldan gsum bzlas// rtags 'ong sngags la dza dza 'o// bsgrub pa bsad pa mA ra ya/ thun gdab phur gdab zor 'phang zhing// spyang thod gdug pa gsum du mnan// nges par sod 'gyur the tshom

med// ma grub gsum la shi sa bstan// 'di ni shi sa dbyung bsgrub ste// rgod bsgrub gong ltar sngags dang lha// sgrub tu med par shes par bya// gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i snying gsang ba'i

rgyud las/ gsum sbrag tu bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam pa kha skong las yin no// rtag tu bsgrub par 'dod pa yis// sku dang dam rdzas rtag tu bcang// lcags rdo khab
len bla rdo bcang// mi nag pags pa gdan du gding// ral pa'i khur bu mgo la bskur// gos nag gyon cing mda' nag g.yab// mon dang rigs ngan mi smad de// mi sha za zhing chang chen
btung// ma mar che dang dud pa btang// thod pa'i rnga brdung dar nag thod// ra sogs nag po'i rnga mi brdeg/ de dag dam tshig yin par gsungs// ser ba 'dod na sbag rkyang la// bsnyen pa la ni phrom re

brtags// mon dang khyi thod nang du bcas// sngags bcug 'od sha pa ta dang// a be sha a gdags par bya// phur pa yul lha klu la gdab// thod pa sngor gzhug thab zor bya// 'byung po'i nyi ma la gtad na// sa
'og 'big pa'i ser chen 'bab// ma grub lan gsum spogs par bya// des kyang ma grub shi sa bstan// sdig pa mgo dgu'i thab nang du// sbas kyang sku bcug phur bas gzer// drag po'i las la gcun sngags
gdags// bdag nyid khro bo'i zhabs 'og gzir// drug bral bsdigs pas rtags 'ong ste// gsol la las la gong bzhin gtang// ma grub phur gdab sku bsregs la// tha ma'i las su gsungs pa'o// zor
dang thun ni 'khor 'das bsngags// srog gser gnyis la rab tu bsngags// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i snying gi gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gdams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de rnams rab tu
dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad bstod do// stobs po che la drag shul che// rig sngags rgyal po dge ba po// gdul dka' mtha' dag 'dul mdzad pa// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// lcang lo
can gyi gnas mchog na// rig sngags gsang sngags bdag po ste// log 'dren gdon tshogs 'joms mdzad pa// bcom ldan dgyes mdzad de// rdo rje gsor nas 'di skad gsungs// dus gsum sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba 'dzin pa sprul sku nga'i// dam la khyed kun gnas chos nyon/ khyod ni gza' dag sgra gcan 'dzin// dbang phyug chen po zhes kyang grags// dug chen 'bar ba'i ming can
khyod// 'dir mnos bstan bsrung la 'bod// rgyud 'di gang nas de ru song// bstan 'jig ma yin kun gnod spong// snying dang 'dra ba'i gsang rgyud 'di/ khyed la 'di gtad gsang la ston// de yis sba zhing

cig la ston// ces gsungs so// gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i snying gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i snying
gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// mkhan po da na d+ha la dang/ lo tsa ba dz+nyA nas bsgyur ba'o////

rgya gar skad du/ bya g+h+ri tra badzra yak+Sha tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa kun gyi sngon rol na

'byung ba rlung tsha grang 'thab pa'i bar na/ mi men gyi srin po dang sha zan gyi srin mo bshos pa las/ srid pa'i bu mo lnga byung/ bu mo che ba dang phyag ya bdud kyi rgyal por bshos pa las/ bu rdo rje legs pa skyes/ de

yang gnam lo phag gi lo la dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes grangs bcu bdun gyi nub mo la skyes so// skyes nas zhag lnga lon pa'i nang par bu des smras pa/ ma nga'i zas skal ni gang yin/ nga'i 'thung skal ni gang yin/

nga'i las su ni ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang/ mas bu la smras pa// bu khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi zas su ni stag gi snying zo/ ra'i snying zo/ byi la'i snying zo/ khyod kyi las dpal chen po'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i grogs

gyis shig ces smras nas/ bu la cer bltas pas/ bu'i snying kha nas sme ba'i rdo rje nas tsam pa cig skyes nas 'dug ste/ mas bdud kyi mtshan mkhan la mtshan rtog tu bcug ste/ mtshan mkhan na re bu 'di legs

te/ rdo rje'i rigs las skyes pa yin pas phyag na rdo rje la dbang bskur zhus shig ces zer ro// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bstan pa mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du dbang bskur/ gsang mtshan rdo rje

legs pa zhes btags nas/ sangs rgyas stong rtsa lnga ma thems bar du phyag na rdo rje'i bstan pa ma nub bar/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbang byed pa dang las kyi gnod sbyin du dbang bskur nas/ bstan pa bshig
pa'i sems can tsam dmyal thag chod par bka' bsgo'o// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ skye rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// gang zhig rnal 'byor las

can gyis// rdo rje legs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// rdzas kyi bsag thabs bstan par bya'o// zhes gsungs te// rdzas rnam pa bzhi bsag ste/ phyi rten gyi rdzas bsag pa dang nang gnod sbyin gyi rdzas bsag pa dang/

gsang ba mchod pa'i rdzas bsag pa dang/ bla rdo gzung ba'o// phyi bsten pa'i rdzas ni ra la brten te/ zhur po lag dkar rgya bo mig bzhi/ khams pa rog po 'gal kha la rten te/ rnga ma sngon dmar gyis brgyan

te srog gi snying po gdags/ mnga' gsol lo// nang gi dam rdzas bsag pa ni/ ra gsob la rnga ma sngon dmar gyis brgyan te khar ling kha gzhug/ kha dgra phyogs su bstan/ smyug rgod la mda' bya rgod ma byas la

dar le brgan dang/ bse'i byang bu dang/ skyes pa'i snying dang/ ra snying dang/ byi la'i snying dang/ stag drug ma'i snying gdags so// gsang ba'i mchod rdzas bsag pa ni/ phy-i'i tshul du mchod pa ni bshos bu la
brgyan rnam pa mang pos brgyan la/ spyan gzigs dang gser skyems kyi mchod do// nang mchod pa'i rdzas ni/ sha khrag dang/ dbang po rnam pa lnga dang/ a mr-i ta dang/ rwa gsur gtang la bla rdo gsang

ba'i dam rdzas bsag pa mi/ rdo pha wang long bu la tri tri tri gsum bris la byin gyis brlab/ dar le brgan la srog sngags bris la bla rdo dril/ de nas snying gsum dang rdzas gsum du bcas la ri'i snying shun du dril/

de nas za 'og khug mar dril/ de nas phying khug tu bcug la mchan khung du gdags/ zangs ma'i khab dang spu gri yang gzan lpags su bcug la/ snying gsum po'i phyi ma'i 'thum bu dang bcas pa ni gsang ba'i

mchod rdzas te/ mchod rdzas gsum po gang gis mchod kyang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi skyes bu'i mchod rdzas thams cad byin gyis brlob/ rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las rdzas bsag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas
yang dag bshad bya ba// skyes bu rdo rje legs pa yi// bsten thabs rnam pa gsum du bshad// ces gsungs te// bsten pa'i thabs la gsum ste/ jo bo ltar bsten pa dang/ grogs po ltar bsten pa dang/ bran
ltar bsten pa'o// de la jo bo ltar bsten pa ni/ khyod kyi jo bor 'dzin to// lhar 'dzin to// dus 'di nas bzung nas bdag skyabs 'og gzhug tu gsol lo snyam ste khas len pa'o// grogs po ltar bsten pa ni/
skyes bu chen po dang bdag nyid skye ba snga ma'i las kyis kyang 'brel/ slob dpon gyi dam tshig gnyan pos kyang 'brel// dkyil 'khor gcig la bltas nas dam tshig gcig par bsams te/ grogs po khyod kyang

dam las ma 'da' zhig/ nga yang dam las mi 'da' 'o// bran ltar bsten pa ni/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don rtogs pa'am/ bdag nyid dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du mthun pa'i dam rdzas thogs la/ ting nge
'dzin gyi dbang du bsdus te las myur du gyis shig/ byas pa tsam gyis las la 'gro'o// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ bsten pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'di
gsungs so// rnal 'byor gang zhig las can des// rdo rje legs pa bsgrub 'dod na// sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du gsungs// zhes gsungs te/ de la mthun sbyor ra la bsten te bsgrub pa dang/ rtsal chen seng

ge'i gzir la mnan te bsgrub pa dang/ mgyogs pa sha khyi las la 'gyed pa lta bu'i bsgrub pa'o// de la mthun sbyor ra la brten pa'i sgrub pa ni/ sa byin gyis brlabs la gnas gang yin pa der ma traM gi snying khar

e gru gsum bca'/ mtha' ma rtsang gis bskor la/ ra spu rtags can cig mdun du bzhag la/ bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal du byas la/ oM badzra sA d+hU sa ma ya/ oM hri du mA ra ya dza dza/ srog thug thug mA ra ya dza dza/
srog rbud rbud mA ra ya dza dza/ sha la du/ khrag la du/ dam la shog dza dza/ zhes bzlas te/ mtshan ma rab 'bring tha ma gsum gang byung ba dang/ a par sad/ e par sad/ a lo a spar a th+yim/ thi
s+phur sod/ ni spur sod/ a lo a spar a thim/ zhes yang chang phud dgod ma nyams par la gtor bas mtshan ma byung ba dang/ ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'grub bo// bla rdo bca' ba dang/ rten bca' ba dang/ rbad
pa'i las bya'o// bod rbad gsad gsum dril la bzlas so// rtsal chen seng ge'i gzir la mnan pa ltar bsgrub pa ni/ ma traM bcas la/ bdag nyid dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgom pa'i thugs kha nas yi

ge hU~M gcig 'phros pas/ hU~M de je che je che song ba las/ mi nag po 'bro zhu chen po gon pa seng ge dkar mo la chibs pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa/ g.yon na dgra snying chang par 'chang ba/ lcags kyi

ral pa yod pa/ ral pa'i gseb na du ba phyur ba/ mig g.yas pa nyi ma la byas pa/ g.yon pa zla ba la byas pa/ sma ra ser po'i rtse la bskal ba'i me stag 'phro ba/ zhal nas srog gcod pa'i sngags zlos pa/ dpyid

zla gsum la rlung nag tshub ma'i sna 'dren pa/ dbyar zla gsum la char sprin gyi nang na bzhugs pa/ ston zla gsum la lcags kyi ser ba'i sna 'dren pa/ dgun zla gsum la khams gsum sems can gyi srog 'phrog

pa'o// skyes ngo mar gyi bdud/ bu mon chung gi rtse ste/ dgra bo dam nyams thun bur thun bar bsams te/ ma traM gi snying kha'i 'brub khung du/ ra sha lag pa g.yas pa cig la ling ka sbyar te dug mda' brdeg/ 'bod

pa'i sngags kyis bod pa dang/ rbad pa'i sngags kyis rbad pa dang/ gsad pa'i sngags kyis gsad pa dang/ gsum ka dril ba rnams ni shes par bya'o// mgyogs pa sha khyi las la 'gyed pa lta bu'i bsgrub pa ni/ phyi

rten dang/ nang rten dang/ gsang ba'i rten dang/ bla rdo bca' thabs dang/ ma traM bca' ba'i las rnams gong ltar byas la/ skyes bu gnad nas bskul te// bu ltar gso la khyi ltar rbad do// srog gi snying po rab ni

jo bos khol po khol ba dang 'dra/ srog gi snying po 'bring pos ma bu la skad sgrog pa dang 'dra/ tha mas spud la'am grogs po 'bod pa dang 'dra/ de bas na srog gi snying po ma nor ba gal che'o// rbad sngags rab
kyis bran nyan brtson la jo bos las la gtad na/ sod byas na gsod/ rkus byas na rku/ rgyob byas na rdeg/ rbad sngags 'bring gis nyi ma gcig gi 'dan pa las 'chol dang 'dra/ 'dan pa mi dga' ba bdag

pos mi byed/ bdag po mi dga' ba 'dan pas mi byed/ rbad sngags tha ma ni gnyen snying nye ba gnyen smos gtang nas las 'chol ba dang dmag re ba dang 'dra'o// gsang sngags rab kyi ni sha khyi bzang pos ri
dgas shor ba med pa dang 'dra/ gsang sngags 'bring ni rtsal po che mda' 'phen pa dang 'dra ste/ sum gnyis la 'phrog go/ gsang sngags tha ma ni rkun po zhags thogs 'dra ste/ phyed la zin phyed la

mi zin te/ de bas na bod rbad gsad gsum gyi sngags ma nor ba gces so// badzra sA d+hu sa ma ya/ badzra skyes mchog gi thig le rtsal/ badzra ging ka ra hring hring/ badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya/ yag sha ging ka ra tsit+ta dz+wa la raM

badzra kra ma ni shi ni/ sa ma ya d+hu ya/ badzra sa d+hu sa ma tri tri/ yag sha badzra sa d+hu saM ya tri tri/ badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya bra na rbad/ thuM tshal gur gur rbad/ tri yang du b+h+yo/ ging ka ra ya pa ri brag khaM b+h+yo/ ni mar na ya du ni dza/

badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya/ rbad tri rbad tri dza/ 'ur ba 'ur ba rgyug tri rgyug tri dza/ badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya srog la rbad tri dza/ ging ka ra sa ma ya/ mu la rak+ta tsit+ta rbad b+h+yo/ srog shi ka rar mA ra ya rbad b+h+yo/ badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya rbad

rbad b+h+yo/ che ge mo la sa ma ya srog rtsa chom ma ra ya/ sa ma ya dza dza/ dang por bod/ bar du rbad/ tha ma gsad/ sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum hril gyis dril la bya/ sngags rnam gsum hril gyis dril la bzlas

so// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang ni 'di gsungs so// skyes bu bsgrub pa'i drod tshad bcu drug bshad par bya/ grub pa'i tshad brgyad ma grub pa'i

tshad brgyad de/ dam can gyi grub tshad brgyad la/ nyams su lhang lhang 'ong ba dang/ ci byed pa yid la dran pa dang/ sems la ci smon pa bzhin du 'ong pa dang/ bsam pa ci yang thogs pa med par 'grub pa dang/

rmi lam rno ba dang/ sems can thogs pa med par sod pa dang/ 'od dang slob dpon du rdzu ba dang/ spyang khur rdzu ba dang/ de rnams dgra lha grub pa'i rtags brgyad yin no// ma grub pa'i rtags brgyad la/ snying mi

dga' ba dang/ ngu snying 'dod pa dang/ khro snying 'dod pa dang/ blo bu du nad drag po 'ong ba dang/ snying gtad pa'i mi dgrar ldang ba dang/ bzung yang mi thub par 'phros pa dang/ ra gsob mi non pa dang/ sgrub pa

po nang 'thab pa ni ma grub pa'i rtags brgyad do// de yang 'od dkar la 'khyud pa dang/ 'od dmar nag tu 'ong ba dang/ dmar la 'phro ba dang/ sems can la brdeg snying 'dod pa dang/ ling ga la rgyab snying

'dod pa ni las grub pa'i rtags yin pas/ sangs nang par nyi ma zer ka la ling ga sreg pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi lha ma srin sde brgyad la dpang gzugs so// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ mtshan ma
drod tshad kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rnal 'byor gang zhig las can des// rmi lam dmod thabs bzhi ru gsungs// bdag lam rings su 'gron gdab pa dang/ brubs byed na gdab pa dang/ dmag 'dren na
gdab pa dang/ sri'u 'am nad pa'i sngags su gdab pa'o// de la bdag las rings su 'gro na nub mo nyal kar zan dron mo'i dbus kyu byas la/ sha lag dang g.yas pa la chang phud spyan gzigs la
sogs pa sder ma 'ga' ban cig tu bsag/ ras gtsang mas kha dgab/ kho'i blo rdo yang bzhag smyug ma la bags bu rtse mor btags la nas bre gang la gzugs/ skyes bu chen po bdag lam rings su 'gro bas

mthun pa'i dam rdzas bzhes la/ bdag gi don 'grub na rtags dang mtshan ma bzang du ston cig/ don mi 'grub cing nyes gyod 'ong na ngan du ston cig bya/ srog gi snying po nas bos la bskul yang bya/ bstod pa

yang bya/ rmi lam gdab/ bzang ngan gyi ltas ji ltar yin par 'ong ngo// rmi lam thebs dang ya btags rnams sa gtsang sar cho 'brang ston la gtang ngo// brubs chen po byed na ra thod skam po'i nang du snying gsum

dang/ chang phud dang/ ra'i dbang po lnga phye mar btags la klad khung du blug klad khung lces dgag/ tshon skud kyis bcing/ sngas kyi 'og tu dong khru gang pa rkong la/ der bcug la srog gi snying po nas bod/ dgra bo

'di la rtags phyin nam mi phyin// phyin na ci tsam na 'ong zhes dmod la/ ci ltar dmod pa ltar 'ong ngo// rmi lam thibs pa dang thod pa'i rdzas rnams ston la mchod 'bras bya'o// nad pa'i sngas su 'debs sam/
sri'u sos mi sos lta na sngas su bshos bu dang/ mngon cha dang/ spyan gzigs bshams/ mda' la dar sna btags pa cig sngas su btsugs la/ mi rnams nyal ba dang kog bo dmod btsugs la srog gi snying po
nas bod do// nad pa 'di shi sos stangs chod bya'o// ci ltar dmod btsugs bzhin ltas ston no// dmag chen po 'dren pa la sna lnga zhib tu gyon la/ lag pa g.yon du dar mdung thogs la/ lag pa g.yas pas

chang phud 'thor zhing bos na/ rang mi smas pa dang g.yul legs nyes ci ltar 'ong ba ston/ gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ rmi lam gdab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang ni 'di gsungs te/ mi

gnod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/ rang la mi gnod par bya ba dang/ 'khor la mi gnod par bya ba dang/ rta phyugs la mi gnod par bya ba dang/ de yang rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya ba dang/ kho'i cho 'phrul

bzang ngan gang byung yang rnam par mi rtog pa 'am// lha'i nga rgyal la gnas na rang la mi gnod do// 'dis phan nam snyam/ gnod dam snyam/ mi 'grub bam snyam na/ mi 'grub pa dang bar chad gnyis ka 'byung
ngo// 'khor lo mi gnod par bya ba ni/ mkhon la gzab/ phud la gzab/ de ltar ma byas par mkhon bya shing phud la ma gzabs na// sris chang dang zho chung gang yang khos 'khyair// blo bur du nad drag
po 'ong// tshig pa za zhing snying mi dga'/ smyo 'bog 'ong/ rta phyugs la mi gnod par bya ba ni/ kho'i dam rdzas tshang bar byas la/ phyugs ci yod pa kho la bcol/ bshos bu gtang/ gtad nyer bya/ de

ltar ma byas na/ kho la rtsis chung byas na/ khos lcags kyi sbyang po 'ur par rdzus nas rta phyug kyi gcan du 'gro'o// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ kho dam las mi ldog pa thabs kyi le'u ste bdun

pa'o//// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// gang zhig sri'u gso 'dod na/ rdo rje legs pa kho la bcol ces te/ sri'u gso ba'i thabs la gsum/ rgyun sngags ting nge 'dzin gyi gso ba ni/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor gang

yin pa'i sngags dang skyes mchog gis spel mar drang ngo// gtor ma gtong dus su yang gzhug la kho la sngo/ dmod bcol bya'o// des sos te 'ong/ rngan pa byin zhing gson sri'u'i drung du nam nyal nyal kho la rngan

pa re re sbyin/ bshos bu brgyad can khru gang pa re re/ chang phud rgod rnams kyis kho la mchod cing dmod bcol bya'o// de ltar byas na sos te 'ong/ rten btsugs nas gso ba ni/ ra spu rtags legs can cig kho

la sngo/ bshos bu dang chang phud la dmod bcol byas la/ skyes bu chen po khyod la ra 'di rngan par ster bas bu 'di rkang pu tshugs cig byas la/ ra dang btsan bshos bu gtang/ chang phud gtor ro// de ltar byas na
sos par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ sri'u gso ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// slob ma dam las log pa dang// le gu 'o bsan log
byed pa dang// sha khrag mna' las log pa gsum// skyes bu chen po nyid la gtad/ ces te slob ma dam log byed na phag gi thod par slob ma'i ming dang gzugs bcug la/ skyer pa dang/ ram bu dang/ sgog pa

dang/ nyung ma'i sa bon dang/ gu gul nag po dang/ 'ba' tsha rnams phag thod du blugs la tshon skud kyis bcings la/ de'i steng du shogs zhig la skyes bu'i ming bris la/ slob ma 'di dam las log/ phung du

chug byas la shags gdags// shing rkang gcig gi rtsar sbas na phung nges so// le khu bo bsen log byed na/ glang ma'i byang bu mtho gang ba cig la/ stod du khrag gis sgrub bya'i ming bri/ bar snag tshas skyes bu'i

ming bri/ smad nas ra khrag gam khrag gang yang 'dra ste/ nga'i le khu bo 'dis khyod spangs so// 'di'i srog gi shan pa gyis shig/ sgo'i nor la lcags kyi spyang mo bye bris la nyal sar sbas na phung ngo// grogs po mna'

las 'gal na dug dang/ gu gul dang/ 'bob khus ming byang bris la/ bud med mi gtsang ba'i dor mas dril la/ sngar gyi shing ngam/ lha khang ngam/ chu mig mna' chad byas pa'i sa yod na der sbas so// de med
na gar gnyan sar sbas la/ grogs po 'di yis mna' las 'gal bas 'di la chad pa chod cig bya'o// des phung nges so// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ dam log dam nyams bsgral
ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// gang zhig las can rnal 'byor pas// skyes bu chen po'i mngon shes bsgrub// ces pas/ gang rnal 'byor ba skyes bu la bzlas pa des/ 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad mthong bar bya ba dang/ snang srid kyi lha 'dre thams cad mthong ba dang/ rang la gzhan gyis bug pa thos pa bya ba'i thabs la/ ra'i mgo bo dang dbang po dang ma bral ba cig dang/ shog bu cig

la skyes bu lha'i bu cha byad la lus la mig brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gang ba/ khams gsum thams cad spyan gyis gang bar bris la ra'i thod par gzhug/ rdo pha wang long bu cig la tri ling tri ling/ b+h+yo gzung b+h+yo gzung/

sa le sa le/ zhes bya ba bris la thod par gzhug/ thod pa'i kha gcod/ me long la mda' bya rgod ma cig la dar sna btags te/ shog bu tshon gang ba cig la/ badzra sa d+hu tri pa pa ri dun dri/ zhes bya ba bris la mda'

la gdags/ oM badzra sa d+hu tri pa ba ri/ dun tri e rtsal du la dun tri ma ho ra ri/ a pa ri pa ri/ a kha le sa le sa le/ dza dza phro phro a pa ra tu ni/ khams gsum mthong ba'i dngos grub bdag la gsol/ bdag gi
'dod pa ma sgrubs na/ khyod kyang dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// de bas bdag la dngos grub gsol// ces 'bod cing bsgrub na/ mig rnon dang/ sna gsang dang/ nyams dngos grub ster ro// ra thod de rtag tu
ltar gzungs/ dus khyad par can la bshos bu btang/ shog gu gnyis kha gong khug yis yon du bzhugs/ mdas g.yab cing me long lta/ g.yas su nyan par bya/ g.yon du blta bar bya/ mthong thos gnyis ka 'ong
ngo// mis ma tshor ba gal che/ mngon shes bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// gang zhig skyes bu bsgrub pa des// dam tshig dgu ni bsrung bar bya// zhes gsungs te/ spyang

khu'i thod pa kha khrag gis byugs te/ ra snying gi nang du dgra'i ming bris la gzhug/ ra snying spyang thod kyi khar brtsigs la sngon dmar dkri/ spyang thod skyes bur bsam/ ra snying dgra snying du bsam/ de skyes bus

gsol bar bsam/ bal tshon nad kyi sprin skyes bu'i kha rlangs su bsam pa dang/ bsgrub pa'i dus su chang phud rgyun du gtor ba dang gnyis/ ra gsur rgyun du gtang ba dang gsum/ gu gul gyi dud pa gtang ba dang

bzhi/ mkhon la gzab pa dang lnga/ byi dang yug mo bsrung ba dang drug/ mdo gtsang spyod pa sha mi za ba dang bdun/ rang gi gos drod ma yal ba mi la mi bskon pa dang brgyad/ stan drod ma yal ba mi la mi 'ding ba
dang dgu'o// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor skyes bu bsgrub pa des// bstod pa 'di yis

bstod par bya// hU~M/ sum cu rtsa gsum dga' ldan lha yul nas// gdod nas ma skyes rang bzhin dag pa'i sku// mnyam nyid rig pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ston pa shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la// bstan pa

bsrung zhing legs nyes stang 'dzin pa'i// dge bsnyen chen po rdo rje legs pa ste// 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ khyod ni yab yum dmu bdud bshos pa'i sras// bdun tshigs mtha' ru spyugs

pas sangs rgyas chos dang mjal// lha mi kun gyis dbang bskur rdzu 'phrul can// chos byed dam nyams mna' zan rnams kyi gshed// skye bo'i dgra lha dgra bo'i gshed ma zhes// gzhan gyi ma bcos nyid kyi zhal
bzhes pa// legs nyes stang 'dzin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// don dam nges pa'i bden pa ma mthong yang// skyes mchog khyad par can gyi gang zag gis// dbang bskur ming btags las kyi gnyer gtad

pa// chos skyong srungs ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang gis las dang bsod nams rdzu 'phrul gyis// lho yi 'dzam gling khyab cing kun tu rgyu/ khyad par bzhugs pa'i bod yul yongs kyis spel// yul lha gnyan
po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngon tshe thog ma rang gi bag chags bsam// smon lam dam bca' nyid kyi mos pa yis// rgya bod gtsang bgrod pa yi sna 'dren pa// tshong dpon chen po khyod la phyag
'tshal bstod// skye bo 'thab rtsod g.yul chen sprod pa'i tshe// gang zhig khyod la gsol mchod byed pa des// dmag gi ru bzlog pha rol g.yul 'joms pa// dmag dpon chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal

bstod// 'jig rten 'di na lta ba log pa yi// mu stegs bon smra thog par bsten pa dang// de dang mthun par 'jig rten skyong mdzad pa// thun mong lha mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten 'di na mthu

che gang yod kyang// bcol ba'i las rnams myur du mi 'grub ste/ khyod ni bdag gi rten cing las bcol lo// myur du grub byed khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i gnas na lha srin gzhan rten yang// dgra

rnams gsod kyang bdag la gnod par 'gyur/ khyod ni gang dang 'dris na rtag tu skyobs// yum gyi mgon mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'di na ma mchog gzhan rten yang// zug rngu drag cing rtogs

pa rab tu che/ khyod ni mi nag skye bos bsgrub na yang// mthu dbang ster byed khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ khyod ni gsang sngags dam tshig can// bdag kyang dam srung dam tshig mnyan por bsrungs// mnyam pa'i

don gyis bsdus pa'i nye ba na// don dam mtshungs pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyir na nyid kyi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// sku mdog phyag mtshan gcig tu ma nges te// sngags kyi phyag mtshan phyag

na rdo rje bsnams// rdo rje legs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// las kyi dbang gis ra yi sha la dgyes// ra sha khrag tshil rtag tu zas su gsol// ra yi pags pa nyid kyang na bzar gsol// skyes bu rdzu 'phrul

can la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyir ni nyid kyi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// gcig tu ma nges gnas skabs tha dad kyang// bka' dang bstan pa bsrungs bar zhal bzhes pa// gtsug lag dben gnas bsrung la phyag
'tshal bstod// dad pa'i yid kyis gdung pa'i skyems phyung nas// gus shing dad pas lus ngag sems btud nas// yon tan ri rab snyed las rdul tsam zhig/ dad pas dad gus phyag 'tshal bstod// kun

bzang thabs kyis sku la khyad sprul nas/ bdud rje brgya dang mtshungs par mthu bo che// lag nas thog 'bebs kha nas ser chen skyug/ thog ser skyin thang 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i gying chen
bco brgyad kyis// mnga' bdag chen po gzi 'bar rtsal// stag smad sum brgya drug cu'i 'khor gyi gtso bo mdzad// srog dbugs mdangs la dbang byed pa'i// dgra sdang srog gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal
bstod// rgyal ba'i bka' dang shAkya thub pa'i gsung// las bcol gnyer gtad bka' bzhin bstan pa bsrungs// spong len mi byed bka' bzhin bsgrubs pa yi// rnal 'byor bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub la

bstod// srog brgyad rang la rdzogs te sde brgyad ngo bor shar// lha srin phyag brnyan 'gyed cing sprul pa pho nyar gtong// gnam sa ri lung bar snang sprul pas 'gengs// ltas ngan cho 'phrul gtong la phyag 'tshal
bstod// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje legs pa khyod// zhal gyi tshems kun rdo rje 'od kyis brgyan// sku lus phyag sogs rdo rje 'od dpung 'khyil// rnal 'byor dkor rnams bsrung la phyag 'tshal

bstod// ces bzhi stong nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bstod cing las bcol na/ don gang yang 'grub par the tshom med do// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang

'di gsungs so// gang zhig las can skyes bu des// gsang dang gtod dang mchod pa bya// gsang ba la yang rnam gsum ste// rang la rang gis gsang ba dang// 'khor dang slob ma la gsang ba dang// spyir gsang

ba'o// ma bstan pa dang gsum/ 'di'i sgor ma zhugs pa dang mi mos pa la mi bstan/ skye bo dam med la mi bstan/ zhe sdang gi shas che ba la mi bstan no// gtad pa la yang gsum ste/ rang gi bu la gtad/ slob
ma la gtad/ rogs po snying regs la gtad do// mchod pa'i dus kyang bzhi ste/ dpyid zla gsum gyi brgyad la mchod// dgun zla gsum gyi nya la mchod// dbyar zla gsum gyi stong la
mchod// ston zla gsum gyi nya la mchod// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud las/ gsang ba gtad pa dang mchod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ u pa si ka ka la sho na tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dge bsnyen dgra gsang nag po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa'i dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje drag po lcang lo can gyi gnas na/ 'khor tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po brgyad dang/ khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i gza' chen po brgyad dang/ 'jog po de la sogs te

klu chen po brgyad dang/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rta mgo can dang/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags zangs ris dang/ bgegs kyi rgyal po bi na ya ga dang/ gzhan yang lha ma yin drag
po sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa/ srog dang dbugs la gnod pa grangs med pas bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas 'khor gyi nang nas lha tshangs pa stan las langs nas/ gsang bdag la phyag 'tshal bskor ba
byas nas 'di skad ces zhus so// kyai gsang ba'i bdag po lags/ 'jig rten gyi khams na ni gnod sbyin ser skya nag po zhes bya ba 'di/ 'khor bdud chen po bzhis bskor nas rol du lcags kyi spyang mo mgo

dgu rol/ slad nas zangs kyi 'phar ba lce brgyad 'brel pa/ klad nas lcags kyi bya khyung dgu lding ba/ las su srog gcod cing thog dang ser ba 'bebs pa/ zas su sha za skom du khrag dron 'thung pa/ blo bur dang
ye 'brog gis sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba cig 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na mchis pas/ 'di dbang du sdud la bstan pa la gnyair du gtad du gsol/ zhes zhus pas/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal

pa/ bstan pa la rab tu dga' ba'i lha tshangs pa chen po khyod kyis de ltar zhus pa legs so zhes gsungs nas/ thugs zhi ba'i ngang las sku drag po khros pa'i tshul du bstan te sku che ba'i yan lag rags par sprul

nas/ lcags kyi rdo rje srid pa'i rtse mor gsor zhing/ a la la yi sgra drag po phyung bas/ ser skya nag po de bdud bzhi dang bcas pa brgyal lo// brgyal ba sangs pa dang/ gsang bdag la btud nas/ phyag 'tshal
zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo chen po lags/ bdag cag 'bangs su 'chis lags na/ bdag cag la dbang bskur du gsol/ las kyi gnyer du gtad gsol/ zas kyi skal ba gtad du gsol/ zhes
zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrol ba'i ging du dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje gtad/ gsang mtshan badzra sa d+hu ru btags/ lce la bdud rtsi bzhag/ bstan pa la gnod pa'i mi rgod la sogs
lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi srog chod cig/ de'i lo thog la sogs pa la thog dang ser ba phob cig/ ces bka' bsgo nas/ bstan pa nub nas thar pa thob par lung bstan cing dbang bskur ro// de nas ser skya
nag po 'khor bdud bzhi dang bcas pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po la btud nas bstan pa la rab tu gnas so// ser skya dgra gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang tshangs

pas zhus pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags/ gnod sbyin drag po 'di dang po rgyu ci las grub pa lags/ da lta pha ma'i cho brang ji lta ba lags/ mthu dang stobs ji ltar mchis/ zhes zhus pas/ gsang ba'i bdag

pos bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu tshangs pa nyon cig/ gnod sbyin drag po 'di dang po 'jig rten chags ma thog nas/ shar phyogs kyi grong khyer ra lnga bya ba na/ pha ni bram ze rig pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ ma ni rigs

ngan bu mo ku sha'i mig gnyis kyi bu ru skyes te/ ming ni bram ze'i bu su pa ri bya ba yin no// de chung ngu nas rig pa dang ldan pa'i bu cig byung ste/ pha mas gnang ba byas nas lo bcu gnyis nas rab tu byung ngo// bco

lnga lon nas bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/ bco brgyad la yul gyi 'brel ba spangs te dka' thub la brtson par byas nas/ grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du/ rtswa ku sha'i spyil

bu byas nas dka' thub drag po mdzad do// dus nam zhig na yul khams kyi mis tshor ro// der bram ze su ta pa ri sngags ngan pa bsgrub bo zhes grags so// yul de na rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya ba dbang che

ba/ dkar po'i chos la mi dad pa cig yod pas sngags ngan pa bsgrubs na/ nga'i rgyal srid la rgol zhes bya bar thos so// der rgyal po de thugs 'khrugs te blon po rnams la bka' bsgo nas/ shar phyogs na bram

ze su ta pa ri bya ba de ngan sngags bsgrubs te/ nga'i rgyal srid la rgol bas/ de'i tshe'i 'du byed du thong zhig ces bka' bsgo'o// de nas blon po rnams tshogs nas bram ze su ta pa ri'i rtsar phyin to// bram ze la

blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod ngan sngags bsgrub nas ci byed dris so// bram ze na re/ nga ni sngags ngan pa mi bsgrub ste/ dkar po'i sdom pa la gnas so zhes zer ro// der bshags kyang ma nyams par blon po
rnams kyis spyil po la me gtang nas bram ze dge slong du gnas pa de gson bsregs byas so// der bram ze bsam pa ngan pa skyes te/ me lum nang nas dmod mo bor ro// nga sems bskyed na dkar po'i sdom pa
la gnas pa la las 'di 'dra srid pa/ nga 'di nas tshe 'phos ma thag gnod sbyin gdug pa'i bur skyes nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 'di ru/ thog ma med par mthu dang ldan nas/ las su thogs na

ser ba 'bebs shing/ zas su dbugs dang srog la dbang byed pa cig tu gyur cig/ ces dmod btsugs te tshe'i dus byas so// de nas tshe dus byas ma thag tu ri rab kyi nub byang du pha ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin
dmu rje btsan pa/ ma ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin bdud mo smin dkar ma/ de gnyis 'khrig pa spyad pas zla ba bdun lon nas/ stag gi lo'i dgun zla ra ba'i tshes gcig la lcags kyi grod pa cig skyes

so// grod ba de gnam la phur zhing sa la rdegs pa cig byung ngo// ma yis lta yang ma nus te/ yab kyis blangs nas dug shing na gro ta'i rtsar kha phye bltas pas/ lcags mi reng 'jigs pa'i cha byad can cig 'dug

go/ yab kyis blangs nas ming gdags snyam pas/ kho ma nyan par ri rab kyi zur la bros so// ri rab chen po yang me ru 'bar te gling bzhi thal bar rlog pa des byas so// ri rab la gnas pa'i lha ma srin dam
can rnams kyis kho la bstod de 'bangs su khas blangs so// dus der dmu bdud se'i bu gcig pa dang/ gza' bdud bi nu ra dza dang/ klu bdud rgya mtsho 'khrug byed dang/ btsan bdud shu'o bse'i ral pa can

dang/ de bzhis kyang srog snying phul nas khas blangs so// de nas 'khor bdud chen po bzhi dang bcas te gling bzhi ru 'gro ba yongs la gnod cing pha mas ming gdags su ma btub bo// de nas pha ma yis dmod

mo bor ba/ nged lus kyi sgrom bu pha ma'i ngag bcag nas/ khyod bas kyang dbang che ba cig mi mngon dbyings nas shog la/ khyod de'i bran byed par shog cig pa smon lam btab bo// de'i dbang gi da lta dam la

btags te/ da yang bstan pa la gnas la bka'i bya ra sngags kyi bsrung ma ste/ de'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung ba yin no// dge bsnyen dgra gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ skye gnas dang cho
