na the tsom med// dngos su byung na phur thun gdab// ro 'am snying la sngags pa bzhin// thogs pa med par mtshon gyis gdab// thun snod 'brub khung gnyis su 'byung// thun sna dang bcas 'brub khung nang du

gnan// tsit+ta byung na zhal du rngub// de la rtags med 'gor gyis chos// phur thun rtags rnams bstan pa ni// mkhar ba'i rtsa ru gcan gzan rjes// bu chung rjes su 'ong bar bshad// phur pas gdab cing sbyin
sreg bya// rjes su byung na ma mo nyid// sngags kyis dbang bskur las la rbad// sbyin sren las kyis kha tshar te// ltas ngan zer ba de bzhin no// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las// mtshan ma rtags kyi
skabs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas thabs 'phrin las kyi bsgrub pa snying thun gyi zor gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// shin tu ran pa'i thod pa la// ma dang ru gnyis dgod par bya/ khrag dang snying sna'i phye ma
blugs// mthing nag dar gyis dril bar bya'o// bud med mtshal chen rme yi khrag/ byang chub sems dang sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gru gsum bdun byas te// gcig tu me long gzhag par bya// gcig la skyer

ba'i phung bu la// thun gyis ma mo dbang bskur ro// gcig tu dug shing sbyin sreg brtsig/ gcig tu thun gyi pho ba gzhag/ gcig tu sngags kyis dgug par bya// gcig tu lha dang phral te bsad// gcig tu drag

po rdzas bcug la/ kha bdud klu la gtad par bya// zhes nas drag sngags bdun pa 'di gsungs so// trag rag+sha kha mun tra ma ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ trag rag+sha tig sna sa ma ya b+h+yo// e ka dza ti ra snying kha rag baM ril/

trag rag+sha ba ri la b+h+yo/ a ka ra nag po rag+sha b+h+yo/ trag rag+sha snying b+h+yo ling rbud/ trag rag+sha snying ram rag thun b+h+yo/ de nas ling kha bca' ba'i man ngag 'di gsungs so// 'khor lo bzhi bcas dbus su rlung// de
dbus rlung la 'khor lo bri// sgroms su yaM la gsang bar raM// lte bar khaM yin snying khar ni// de bzhin 'khor lo trag bzhi dgod// bdun byang ming rus drag sngags bdun// g.yas nas 'khor bar nga yis
bshad// de nas 'phrin las ma mo bzhi// ling ga dregs pa'i lus la dgod// spyi bor dkar mo khyud thogs te// snying khar nag po mche ba can// lte bar ser mo g.yang gzhi can// gsang bar dmar ljang 'khrug

mo bskyed// gong gi tshigs bshad brjod bya zhing// bdag la dbang bskur dngos grub stsol// zhes sngags 'di bdag dang gnyis med bstim// oM trag rag+sha re'u tri sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ zhes gnyis su med par

bstim mo// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las/ drag sngags sna tshogs kyi skabs te lnga pa'o//// de nas phur thun nag po'i ngan sngags sgrol ging bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// lcags ma seng ldeng phur pa la// gzi

byin bskyed pa'i drag sngags 'di// trag rag+sha kha thun tra mu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ rag mo te kun tsa tsa kha la b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ting b+h+yo/ rnal ma rnal te gsod la rngam/ gshol la mer mer/ sris la chums chums/ thu

byi thu lcags kyi sgra/ oM shri many+tsa ya ma rA dza e ka dza ti dza/ zhes bsgrub bo// dar mthing nag gi cod pan gdags// 'dis thugs dam gyi ma mo dbang bskur te/ oM badzra ki li ki la ya sarba big nan baM hU~M/ trag trag
gur lan ser ser tug tug ces rdzas kyis dbang bskur/ de nas 'dis gdab par bya'o// tsit+ta rbad/ phug ya phug myogs thums baM ril/ zhung zhung chums chums/ trag rag+sha mugs thibs/ sug

khug stom/ chog ni 'gyed kha la sta rbad/ ces pa'i glud bu la bsten par bya'o// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las/ phur thun nag po'i ngan sngags sgrol ging gi skabs te drug pa'o//// de nas las thams cad kyi

mjug bsdu ba ngan sngags gnan pa 'di gsungs so// shin tu mtshan ngan thod pa la// dbus ling ga phyogs bzhir trag/ raM yaM su khaM mtshams bzhir dgod// ming rus der bkod drag sngags dun// tshang bar de
bzlas rgyun srang gnan/ khyi nag bya nag pags pas brdab/ 'phrin las ma mo bod par bya// zhes gsungs so// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags gnan pa'i skabs de bdun pa'o//// de nas tsit+ta

yang snying ro langs sgrol ba dngos grub kyi khyad par gyi skabs 'di gsungs so// sa stegs gru bzhir ri rab brtsigs// de nas bdag nyid lha mchog tu// rdzogs pa'i tshul du sku skyed la// dur khrod gnas nas ro

'tshal lo// shi nas zhag bdun lon pa yi// bud med mdzes ma'i ro 'chal lo// dar zhing 'phen ba'i ro la bsgrub// de nas ro nyid rku bar bya// rten dang bral ba sngon du bya// bdud rtsi lnga rdzas rnams la// gur

kum sman dang dri chen spos// sna tshogs dri yi chu yis bkru/ de la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// snying khar gru gsum gru bzhis ni// shing tsha ldong ros dag gis bri// dbus kyi pho brang e la ni// shes rab mtshal gyis

trag bri'o// gro ga shing shun dag la ni// dngos grub ci 'dod dmar byang bri// de bzhin trag gi dbus su gdags// lte bar las kyi dkyil 'khor bri// 'khor lo bzhi bris trag bzhi dang// raM yaM su khaM tsa krar
bri// 'brub khung dkyil 'khor gsang gnas nyid// nags tshal spu gri gtams par bsam// snying khar ro bdag mon mo ste// bar du srid pa'i rgyal mo bsam// mkha' la bal mo nag mo bskyed// rgyab tu gnod
sbyin 'gram rings gnyis// ra dang dza las bskyed par bya// gzhan yang lus dang rnams la// mon mo 'bum gyis bskor ba yin// thams cad ma yi sa bon dgod// de nas dkyil 'khor dar gyi gur khang
dbub// bcu gsum bar du 'grub par bya// so so'i sngags kyis bar gcad// tsa re yaM gyis so sor gsum sngags brjod// ra'u re'u sa dang por mchod// gnyis pa bod yig rtags dang sbyar// gsum pa gsad

yid rtags dang dus// ji ltar 'dod pa bya bar bshad// de nas 'dzum bag mdangs skye zhing// me stag 'od dang 'ja' tshon 'byung/ kha smra ba ni thun mong ste// so so'i rtags rnams bshad par bya// de nas ro nyid
bsgral bar bya// dang por mchan khung g.yas pa nas// tsit+ta rin chen 'byung bar bya/ so so'i dkyil 'khor ma subs pas// shun chen bshus la nang nas mnye// de ni dngos grub dkyil 'khor

te// rang gi snying dang 'dra ba ru// sha khrag dngos grub blang bar bya// bya dang khyi la bstan mi bya// dbang po lnga ni gtor ma'i rdzas// klad pa rkang dang tshil bu rnams// ma 'dres til mar sbyin sreg bya// sha ni drung

skems phye mar sbyar// dus drug pa la mchod par bya// ling ka snying nang bcug gyur na// nams kyang bdun nam dgu nyid na// gang yang rung ste sgrol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las/

ro langs sgrol byed yang snying gsang ba'i skabs te brgyad pa'o//// de nas ser ba dang ltas ngan dbab pa 'di gsungs so// de nyid gsang ba'i thod pa las// lte bar dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// sgrub dang

rbad gsad de nyid de// ltas ngan ser ba dbab pa'i sngags// so sor phye ste bstan par bya'o// she'u re'u she'u re'u/ tra ma ru sha sha dza dza/ ma ling ling b+h+yo b+h+yo/ tri byi ri shig rag sha kyeng geng/ e ra b+ha ri/ badzra b+ha

sha ba la/ to ri ta sha 'dus 'dus b+h+yo/ zhes gsungs so// snying zor nag po'i rgyud las/ ser ba dang ltas ngan dbab pa'i skabs te dgu pa'o//// snying zor nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// de ltar bal mo'i
rgyun sngags 'di// bu dang rgyal po ma gtogs pa// gzhan la byin ri na ra skan// mnga' bdag sras kyis btsas su zhog/ so phag shi thaM//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya maM ha g+hu ya so

ri ge tu tsakra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ srog gzer nag po ging gi spu gri 'khrul 'khor nag po'i rgyud las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

'das 'jigs byed chen po nyid/ drag po tsham rngam rab 'bar ba rdo rje'i ging ka ra'i tshogs dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ badzra sa du ma ya/ zhes bsgrags pas/ rdo rje ging chen rngam

pa'i tshogs rnams 'dus te/ dpa' bo chen po'i 'khor du nye bar 'khod do// badzra sa du ha ra hu thums dza dza/ zhes rngamapar bsgrags pas/ dregs pa can rnams brgyal bar gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi ngo
bo nyid// dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// dbugs dbyung dkyil 'khor rdzogs par 'khod// las kyi rim pa rdzogs mdzad pa// bstan pa bsrung ba'i 'phrin las bskos// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom

ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen pos dbugs dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ 'khor rnams brgyal ba langs par gyur to// de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas ging chen po rdo rje legs pa zhes bya ba

bzhengs nas/ nyid kyi dam srog gi snying po mdongs gsol du phul ba ni/ oM badzra sad+hU sa ma ya/ a tri sems par ra baM srog la dza dza/ badzra sa d+hU ra baM tri du srog la b+h+yo/ badzra sa d+hU tri myags thuM thuM

ril/ dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya rbad/ badzra sa d+hU tri/ yaM khaM rag sha snying phyung/ rtsal duM ri li srog gzir rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la stam pa ya nan/ badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya na rag tsit+ta nan/ bod rbadagasad dang gzir

gnan pa'i// dam tshig srog gi snying po phul// rdo rje 'chang gis byin gyis brlob// ces gsungs so// rdo rje 'chang gi mdun na bzhugs so// srog gzer nag po ging gi spu gri'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste
dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po de/ mgon po yongs kyi ded dpon chen po rdo rje legs pas myur du mngags pa 'di gsungs so// ri mtho sa gtsang dben gnas su// maN+Dal gru

bzhi mnyam po la// dri spos tsa ra'i khrag gis byug/ dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma ste// shar du ging chen rten gzugs so// sku mdog sngon po 'jigs pa'i zhal// g.yas su rdo rje rtse dgu thogs// g.yon pa tsit+ta
'bar pa thogs// chibs su seng ge dkar po chibs// na bza' za 'og sngo bkra la// le brgan 'bar ba'i cha ga can// dbu la stag gi thod gdeng can// legs par bris pa rten du gzugs// tsa ra'i dbang po

shun pa rten// 'bru sna lnga yi phud dang sha khrag bsgram// bshos pu khru gang rten du gsal// mda' dang dar sna rten du gsal// mda' dang dar sna rten du gzugs// stag dang bya rgod za 'og gzugs// tsa ra kha skya'i

tsit+ta yang// yun gyi rtar gzung dmod bor ro// bla rdo pha wang long bu la// snying po 'bru gnyis bod pas bskor// 'ug skong bcug la srog kyang gzung// bdag nyid stong nyid snying rje las// ya man ta kar gsal

bsgoms la// sku yi 'phreng ba 'bum phrag bzlas// de nas las kyi snying po yis// rtags rnams ma byung bar du bzlas// 'od dang me ri gnas khang 'tsheg/ mi shar rta pa zhang blon dang// ban d+he btsun pa ma byung

bar// bod pa srog gi snying po bgrang// drag tu las la sbyar ba'i tshe// drag po'i sa la 'brub khung brtsigs/ kha khyer drag po'i rtsang gis bskor// rgyu rkyen drug la brnag pa'i gzugs// mig dang snying po rdzogs

par dgod// gcan gzan ngar ma'i thod par brub// rgya shog gro ga de dag la// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha bri bar bya// mu khyud rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su drag po dbang sdud bca'// 'khrul mig bzhi gnyis bzhi
bzhi mdzes// yang rim rtsibs chen bcu drug ldan// dbus su 'khrul mig bcu drug ldan// drag po'i yi ge bcu drug bri// phyi rim gzir bas bcu drug mdzes// mtha' ma rbad pa a mu ka/ gsad pa 'bru lnga
gzhan pa bzhi// rdzogs pa kha sbyar rtsang gis bskor// 'brub khung thod rtsang kha la bca'// dri bsnol rme po'i khrag dang dug/ gzugs la brab cing rten dang bral// rbad pa'i sngags kyis shes pa
bkug/ gzugs la phab la rten dang dbye// skabs su phur gdab mda' yis brdeg/ 'bru gsum khrag la bsngags de bsnun// drag tu bskul zhing dmod pa bor// zor dang sbyar la zhag dgur mngag/ mtha'
ru thod chen 'khor lo gzhug/ lha khang mgon po'i 'og tu gnan// las 'di brnag pa kun gyi mchog/ ces gsungs so// srog gzer nag po ging chen gsang ba'i rgyud las/ las la mngags pa'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcomaldan 'das kyis/ las ma grub na ging chen shi sa bstan pa ar la gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gal te las 'gyangs don med na// 'khrul 'khor gong bzhin shes byas la// rdo rje

gsang ba'i lte bar brub// 'khor lo bar snang rtsang gis bskor// las kyi shan pa mngag cing rbad// gshin rje gshed kyi skur bsgoms la// srog gi 'khor lo rnal log sdebs// oM badzra sa d+hu tri myags tsit+ta thuM

ril/ dgra bo srog la ma ra ya rbad/ badzra sa d+hUM tri yaM khaM rag+sha snying phyung la thums/ srog la gzer rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya rbad/ e thum ril tsit+ta thum ril myags tri sa d+hU badzra mA ra yas/ dgra bo'i srog la

ma ra ya rbad/ gzir srog thums rtsa snying phyung/ rag+sha khaM yaM tril sa tu badzra mA ra ya/ dgra bo srog la rbad/ drag sngags rnams bzlog brgya bar bsnol// stong stong grangs them brgya bar du// gsang sngags grong khyer
sbrel bya ba// thod pa'i sngags dang rbad gsad dang// gzir zhing gnas pa'i sngags kyang bzlas// zhag gsum lam lnga bdun dag tu// gsang sngags 'khor lo nyin mtshan bskor// jag dang bshas byed 'gor
lings byed// bla shing gcad dang dmag chen 'dren// shes pa gsal la tshig pa rngam// de ltar byung na las byas pas// dgra rtags byung nas gtang rag gtang// drag po rnal ldog gsad pa 'di// las rnams ma

grub spogs pa ste// ya ba ga sha ya/ zhes gsungs so// gal te las de ma grub na// gnad gyi yi ge grong khyer dkrug/ rtag tu tsa log rang la 'khru ba na// bla rdo mal gyi 'og tu gzhug/ bzlog dkrug nag po'i
sbyor ba bshad// gzhan pas las kyis stobs zhan na// dur khrod gdug pa'i ro ras la// ging chen lto bar 'khor lo bris// mu khyud rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum dbang la lta// mu khyud bod rbad
sngags kyis bskor// phyi rol 'khor lo bcu drug rtsibs// phyi nang rtse bsdebs drag po'i so// gsad cing gzer ba'i 'bru yis dgang// 'khor lo bris la thod par gzhug/ zhag gsum rngam par gsang sngags
bzlas// rnal ma log dang lto dkrugs kyis// las rnams rdzogs dang 'khor lo gnan// gsang ba'i gsang bcud snying po'i don// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags de nyid phye nas

gsungs so// e badzra sa d+hU sa ma ya/ a tri sems pa ra baM/ srog la dza dza/ badzra sa d+hU ra paM tri tu ni srog la b+h+yo/ badzra sa d+hU tri myags thums ril/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ badzra sa d+hU tri yaM khaM rag+sha snying phyung/

rtsa la thum srog la gzir rbad/ zhag dgu rnal ma'i las su bshad// las sbyor rdzogs nas rtags med na// ma grub las la spogs par bya// dza dza la srog baM ra sems tri a ya ma sa tu sa badzra oM/ e la srog ni

du tri baM ra du sa badzra b+h+yo/ ril thum ti tsi myogs/ tri tu sa badzra ya ra ma la srog dgra bo rbad/ gzir srog thums rtsal phyung/ snying sha rag kha ma ya tri du ya badzra rbad/ ya ma ra la srog la dgra bo rbad/ las byed
'gu na gzir ba de// bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes su 'dod// zhag grangs gsum la tshad med de// srog gzer nag po'i las su bshad// des kyang ma grub lto dkrugs pas// 'byung ba'i lto dkrugs snying khrag

'dzag/ e sa ma ya baM badzra sa d+hU srog la dza dza/ pi tri du ni srog la b+h+yo/ tri myags tsit+ta badzra sa d+hU thum ril mA ra ya dgra bo'i srog la rbad/ tri yaM khaM rag+sha badzra sa d+hU snying phyung/ rtsa la thum srog la gzir rbad/ ma ra ya
dgra bo'i srog la rbad/ stobs kyi gsang sngags dkrugs pa ste// skyes bu gnad la dbab par 'gro// 'di ni ya bag sha ra ste// gsang ba'i las su shes par bya// sngags bzlas dus drug dag tu yang// sngags

kyi char dbab spyir rgyug ste// grong khyer dkrug pa sngags 'di'o// e badzra sa d+hU ra baM/ srog la 'ur ba 'ur ba rbad/ tri mrag srog la snying khrag sbur ya rbad/ sa du snying phyung 'ur ba srog la rbad/ sa du 'ur ba snying

khrag tsit+ta 'ur ba snying la rbad// snying khrag tur log baM tri snying la 'ur/ tsa la myags/ srog la bring shig ma ra ya rbad/ sngags kyi grong khyer ces bya ba// skabs su brab pa'i sngags su bshad// srog gzer nag po
ging gi spu gri'i rgyud las/ skyes mchog nye bar bkol ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo tog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten lha 'dre 'khrugs nas su// rabs

chad gri rgod thod pa ru// yul srungs bzlog mkhan ming rus brub/ khrag sna dug sna 'bru sna dang// sngo sna sbyar ba'i ri lu bya// gtor ma gsang bshos rje la btab// rgya shugs tsan dan spos sregs la// drag

sngags sbyor ba rdzogs par bstim// nam mkha'i sprin dang du ba 'ja'// 'brug dang tshub ma khu rlangs 'thibs// g.yul 'gyed dmag 'dren rtsi thog nyams// mtshan rtags byung nas dam bskang bya// 'bum phrag
gcig tu dril te brdeg/ rta ma tha chung yul du bskyal/ khri bcu bcun zhing drag tu brab// ma phebs sbyor ba stobs zhan na// gnad kyi drag sngags dril la brdeg khrag dang dug chus phur pas

gdab// stobs drag po yi nga rgyal gyis/ khang pa gsum gyi sa yis brab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo tog gzhom pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM badzra sa d+hU sa ma ya hril hril/ baM hUM dza dza/ badzra sa d+hU sa

ma yA/ hril hril/ phroM phroM/ ma ti phroM/ badzra rag mo khroM/ badzra si gri khroM/ badzra sa d+hU sa ma ya hril sha ra phroM b+h+yo/ tri tu ya nan/ hril shar nA ga ti ling nan/ tri ya nA ga gzir phob/ sum 'bum bdun khrag 'phangs pa'i
rting// gzir ba khri phrag gsum la rdzogs// lo 'bras rtsi thog 'joms par byed// srog gzer nag po'i ging gi spu gri'i rgyud las lo tog gzhom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/

rdo rje ging ka ra'i tshogs la rgyud 'di gtad do// rdo rje snying po khro bo che// 'jig rten dregs pa rdzu 'phrul can// myur mgyogs srog gcod shan pa ging// srog bdag kun gyi sgrol ging gtso// nye bar bsdus pas

snying po'i bcud// sangs rgyas thugs rjes byin brlabs pa// dug rgod skyin thang so ri ma// skam la gyong ba skyin thang chu// rab tu rno byed mtshon cha 'di// shan pa gsod byed rnams kyis gsungs// sngon du gshin

rje gshed bsgoms shing// sku yi 'phreng ba rdzogs pa dang// bod pa srog gi snying po la// rtags rnams ma byung bar du bzlas// rtags byung las kyi ra ba de// de nas shan pa sngon du bod pa'i tshe// maN+Dal bshams

la rten pa'i rdzas// tsa ka li dang rgyal mtshan rnams// rten gyi rdzas su bsag par bya// bla rdo snying po 'ug sgong bcas// srog bcu'i rdzas su bcang bar bya// tsa ra'i dbang po tsit+ta rnams// srog gi rta ru gzud par

bya/ kham rgya tsa ra rten du bca'// gsad po'i 'khor lo dgod par bya// las rdzogs rtags rnams ma byung na// spogs pa'i cho ga yang dag bshad// drag po rnal log bsnol ma 'am// yang na rtsa ba song sdebs

pa'i// rnal dang bzlog dang lto dkrug sdeb// las kyi bsgyur kha srang ba'i gso// spu gri skyin thang dbab par bya// las kyis gang dang gang grub kyang// tsa ra khams rgyas bskang bar bya// ging chen sum brgya drug cu

yis// ded dpon rdo rje legs pa ste// gsang bdag chen po khros pa yis// dug gi spu gri gsang rgyud 'di// rdo rje khro tshogs rnams kyis bsrungs// rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyi don phyir ru// ma 'ongs dus su
dra byed pa'i// 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ste// mngon par rab tu bstod pa'o// srog gzer nag po ging gi spu gri'i rgyud las/ 'khor la gtad cing yi rang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// srog gzer nag po
gsang ba ging gi spu gri 'khrul 'khor nag po'i rgyud/ o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis khri srong lde btsan la brgyud pa'o// rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ mri ga shrI sna tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ spu gri nag po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

'das rgya mtsho chen po'i gnas klu rnams kyi pho brang na 'khor rigs lnga'i 'khor dang/ las kyi sprul pa'i khyung dang/ sprul pa'i khyung la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe klu'i
rgyal po gtsug na me 'bar zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas ni dur khrod chen po'i gnas lags so// bdag cag klu'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams ni khyung
rnams kyis sgra grags pa tsam gyis thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur ro// klu rnams kyi gnas zhig par 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas gzhan du bskyod 'tshal zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po nyon cig khyod kyi 'khor rnams ni rigs ngan pa byol song gi rigs yin pas/ sngon yang las ngan pa dang da ltar nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar
'gyur bas/ las ngan pa 'di dag zad par bya ba'i phyir na/ rigs lnga'i khyung la sogs pa rnams ni gnas 'di nyid du gnas pa las gzhan du gnas par mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyi 'khor 'di rnams ni sems can

rnams la 'das pa dang/ da lta dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ gsum du 'tshe bas na ngan song las thar par mi 'gyur bas/ klu'i rgyal po khyod nyid yang byang chub mchog tu semasaskyed cig de bas ni klu 'jig rten 'di

ma stongs kyi bar du khyung gi tshogs 'di bdag gzhan du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel nas thams cad brgyal bar gyur to// de'i tshe

khyung gi tshogs rnams kyis rigs ngan pa de dag thams cad bsgral nas de dag gi sha khrag rnams yang khyung gi tshogs kyis gtod cing za bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po gtsug na me 'bar brgyal ba sangs
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag klu chen po brgyad po 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na las ngan pa'i dbang gis klu'i rigs su gnas pas dus 'di nas
byang chub tu sems skyed la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor du 'du'o// bka' gnyan no// thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol/ skye ba phyi ma la theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par bgyi'o// bdag cag ltar 'khor yang
bgyid do// zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chu'i dug dang/ sa'i dug dang/ me'i dug dang/ rlung gi dug dang/ nam

mkha'i dug dang med par byas so// de bzhin du klu bram ze'i rigs dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'i rigs dang/ gdol pa'i rigs dang rnams yang zhi bar byas so// de'i dus su thugs kha nas khyung gi tshogs rdo
rje'i rigs dang rin po che'i rigs dang/ pad+ma'i rigs dang/ las kyi rigs dang/ de bzhin gshigs pa'i rigs rnams yang spros te phyis 'dul ba'i gnyen por spros so// de bzhin du de rnams kyis snying po
yang thugs ka nas spros/ de ltar gdug pa can thams cad btul nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag rnams gso ba'i don du/ byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i sems kyis thugs ka nas 'od zer dkar

po shel lta bu spros nas thams cad brgyal ba sangs par byas so// gdug pa can thams cad brgyal ba sangs nas mgrin gcig tu bstod nas srog gi snying po rnams phul ba ni/ nA ga rA dza/ sa kra rA dza/ pu ma rA

dza/ zhes phul lo// dus de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa can de rnams kyi srog gi snying po la las ka lnga'i sham bu btags nas/ phyis dam las log na rang srog bdud du phab pa ni/ aM g+hu sha dza dza/ mA

ra ya phaT phaT/ dz+wa la raM raM/ laM nan staM pa nan/ sa ma ya dza dza/ zhes re re'i srog snying la btags na las ka lnga lnga yod par bstan to// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas y
ang gnod sbyinalag na rdo rje yis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad zhus pa/ bsnyen dang bsgrub pa las sbyor dang// rtags kyi rim pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje nyon// nye bar bkod nas legs par bris pa legs so// bsnyen pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// gser mig khyung nag me dbul lo// sgrub pa'i las yang de dang

'dra// las sbyor rnam pa lnga yin te// bsreg dang gnan dang 'phang ba dang// de bzhin thun gyi las dang ni// phur ba'i las su bshad pa'o// ltas kyi rim pa bzang ngan gnyis// yang lag na rdo rjes zhus pa/
gser mig bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dang po stong nyid byang chub sems// de nyid ngang las rig pa khrom// de las baM 'phros rgya mtsho chen// rin chen rdo ba sngon pos

mtshan// de steng 'dab brgyad ge sar ldan// gdug pa sbrul gnyis mdzes par ldan// de steng khroM las ga ru Da// spro bsdu tshul gyis bskyed pa ni// gser gyi lus la g.yu yi gshog/ mchu dang sder mo lcags las
grub// ra dang mig gnyis g.yu gser ldan// spyan drang mchod bstod la sogs bya// yang lag na rdo rjes zhu sa pa/ khyung nag sgrub pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dang

po stong pa'i ngang las ni// paM las 'dab brgyad ge sar ldan// a las zla ba ge sar stengs// de steng naM las sbrul gnyis bskyed// de steng khroM las ga ru Da// lus po gser la gshog pa g.yu// mchu sder lcags
las grub pa'o// phyag na dkar nag sbrul gnyis za// dbu la rin chen rnam lngas brgyan// spyan drang la sogs rdzogs par bya// yang lag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ me dbal bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan

'das kyis gsungs pa/ gru gsum bzhi ldan dbus su ni// hUM las phyag na rdo rje ni// sku che yan lag rags pa la// phyag gnyis sdigs mdzub rdo rje 'dzin// sku ni ljang khu chen po la// rigs bzhi sbrul gyis rnam

par brgyan// gru gsum gsum la khyung chen gsum// dran rdzogs tshul gyis bskyed pa ni// gshog pa gser la sku mdog nag/ sder mo zangs su gnas pa'o// bsnyen bsgrub khyad ni sngags dang ting 'dzin no// spu
gri nag po'i rgyud las/ bsnyen bsgrub rtsa ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bsnyen bsgrub gsang sngags ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ha pa oM sa khri/ gser mig bsnyen pa'i sngags yin te// rtse gcig dag gis bzlas gyur na// 'bum tsho gcig gis rtags rnams 'byung// 'bum tsho

gnyis na las rnams 'grub// pa khri oM swA hA/ rdo rje rigs kyi sngags so// sa pa oM khri hrA/ las kyi rigs kyi sngags so/ khri pa oM swA hA/ rin chen rigs kyi sngags so// oM pa khri swA hA/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi sngags

so// ha pa oM sa khri/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sngags so// grang zhing rlan pa chu yi dug/ lci zhing 'thibs pa sa yi dug/ tsha la za ba me yi dug/ yang la g.yo ba rlung gi dug/ sna tshogs snang ba 'dus pa'i
dug/ dug ngos bzung la nad rnams dbyung// dug ngos gnyis pa'i dus su bzung// yi ge kha dog dbyibs dang ni// gnyen pa dang ni phyag rgya yis// gdug pa'i nad rnams dbyung ba'o// dug dbyung sngags ni

bdun la rdegs// oM rA tha ma hA ga ru ra khyung rbad hur hur b+h+yo/ dug sngags so// oM ta ki tsa te hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ pu ru te pu ru te swA hA/ khyung klu la rbad pa'i sngags so// oM A hUM/ sngags gnyis ldan no// oM

d+hu pe A hUM/ puSh+pe/ a lo ke gan d+he/ ni pe te/ mchod pa'i sngags so// ma hA ga ru Da b+ha li ta pU tsa khA hi khA hi swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bstod dang bskul ba ji ltar
lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// hUM/ mkha' lding rgyal po tshangs pa'i bya// 'dab chags rgyal po ku ru na// ri rab rtse la gnas shing dpag bsam shing la bzhugs// rdo rje
sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes gser kyis sku la g.yu yi gshog pa can// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu sder can// yas kyi mche bas ya bdud zil gyis gnon// mas kyi mche bas ma bdud zil gyis

gnon// gdug pa khros pa'i sku la bstod// klu rgyal gdug pa'i spy-i nas 'dren cing tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon// lag kyi sder mos ri rab rtse nas bsnyil// gshog pa brdabs pas rgya mtsho phyag mas

'debs/ khro gtum nga rgyal can la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas rigs bzhi yum dang gnyis med ngang la sbyor/ nga rgyal khro gtum che bas klu rgyal spyi nas 'dren// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan
pas rigs bzhi dbang du sdud// gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyung la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyan rtsa rig rig sa bdag gzan du tshol// rkan sgra tog tog klu gnyan phyag mas 'debs// bdud dang srin po ma rungs

'dul mdzad pa/ khyung chen 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM/ khyung chen sprul pa 'jigs pa'i sku// ze bas ya bdud zil gyis gnon// spyan ni nyi ma'i zer bas rno// mchu ni rgya zor khug pa 'dra// sa
bdag klu gnyan snying nas 'dren// sprul pa'i khyung rnams thog pas drag/ yang sprul khyung ni char ltar bab// gshog pa g.yas pas ri rab rtse nas bsnyil// gshog pa g.yon pas rgya mtsho phyag mas
'debs// gdug pa'i klu rnams dbang du sdud// dgung la thog thog ser chen 'bebs/ khyung chen sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku// skad ni bar snang 'brug bas che// bang ni bar snang glog bas mgyogs// gdug pa'i

tshogs rnams ma lus dbang du sdud// dbang sdud chen po las la ya/ khyung gi tshogs rnams gzan la 'du// bka' la la 'ding la la 'phyo// la la klu gnyan grong khyer 'khrol// la la klu bran zas su za/ khyung gi
rgyal po las la 'du/ khyung gi rgyal po las la ya// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ gser mig 'khyil ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ klu yi rigs rnams
ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu yi rigs ni bzhi yin te/ dbyings kyi klu bzhi ni bde ba can gyi ngang na gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i klu

bzhi ni 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi gnas na gnas/ sprul pa'i klu bzhi ni ri rab kyi zom la gnas/ 'jig rten pa'i klu bzhi ni 'dzam bu'i gling na rten gang gnas pa na gnas so// yang zhus pa/ de bzhi'i
don ji ltar lags/ zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la/ dbyings kyi klu bzhi ni don chos nyid kyi sprul pa rig pa'i rtsal ma 'gags pa/ phyogs dang rgya gang du yang ma chad pa/ tshig

dang yi ge las 'das pa/ dpe dang kha dog las 'das pa/ rgyu dang rkyain las 'das pa/ kun gyi spyod yul min pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i klu bzhi ni rgyal ba rigs lnga ngo bo ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing na
gnas so// sprul pa'i klu bzhi ni ri rab kyi phyogs bzhi na klu chen bzhi gnas te/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ bram ze'i rigs rnams gnas te/ de re re la yang bzhi bzhis bskor

nas so// 'jig rten pa'i klu rnams ni ma mo dang/ bdud dang/ btsan dang/ mtsho sman dang/ sa srin dang/ klu srin dang/ dam sri dang/ rgyal po la sogs pa rnams ni/ sprul pa'i klu bzhi'i 'khor na khyab par

gnas te/ rang rang gtso bo'i cha 'dzin par gnas so// yang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ 'khor gyi ltas rnams ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ mon dang btsun chen a tsa ra/ khyi dang

spre'u byi la dang// bu chung 'od dang bsgrub khang 'tsheg/ snying mi dga' la 'gro snying 'dod// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// de bzhin rogs mo mdza' mo dang/ khyi dang sgo nga mtsho dang ni// bud med nag mo ral pa

can// rta pa skyes pa chas bzang dang// brag mar chu mar ri dgas dang// sdom dang sdigapa nya sbal dang// sbrul dang kha brgyad ba lang dang// mtsho dang rta bong ra lug rnams// bram zed dmangs rigs rje rigs
dang// rgyal rigs 'khor gyi sprul pa ste// de rnams rul dang skams pa dang// thub cing rmi na bzang ba yin// za dang 'ded la sogs pa rnams// ngan pa'i rtags su bstan pa'o// spu gri nag po'i rgyud
las// klu'i rigs dbye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rje zhus pa/ gsang sngags rten 'brel ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa// bu ram gla rtsi rtsi bo che// lto ru btang ba'i sman du bstan// spos dang gla rtsi ti rtsa gsum/ khrus kyis bya ba'i sman du bstan// gla rtsi shing shun gu gul tshil chen dang// shel tsha du ba sgog skya

dang// de rnams byug pa'i sman du bstan// gu gul sgog skya rtsi bo che// de bzhin khyi lud mkhan pa rnams// de ni gdug pa'i sman du bstan// phag cha'i khyi lud mu zi dang// de bzhin dri chen nya mkhris rnams// de

yang byug pa'i sman du bstan// tsan dug gu gul mu zi dang// sbrang rgod g.yer shing dri chen dang// sha chen gla rtsi dri chu dang// de bzhin khyi lud mkhan pa rnams// gdug pa'i sman du de yang bstan// dus drug dag

tu phye la bsrung// bya nu sgog skya rgya tshwa dang// de bzhin chang dang sgo nga yis// stod kyi chu ser 'dren pa'i sman/ khyi lud mkhan pa ra dug dang// de bzhin dri chu sbyar ba yis// smad kyi chu ser 'dren pa'i
sman// 'thug srab dag ni ko ba tsam// dar ram ras kyis bcings shing bsdam// ba bla ldong ros mu zi dang// mar dkar 'o ma'i spris ma ni// sha ro dbyung ba'i sman du shis// mtha' ma bcu yis brtsogs la

dbyung/ khyi lce gro chang dag gis ni// glang shu 'dra ba dag gi sman// gtso dang yongs su sbyar ba ni// tsha 'brum dag gi sman du bstan// btsan dug re lcags ra dug ni// sha bkra dag gi sman du bstan// yang na gu

gul phag tshil lo// ra dug pa dang ra mo shags// de bzhin shug pa tsher ma can// tsher ma zug pa 'dra ba'i sman// gang zhig snying cig mi dga' na// mi tshil snying khar bsku ba'o// 'dod chags 'dod par gyur pa

na// btsan dug mu zi lo mar dang// bsres la rdo rje dag la bsku// ba glang 'gram pa'i rkang mar dang// phag tshil lo lon bsres pa ni// skra dang smin ma byi na bsku// rta shel mig 'bras dag gis ni// so rtsi shor

ba sos par 'gyur// phug ron sgo nga'i ser po dang// bya sar sgo nga'i ser po dang// mig sman rgya mtsho gang yin pa// de rnams mig gi sman du bstan// gser g.yu dung dang man shel dang// byu ru rnams ni mig

med pa// bsrung ba'i mchog tu de yang bstan// yang na gla rtsi btsan dug dang// gu gul mu zi ba bla dang// ra dug pa dang dri chen ni// bsrung ba'i mchog tu de yang 'gyur// yang na tshon skud sna lnga la// rigs lnga'i

khyung du byin rlabs la// mdud pa re la lha re bskyed// mdud pa lha yi grangs dang sbyar// rab gnas mchod pa tshul bzhin bya// de yang bsrung ba'i dam pa yin// btsan dug gla rtsi gu gul dang// sgog skya shing khun

ba bla dang// ldong ros mu zi ti tsa dang// bur tsi cong zi 'brug rus dang// rma bya'i sha dang mkhris pa sgro// 'bras dang sran ma bra bo dang// nyungs kar nyungs nag skye tshe dang// mi rus rta rus bong bu'i rus pa dang/

khyi rus de bzhin mdze po'i rus pa dang// nya mkhris mi mkhris ba glang mkhris pa dang// de bzhin ra lug mkhris pa dang// dom gyi mkhris pa de bzhin no// ra dug lug dug spyang dug dang// de bzhin bong dug re

lcag pa// spyang tsher ba dang ra mo shags/ khyi lce srubs ka dbyi mo dang// spru ma mkhan pa shug pa tsher ma can// skyi ba'i 'bras bu lcam pa'i 'bras bu dang// de bzhin g.yer shing 'bras bu dang// spyang khu'i brun

dang khyi lud dang// dri chen dri chu byang sems dkar dmar dang// phag tshil mi tshil mar nag dang// pho rog sha dang sha chen dang// mar dkar bya pho'i ngar sgong dang// de bzhin ri bong ril ma dang// du ba sbyin
sreg thal ba dang// de bzhin sbal mig byar nus te// de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni// lus la bcangs sam bskus gyur na// gdon dang chu ser la sogs nad// skad cig tsam yang gnas mi

'gyur// dper na nyi ma shar ba la// mun pa'i rang bzhin mi gnas ltar// gang yang gnas par mi 'gyur ro// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ rdzas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rje zhus pa/

gsang sngags rdzogs rim ji ltar lags// bcom ldan kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying khar lte ba gsang ba'i gnas// de bzhin spyi gtsug 'khor lo ste// hUM dang a dang oM

dang haM// 'khor lo bzhi ni rim pas gnas// yang na 'byung bzhi'i yi ge gnas// tsa yi gnas rnams 'di ltar te// drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba na// snying kha mgrin la brgyad dang bcu drug go/ bde ba chen po sum cu
gnyis// yaM las rlung la raM las me// me rlung gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams bsregs pa ste// lus rnams bde bas rgyas par bsgom// yang ni klu ni gang gnod kyi// dug ni ngos ni zin pa

la// dmigs te de la me lce bsreg/ nad kyi rnam pa thams cad bsreg/ yang na 'khor lo bzhi la yang// rang rang snying po gang gnas par// rigs bzhi'i khyung ni bsgom la yang// rim gyis spyi gtsug lte ba'i

bar// rim pas bzhu btul byas la bsgom// spyi gtsug rin chen khyung de yang// me rlung ba de bsregs pas// 'od kyi de yi khyung mchod nas// rin chen khyung gi dmigs med bsgom// 'khor lo gzhan yang de dang
'dra// thun mtshams dag tu rdzogs rim bsgom// yang na lta ba'i don la gzhag/ sngags dang lha ru bcas pa yis// skad cig yengs par mi bya'o// gang zhig lha 'am man ngag la// som nyi zos na sgrub thag

ring// de bzhin bar chod sna tshogs 'ong// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ rdzogs rim gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rje zhus pa/ rigs lnga rtsa ba'i sgrub pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po byams dang snying rje bsgom// de nas stong nyid byang chub sems// rig pa khroM gyi ngo bo las// b+h+ruM 'phros gzhal yas rang bzhin te// sgo

bzhi ka ba brgyad dang ldan// dra ba dra phyed rgyal mtshan mdzes// nang du paM las pad+ma bskyed// 'dab bzhi lte bar ldan pa la// ma dang a las nyi zla'i steng// nam bzhi las ni sbrul bzhi'i gdan// gzhal yas rin

chen lnga las grub// rdo rje khyung chen 'jigs pa'i sku// sku mdog dkar la mchu gshog sngo// mig dang sder mo gser las grub// lus rnams rdo rjes gtams pa ste// shar phyogs klu gnyan steng du bskyed// rin
chen khyung ni sku mdog ser// mchu dang gshog pa rdo las grub// mig dang sder mo byu ru'i mdog/ lus ni rin chen spungs pas brgyan// de bzhin lho phyogs klu gnyan te// pad+ma'i khyung chen 'jigs

pa'i sku// sku mdog byu ru'i mdog ltar dmar// mig dang sder mo gser las grub// mchu dang gshog pa g.yu las grub// lus ni mdzes pa'i pad+mas brgyan// nub phyogs klu gnyan steng du bsgom// las kyi khyung
chen sku mdog sngo// mchu dang gshog pa gser las grub// mig dang sder mo zangs las so// lus la ral gri 'bar bas brgyan// byang phyogs klu yi steng du bskyed// bde gshegs khyung chen sku mdog

mthing// mchu dang gshog pa de bzhin no// mig dang sder mo gser las grub// lus po rdo rje rgya gram 'bar bas gtams// lte bar klu brgyad steng du bskyed// sku bskyed sngags dang bzlas pa'i sngags// rim pa

bzhin du bstan pa yang// ha pa au swa khri pa khri oM swA hA/ khri pa oM swA hA/ oM khri swA hA/ swa pa oM khri ta/ gtso bo'i sngags ni bsnyen sngags la// 'khor rnams kyis bsgrub pa ste// nad ngos zung la so sor

bzlas// ngos ma zin na dril te bzlas// rbad sngags dag kyang dril ba'o// sku bskyed thugs kha'i khroM las yang// 'od 'phros spyan drang mchod bstod bya// de nas gnyis med bstim pa dang// dza hUM baM hos phyag rgya

bcas// 'khor lo pad+ma zla ba la// oM dang a dang khroM rnams so// rbad pa'i ting 'dzin 'di lta ste// gang gnod pa yi dug la yang// gnyen po gang yin khyung rbad tshe// sngags ni mda' yi rang bzhin la// ting

'dzin gzhu yi ngo bo ste// dug ni 'phen pa'i tshul du bsam// gnyen po'i ting 'dzin mchod pa la// sgrub pa ting 'dzin dbang du bsdu// las sbyor ting 'dzin gsod par byed// ra dza sri dza khyung rbad hur hur b+h+yo b+h+yo/

dug dbyung ba'i sngags so// sgrub pas dug rnams phyin pas na// gnyen po gang yin sngags la ni// gsang sngags 'di rnams sbrel la gdags// nA ga rA dza mA ra ya phaT/ phu me rA dza ma ra ya phaT/ sakra rA dza ma ra

ya phaT/ hUM/ bcom ldan rdo rje'i khyung chen ni// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar// lus la rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// 'jigs byed khro bo'i sku la bstod// bcom ldan rin chen khyung chen yang// sku mdog ser

la 'jigs pa'i sku// sku la rin chen 'bar bas brgya?n/ khyung chen drag po'i sku la bstod// bcom ldan pad+ma'i khyung chen ni// sku mchog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// sku la pad+ma 'bar bas brgyan/ khyung chen
'jigs pa'i sku la bstod// bcom ldan las kyi khyung chen ni// sku mdog ljang nag chen po ste// sku la ral gri 'bar bas brgyan// gdug pa 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan bde gshegs khyung chen
ni// sku mdog mthing nag chen po ste// sku la rdo rje rgya gram gtams/ khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// dad ldan brtson 'grus che na 'grub// snying rje byams sems ldan na

'grub// som nyi le lo med na 'grub// dbang dang man ngag rdzogs na 'grub// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ rigs snga'i rtsa ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ khyung nag bsgrub pa

ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa las sbyor te// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste// oM badzra ba ti ga ru Da hUM dza rA dza sri tsa
hUM phaT/ bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin gnyis yin te// bdag gzhan gnyis su phye la bzlas// 'bum tsho gcig gis nang rtags 'ong// de bzhin gnyis na yid ches skye// 'bum tsho gsum na las rnams 'grub// rtse

gcig ting 'dzin ldan pas bzlas// som nyi le lo spangs na 'grub// gru gsum drag po'i sol bas byug/ tsher ma can gyi shing bu la// yugs sa mo yi skra yis bsdam// de la drag po'i hoM byas la// nA ga ra dza

sarba dz+wa la raM/ pu ma ra dza sarba dz+wa la raM/ pu ne ra dza sarba dz+wa la raM/ sa kra rA dza sarba dz+wa la raM/ sgrub pa'i sngags la btags la bsregs// nang du khyung bskyed mchod bstod bya/ khrag sna dug sna la sogs dang// nyungs
kar nyungs nag bsregs pa'i rdzas// thal ba rlung la bskur la gtang// yang na gnan pa dag kyang bya// gnod pa'i gzugs sam rmi lam 'ong// 'gugs 'dren byas la thun gyis brab// mi bsad lcags
sam thog lcags la// mtshon du byas la gtub par bya// gdug pa can gyi shing bu la// rtsibs drug ldan pa'i 'khor lo bya// dug chus byugs la 'khor los gtub// dug gi shing ngam drag po'i lcags// bcu
gnyis sor gyi tshad byas la// phur pa dag gis gdab par bya// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa'am// yang na mon thod dag kyang rung// gang gnod pa yi gzugs byas la// dug sna khrag sna yod tshad

blugs// dgug 'dren byas la shes pa bstim// thun gyis brab la gnan pa bya// re bas dril la sngon mar bcing// lha 'dre che ba'i sa ru gnan// yang na gang gnod pa ru sba// a ra dza ma hA ga ru Da khyung rbad

hur hur b+h+yo/ nA ga rA dza sa ka rA kra/ pu ni rA dza/ pu ma ra dza/ ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM badzra tig sna tsakra ga ru Da hUM phaT/ nA ga rA dza tsakra hUM phaT/ sa kra rA dza tsakra hUM phaT/ pu ni rA dza tsakra hUM phaT/ pu ma rA

dza tsakra hUM phaT/ 'khor lo'i sngags so// oM aHhUM hri tri/ ga ru Da na kra sa kra sa pun sum/ rag sha ma ra ya/ kI li kI lA ya hUM phaT/ phur pa'i sngags so// nA ga rA dza laM nan staM pa nan/ sa kra rA dza laM nan staM pa
nan/ pu na rA dza laM nan staM pa nan/ pu ma rA dza laM nan staM pa nan/ ma ra ya nan/ gnan pa'i sngags so// bsnyen pa dag gi don rdzogs nas// bsgrub pa'i rim pa yang de bshad// maN+Dal zlum po gru

gsum la// zla gam gsum dang ldan par bya// byis pa gtsang ma dag gis kyang// mtshar bu 'om bu bal po ze'u gcad// rma bya'i sgro yang zung la dgod// gang gnod gzugs ni 'brub khung nang// thun gyis brab

cing 'gug 'dren bya// sgrub pa'i sngags la sham bu gdags// rbad sngags gsad sngags sham bu'o// dus bzhi dag tu thun gyis brab// oM ta ki tsa ta byi tsa te hUM ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ pu ru te pu ru te swA hA/

sngags kyi rang bzhin sgra rnams la// sgra yi rang bzhin khyung yin no// hUM/ khyung gi rgyal po thugs dam can// shin tu gdungs nas bskul ba'i tshe// sa bdag klu gnyan thams cad la/ khyung gi pho nya char ltar

bab// yang sprul khyung ni thog bas drag hUM/ khyung gi rgyal po thugs dam can// sa bdag klu gnyan thams cad la/ khyung gi rgyal po gzan la 'du// 'jigs pa'i nga ro di ri ri// dam sri phung sri gzan du

tshol// btsal nas thams cad za bar byed// gdug pa ma lus dbang du sdud// sku la rigs bzhi'i sbrul gyis brgyan// gang la bya ba'i snying nas 'dren// bya khyung rgyal po tshangs pa'i bya// gser mdog bya khyung ga

ru ni// gdug pa kun gyi gshed ma ste// dus la bab bo sa ma ya// oM d+hu pa pu tsa me ga sa mun tra s+pha ra na sa ma ye sa ha hUM/ puSh+pe/ d+hu pe/ A lo ke gan+d+he/ ne pe te/ mchod pa'i sngags so// oM a kha ro mu khaM sarba d+harma

naM a d+ya nud pan na twad oM AHhUM swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so// oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs kyi sngags so// dzaHhUM baM ho/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so// hUM/ mkha' lding rgyal po tshangs pa'i bya// gser mdog bya khyung ga
ru ni// gnas ni ri rab rtse la gnas// gser gyi lus la g.yu yi gshog pa can// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu sder can// klu rgyal gdug pa spyi nas 'dren// klu bran rnams ni zas su za// mig ni nyi ma'i zer

bas rno// sa bdag klu gnyan dbang du sdud/ khyung gi rgyal po tshangs pa'i bya// gshog pa g.yas pa brdabs pa yis// gdug pa klu yi gnas rnams 'joms// ri rab rtse nas rgya mtsho'i gting snyeg cing// mjug

mas ri rab rtse nas bsnyil// bya khyung mdzes pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ khyung nag gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes zhus pa// med dbal bsgrub pa ji ltar

lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM nA ga li du duM pa ya/ sa twaM te ku ru hUM hUM dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo/ bsnyen pa'i sngags so// rtse gcig ting 'dzin gsal sgom
na// 'bum tsho gsum gyis las rnams gdon mi za// me chen 'bar dang chu chen 'khrug/ lus la me ni 'bar ba dang// nam mkha' 'od du snang ba dang// sha 'gul sha 'khrig 'khyug pa dang// nya
sbal la sogs bsad pa dang// zos pa la sogs bzang ba yin// gru gsum nyis brtsegs gru bzhi ldan// mthing nag tshon gyis dbus su bri// de bzhin shar dang lho dang nub// dkar dang ser dang dmar ba'i

tshon// rim pa bzhin du bri ba yin// zur gsum la ni khyung gsum ste// dbus su mthu stobs bdag po bskyed// sgru pa'i dus su thugs kar dgod// hUM/ bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// sku ni mi 'gyur mthing nag
la// rigs bzhi klu yis mdzes par brgyan// phyag gnyis rdo rje sdigs mdzub bcas// 'jigs byed khro bo 'bar ba ste// bdud dang srin po ma rungs 'dul/ khyung gi tshogs ni sprul pa 'gyed// 'jigs pa'i nga

ro di ri ri// sngags kyi 'od zer lcibs se lcibs// 'jigs pa'i gad mo ha ha ha// rdo rje gtum po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sgrub pa'i sngags ni phaT kyis bsgyur// gang gnod pa yi gzugs sam ming// byas

la sbyin sreg bya ba yin/ khrag sna dug sna rnyed tshad do// de bzhin nyungs kar nyungs nag dang// sha yi rnam pa rnyed tshad do// tsher ma can gyi shing bu la// drag po hom gyi gzugs byas nas// gang gnod pa yi rten

bzhag la// dmigs pa bcas la 'gug 'dren bya// shes pa bstim la sbyin sreg bya// oM nA ga rA dza dud ling pa ta raM raM// sgrub pa'i sngags la btags la bsreg/ thal ba chu 'am rlung la bskur// yang na gnan

pa bya bar shis// dpyid zla gsum gyi nya 'am ni// yang na dgun zla tha chungs nya// thod pa mtshan ngan nang du yang// gnod pa'i ming dang rus su bri// drag po'i rdzas kyis thod pa dag/ re bas dril la skud pas

bsdam// gang gnod pa yi sa phyogs sam// gdon ni che ba'i sa ru gnan// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// yang na bcu bzhi dag tu rung// sgrubs te gnan pa bya ba yin// nA ga rA dza mA ra ya nan/ sa kra rA dza

mA ra ya nan/ pu ni rA dza mA ra ya nan/ pu ma rA dza ma ra ya nan/ de yang sgrub pa'i sngags dang sbrel// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ me dbal gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ sems
can rnams la phan gdags pa// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// char ni med pa gyur pa na/ khyung gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs

gsol ba// phyogs bzhi dag tu hom byas la// zhag lnga bar du sgrub pa bya// thun bar dag tu dkar chos bya// sgrub pa thon nas sbyin sreg bya// gdon yod gnas su byas gyur na// las rnams 'grub par the tshom
med// sre'u mi sos gyur pa na/ khyung chen rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sgrub pa dag ni yang yang bya// ma yi rum na gnas tsam na// sgrub pa'i las rnams mang du bya// gnan dang bsreg pa'i las yang
bya// de kyang sos par ma gyur na// gang gnod pa yi ling kha de// rdo rje slob dpon mal 'og gam// yang na chags kyi nang du gzhug/ dus rnams rtag tu ting 'dzin gyis// zhabs kyi 'og na yod par

bsam// des kyang sos par ma gyur na// gang shi ba yi ro de la// sbyin sreg byas la chu la bskur// yang na ri gsum rtse la bskyal// de ltar byas na the tshom med// ser ba dag ni bzlog pa na/ khyung gi sgrub pa zhal

phye la// dkyil 'khor dag gi sa tshon yang// 'ong ba'i mtshams su sbrel la bzhag/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi dag tu yang// phur pa brgyad la khyung brgyad bskyed// 'ong ba lha yi dkyil 'khor du// ting 'dzin dag
gis bskyed pa'o// de bzhin nyungs kar la sogs yang// sngags rnams bzlas la mthong la sba// sprin nam rlung gi sna de la// dmigs la khyung gi drag sngags yang// nyungs kar dag la bzlas la brdeg/ rang
nyid khyung du bsgoms pa yi// gshig pas sprin rnams gtor bar bsam// mdzub ris byas la phu yis gdab// spu gri nag po'i rgyud las/ phan btags pa'i le'u sta bcu pa'o//// spu gri nag po'i rgyud rdzogs
so//// rgyud 'di la sgrub thabs lnga yod do// bu lnga bcu tham pa yod do// thems kyi yi ge dgu yod do// yang thems gcig yod do/ kha byang gsum yang byang gcig yod do// ma bu bdun bcu tham pa yod do/

kha cig bris la gter du sbos// 'di las med do rgyal po nyid// mi bsnan mi dbri chad la lhag mi bya// 'di las yod na rgyal po'i glud du 'gum// shri ri sing hA gsang ba'i rgya// ban chung bdag rang gab pa'i

rgya// mnga' bdag rgyal po sbas pa'i rgya// chos 'di rnyed pa'i mi des kyang// ma bu mi dbral gcig mi bslad// snod rnams brtags la khad dang rim gyis sbyin// mang du mi spel gsang rgya btab cing sbyin// snying
po mi dbyung gdams pa bka' mi gcad// lhug par mi sbyin snod dang sbyar la sbyin// bka' bsrungs dam la ma thogs pa// gzhan la byin na bar chod mang// de bzhin bkra mi shis par 'ong// gtad rgya dag la
nan tan bya// rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ e ru tra man tra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ drag po'i sngags rgod chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rus sbal khro bo'i rtog pa'o// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag

'tshal lo// de nas rdo rje snying po de// rdo rje rnon po ral gri 'bar// rdo rje 'chang la gus btud nas// rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba'i don// rtog pa rmad du 'byung ba'i mchog/ ru sbal rngam pa'i gsang mdzod

nas// thugs rjes rol pa shar pa yis// drag po sngags rdzogs mdzad pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes khyod// 'jig rten 'gro ba mi yul du// dza la dzi la nyam nga ba// me rlung 'khrugs par gyur ba 'di// nad

kyi bdag po gang lags pa// ye shes chen pos bshad par mdzod// rdzogs pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// nub phyogs pho brang rgya mtsho chu// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'bab pa'i// rab tu mi sgrungs klu rnams kyi// ded

dpon klu yi rgyal po pa// pho brang rgya mtsho dang ba na// rin chen ri rab lte ba la// rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal yas khang// phyi nang med par kun tu gsal// dza la dza la'i bdag po ste// kun la bsam ngan mi mdzad

de// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad// dge 'dun chos la dgra byung ngam// bka' yi bstan pa smas pa na// tsi tsi dz+wa la'i nad rnams bdag/ tshor ba med pa'i nad rnams kyang// snying la 'bab par byed pa
yin// de yi phyi rim phyogs bzhi na// rgyal po'i rigs ni sa la dbang// lci dang 'thib pa'i nad kyi bdag/ rje'u rigs gdug pa me la dbang// tsha dang bsreg pa'i nad kyi bdag/ bram ze gdug pa chu la

dbang// grang zhing 'dar ba'i nad kyi bdag/ dmangs kyi rigs ni rlung la dbang// yang zhing g.yo ba'i nad bdag yin// rang rang yid kyi khang pa ste// rin chen gser las grub pa yin// gru bzhi phyi nang kun tu
gsal// de yi phyi rim rtsibs lnga'i klu// nyi shu rtsa lnga rim par gnas// gzhal yas rin chen dgu las grub// de yi phyi rim gnyan chen brgyad// 'khor ni 'bum sder bcas pa gnas// de yi gnas khang g.yu

las grub// de yi phyi rim sa bdag stong// rin chen zangs kyi khang par gnas// de yi phyi rim sa srin dang// sa sen klu sen 'bum sde rnams// lcags las byas pa'i gnas khang na// de yi phyi rim the brang
dang// 'byung ba kun tu myul ba gnas// de yi gnas khang sa las grub// de rnams nyam nga nad kyi bdag po yin// rim pas gdon cing gtso bo'i lag tu gtod// klu rgyal nad kyis zin na 'tsho ba dka'// 'khor

gyi nad ni sna tshogs te// ngos zin pa ni gso bar sla'o// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa dang po'o//// rdo rje rnon pos gsol ba// dza la dzi nyam nga ba// rgyu rkyen gang gis rlong ba yin// yang dag rdzogs pas bka'
stsal pa// rigs dang rang gi thebs las dang// byad kyi gtad khram gnan gzir log/ de yi rkyen gyis nad ldang ba'i// rigs ni za 'am zug pa yin// thabs las klu yi pho brang du// zhe sdang
mtshon dang 'dod chags brtsogs// gti mug thab gzhob byas pa 'am// rtso la rdo shing nyams pa yi// byad kyi gtad khram thebs pa ni/ khram la btab pas gso ba dka'// rang gi gtad khram gnan gzir

log/ brtson 'grus ldan na gso ba sla// nyes pa'i chad pa byung ba na// dang po gzhi mas mi tshor te// the brang 'gong po kun 'khrugs nas// rtags 'debs sa srin la bzlog/ rgyal bran the brang 'gong po dang// sa
srin klu bsen sdongs 'gyur te// sa bdag gnyan dang klu rnams la// rim pas sbran cing kun sdongs nas// gnod pa che zhing nad rnams gtong// rigs bzhi klu yis zin pa'i tshe// mgo dang yan lag rim pa
la// rtags thebs dug gis gzir bar byed// btsan dang klu dang rgyal po dang// bdud la sogs par sdongs nas ni// blo bur nad kyis 'debs pa yod// dbus kyi klu rgyal lag tu gtod// der song de
las thar pa med// ru sbal khra bo las rtog pa gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje rnon pos yang gsol pa// 'gro ba'i lus la gdug pa gsum// gnod pa'i rtags rnams bshad par mdzod// yang dag rdzogs pas
bka' stsal pa// dang po the brang 'gong po yi// 'jig rten khams su gdug pa can// kun la sbran gtong rtags mtshan 'debs// rim pas sa srin klu srin dang// sa bdag gnyan dang rigs lnga'i klu// rigs

bdag gtso la rim pas bstod// dang po gnod pa'i rtags 'byung ste// snying mi dga' la 'gro snying 'dod// snying 'phyo spro thung rgod 'dod lus nyams chung// gnyid che shes pa 'thibs shing stab rnol 'ong// rmi lam
'gyur mang gnod rtags dang po yin// lus sbrid sha gul mig dang sha mdangs 'khyug/ za dang brtse dang sbrid cing 'gyur ldog mang// byad lus kun la sha bkra thor ba'o// rmi lam la sogs ngan te gnyis pa

yin// byad la 'gyur ldog che zhing shes pa rteg/ mtshan mas che thebs mis kyang 'gyur ldog mthong// de rtags gnod pa gsum pa yin// shin tu mdog ngan rkang lag zha grum 'byung// sha khrag lus nas kha mig

gle// dri ma log cing kha sna yo// mchi ma 'chil mi thub cing byad la chu phur 'ong ba ni// gnod pa'i rtags te bzhi pa'o// de nas rigs bzhi'i dug nad de// gar yang rung bas 'debs pa yin// tha ma klu rgyal lag

tu gtod// lus la dri ma mi chags shing// dri ldog rkang lag sor mo 'phrul/ khas ma ngan mi dang brda mi 'phrad// chu phur 'byung zhing rma yang 'ong// so kar mig bzlog gos pa yang// dri ma mi 'chags skya bor
'gro// sna yi ka ba chad pa ni// de las bzlog pa dka' bar bshad// lnga dang bzhi dang gsum pa dang// gnyis pa dang gcig pa'i bar dag tu// sgrims na rims par 'tsho bar bshad// dri rgod lco

dri skya rbab dang// smyo 'bog brgyal dang bla ldog 'byam/ kha lkugs rkang lag zha ba dang// rmal nad yam nad gag nad dang// blo bur nad rnams sna tshogs ni// sdongs bzlas stong zhing nyen slong ba'o// ru sbal khra
bo'i rtog pa las le'u gsum pa'o//// rdo rje rnon pos yang gsol pa// zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gdug pa gsum po'i nad dang dug/ 'jug sa nges pa'i

tshad mas bstan// zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// phyi rol lus tshul zhan pa dang// nang gi lus stobs chung ba dang// lus rngul mdog ngan sha lus skem// rdzi skor stong tsher 'ong ba dang// 'khru 'byam sha blo skya

rbab 'ong ba dang// nyam chung bcud 'jig 'dod chags 'chor// dbang po mi ldang mtshan ma 'drul// sha ro bem po 'dug pa dang// sbrid po ci der 'ong ba dang// gzhog sbrid rtsa khrid 'phreng 'khyug byed// zha rangs

'khums rgur yo sle dang// skya dang skam dang ne seg 'brul// sha 'gul skye rtse ber ba ldang// ba lhags sha bkra g.yan pa 'ong// rdzi lengs smi ma sma ra 'byi// mdog nag so skya sna khrag mang// gtar na khrag ngan
sol khu 'dra// lus rgud stobs zhan 'dar ba dang// lus 'dar brjed pa rkyen pa dang// snying 'dar rma lugs ngan pa dang// rngam pa 'degs dang rgod pa dang// ug sogs blo lu skyed mdangs 'chor ba

dang// khor sgyur ba dang sha mdangs 'tsher// skyigs bu 'ong dang sna khrag mang/ khams dang nya skangs dur shig 'ong// gshogs bshal rgu ru da rgan dang// dgu 'khri gzhang na blo 'khrig byed// lus sbo chu sogs
pho ba 'degs// long 'gul khong za 'khru skyug 'byang// gdug pa'i nad rnams zhugs pa yin// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa las le'u bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje rnon pos yang gsol pa// nyam nga gdug pa'i nad dang
dug/ 'grim pa ngos bzung ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs pas bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba mi la gdug pa'i nad// lus la thebs nas 'grim pa'i nad// stod kyis smad la ngos bzung zhing// smad kyi nad kyis

stod la gzung// stod kyis smad du snyeg pa dang// smad kyis stod du bsnyeg pa te// klad pa'i nad ni skra gseb nas// byin pa'i gnas su 'grim pa yin// tha ma gzhung bar snyeg pa ste// rgud po 'am yang 'drud por

'gro// chu ba'i nad ni long bu nas// smin phrag dag tu 'dril bar byed// dgye dgu 'ja' ste stog rtsar snyeg/ tshigs pa'i nad ni tshig pa dang// mig tu 'grim par byed pa ste// tha ma mchin par bsnyeg pa
dang// btsos kyi nad ni mkhur tshos dang// gnyan gong dag tu 'grim pa ste// btsos la sha ro 'ong ba yin// tha ma sna la snyeg par byed// rus pa'i nad ni ni kos ko/ la srubs 'grim par

byed// 'brum chung tsha btsag 'ong pa ste// tha ma rus la snyeg par byed// rgyus pa'i nad de dpung pa dang// rting chu ba ni 'grim pa ste// skar tshugs tsha la sbrid pa ste// tha ma rgyus pa la snyeg go/ gdong sna'i nad dang

yang// ngar gdong dag tu 'grim pa ste// sha mtshan 'am na sha ro 'ong// skad 'gag thor bu phra mo 'ong// tha ma blo la snyeg pa'o// gces pa'i nad ni snying ka nas// mtshan ma dag tu 'grim pa ste// sha ro bem po

'ong ba dang// snying shugs 'ong zhing nus pa chung// tha ma snying la snyeg pa yin// rtsa nad mchan khung brla yi phyi// sha bkra sha ro 'ong ba dang// tha ma rtsa la snyeg pa yin// snod kyi nad ni mchin khri dang// gzhungs pa

'drin zhing bems po 'ong// tha ma mcher pa dag la snyeg/ mkhal ma'i nad de mkhal ma dang// byin pa'i nywa gzhug 'drim pa yin// thor bu nya sgangs 'ongs pa dang// tha ma mkhal rtsa dag la snyeg/ srab rtse'i nad

ni yob chen gong/ khrig ma dag la 'drim pa ste// srab rtse tshigs mig na ba dang// tha ma 'or mig 'ong ba yin// gza' chu'i nad ni gza' chu dang// sgal khung dag tu 'grim pa ste// thor bu rma rgan 'ong ba

dang// tha ma zha 'khum dag tu 'gro// ltag pa'i nad ni ltag gzhung 'grim// zug dang chu ser 'bab pa ste// tha ma 'jang la snyeg pa'o// sog pa'i nad de sogs pa dang// snag po che ru 'grim pa ste// tsag tsag

'ong zhing snag la snyeg/ spu yi nad ni skra mtshams dang// spu mtshams dag tu 'grim par byed// sil sil pa dang zing zing 'ong// sha mdangs khyab par snyeg pa yin// rtsa nad nad kyi bshul sha dang// 'jing pa

snyeg pa de yis// dgye bo yang na sgur por 'gro// tha ma chu pa rnams la snyeg/ bcu bdun gnad du 'grim pa yin// de ma yin par mi 'grim ste// 'grim zhing snyegs pa de dag la// 'grim sgo dgag pa gces pa

yin// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa las// zin thebs kyi gnad de le'u lnga pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// nad kyi bstan pa de ltar na// drag po sngags rgod yang gsang thugs// snying po don gyi sbyor ba

dang// yang dag rdzogs pas bka' stsal pa// klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa can// nyam nga ba yi nad dar na// rgya shog rgyu la tsakra bri// ru sbal lto bar mu khyud bskor// dbus su drag po bzhi ldan pa// dbang gi

khor yug ldan par bri// sna tshogs rdo rje ldan pa la// lcags khang 'khrul mig bcu gcig ldan// ru sbal rtsa ba'i 'khrul 'khor yin// dbus su klu gnyan sa bdag gi/ ming dang snying po bri bar bya// ma mo rgyal po
mdze 'drin btsan// drag po'i khang pa gsum par gnas// mtshams su gdug pa'i gzugs ldan par// drag po'i sngags kyis bskor bar bya// sna tshogs rdo rje rtsa ba'i lus// 'khrul mig bcu
gcig yang sngags dgod/ khor yug rigs bzhi gdug pa'i gzugs// dug khrag tsha ba'i ngar bslud la// e yi gnas khang kha khyer gsum// rtsang thod me ri ldan par gzhag/ tsakra bar snang thod pa gnag kha
sbyar bar du dmigs pa bsam// phyag rgya zil gnon skur bsgoms la// bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar brdeg/ 'khor lo thod pa rdzas bdug cing// dug khrag mtshon dang dug mda' dang// bye ma su rgya dzi

las brdeg/ shi khrag drag po bcu gcig 'bru// yang gsang mchog gi snying po yin// nyid kyis sku gsung thugs rdo rje yi// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa la/ sa nA ga

tsa tri du me srog la breng breng rtsa la dun dun spur nan kham shag rbad/ sa nA ga phreng breng dun dun thum ril nA ga ra dza/ sa nA ga sog la breng breng dza dza thum ril shag/ sa nA ga srog la dun dun thum ril shag/ sa nA

ga tsit+ta la thum ril shag rbad/ sa nA ga thum ling khas thum ril shag/ sa nA ga srog la hur thum ril shag/ sa nA ga tsit+ta la thum ril shag/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan thum ril shag/ tsa tri shu la du me ma ma

srog gzer thum ril shag/ tsa tri shu la gzir nan thum ril shag/ ro nri tri yaM shig nan gzir thuM ril shag/ drag po bkod kyi sngags bzlas shing// dang po phyag rgya sku nyid bstan// 'od zer 'bar bas sgrib pa
bsreg/ rang bzhin sngags mtha' stong nyid dang// drag po me dbal 'khor lo mtshon// skam chags rgyun gyis srog phrogs nas// gsang mdzod mu khyud gzugs la bsdu// me rlung stobs kyis 'khrug cing
sdud// srid pa'i ru sbal lto bar 'chang// 'khor lo me rlung mtshon cha yis// srog rtsa gcod cing gdug rtsub bsreg/ drag po sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// bdug pa bsreg cig thal ba mnan// ka rten nam lha
khang them 'og gzhug/ ya ma ka li dregs pa can// ha mo gnon pa be ka tA// yang gsang mchog gis sngags su gsungs// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa las le'u drug pa'o//// rdo rje rnon pos yang gsol

pa// sngags kyi sbyor ba de ltar na// 'tsho byed sman gyi sbyor ba gang// yang dag rdzogs pas nges gsungs pa// nyam nga'i nad rnams zhugs pa yi// dug ro sman gyis gdon par bya// phyi nas zhugs par gyur pa

la// tsan dug dag gi sman mar ram// yang na dug gi ri lu gtang// nang nas zhugs par gyur pa la// mu zi mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar/ khem bus tshad dang ldan par ni// mkhas pas lto stong dag la gtang// dngas
mar zhugs kyang de bzhin bya// byang chub sems la zhugs pa la/ khu ba bu ram sbyar te gtang// dbang po lag pa ba'am ra'i// 'o mar 'dus dang sbrang rtsir sbyar// dang po mi ldang nad kun

sel// ra tsha rgya tsha ze'u tsha// dbyi mor dkar por sbyar ba yis// sha ro bems po'i nad rnams 'dren// rtsa nad rtsa sbyongs bya ba dang// 'bri ta sa 'dzin sbyar bas sel// zha dang rengs 'khums lums kyis

gso// yo dang sle'o me btsas bsrong// seng ldeng sman mar dag gis ni// rus pa'i nad kun sel ba yin// skye a kod pa da dang// tsan dan mar khu sbyar te byug/ a ru ra dang ba ru ra/ kham bu yi ni snying po

bsreg/ tsher sngon chu dang sbyar ba yis// skra dang smin ma 'byi ba gso// a be sha dang brag rgya yis/ khrag gi nad la bdud rtsi ni// seng ldeng 'o mar bsdus pa dang// 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul dkar// so ma ra

tsa tha skar rdo rje dang// cong zi sbrang zir sbyar ba yis// bcud la zhugs pa'i nad rnams sel// dkar po chig thub snying zho sha/ 'dza' ti sbyar bas snying nad sel// bung pa rtsi dang sro lo dkar// glo ba'i nad rnams
sel ba yin// gur kum tig gi me tog gis// mchin pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed// seng ldeng gso ma ra tsa dang// tsan dan dkar po 'bras bu gsum// nim pa ma hA nim par sbyar// chu ser nag po mtha'

dag skems// tsha sna btsod khu sbyar ba yis// 'brum 'phran nad rnams sel bar byed// mu zi phag tshil sbyar ba yis// bal ldags sha bkra glang shu 'dzoms// gzhan yang nad kyis 'grim pa la// rtsa sgo dgag dang
me btsas bsrung// gzhungs pa snyeg na an rtog dgag/ sgur po dang ni 'drud pa la// lums bya me btsas bsreg par bya// gza' skye me btsas bsreg pa dang// gza' gums lums su gzhug par bya// drang srong

snyeg la me btsa' bya// nya thor byung na mdzo lci byug/ shu ba gcod kyis gdul bar bya// mchin pa'i srang ni me rtsa gdab// sna la gtar kha nya ral bya// sha ro btsog bskor mu zi gdab// sna bshal bya zhing 'dren sman
gtang// sha sul me btsa' gdab pa dang// thor bu btsos lums gdul bar bya// rus pa'i rgyal po bsreg par bya// rus snying lums su gzhug par bya// dkar tshugs dugs kyis gdul bar bya// sbrid po la

ni snum dug ting// sna bi rtse mo gshag par bya// ngar gdong long rtsa spro bar bya// blo yi srang sgo bsreg par bya// sha ro la ni bskor tshe bshal// yang na sum pa'i 'dren bshal bya// glo yi sgang rtsa gtar pa

dang// cu gang gur kum gtang bar bya// snying srang nu 'jing bsro bar bya// rtsa ba lnga yi sman yang sbyar// mkhal rtsa rtsa ba 'phreng nyal bsro// bems po bci yis btsog par bya// mkhal rtsa me rtsas bsro ba
dang// sha bkra gur kum chu yis bkru// mcher rtsa srang sgo bsro ba dang// bems po bcu yis btsog par bya// braM tshe snum gyis gso bar bya// hog mig lcags kyis bsreg par bya// rma rgan rul chod
gtang la gso// chu ser 'dren bshal gtang byas la// zug rngu lums kyis gso bar bya// gu gul bshal btang sha sul me btsas bsrung// spyi gtsug bshal rnams btang ba dang// sha thang bar yang bshal bar

bya// bshul rtsa nag po gtar ba dang// bshul sgo me rtsas dgag par bya// dgye rgu lums kyis gso bar bya// mkhas pas rig par shes pas ni// sman dang dpyad kyi sbyor ba yin// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa las
le'u bdun pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sman dpyad sbyor ba de ltar na// 'phrin las sbyor ka ji ltar bya// yang dag dpa' bos bka' stsal pa// gdug pa gsum gyi nad dang dug/ gdug rtsub

zhi bar byed pa ste// bsreg pa'i sbyor ba las kyi gcong// thog mar gdug pa dbang du bsdu// de nas drag pos tshar gcad cing// tha mar zhi ba'i las bya'o// dben pa'i gnas su 'du 'dzi spangs// pad+ma ra ga'i

sa gzhi la// maN+Dal gru gsum sa gcad la// dpangs su khru re ldan par bya// dbus su me thab gru gsum la/ kha khyer gsum ldan sor gnyis zhing/ khrag dang rgya skyegs khu bas byug/ nang du rdo rje lcags kyu

bri// sa dang nA ga dza dang hri// hoM khung nang du gang bar bri/ kha khyer a kar sha yas bskor// tha ma sbrul gyis bskor bar bya// hoM shing smyag shad rgya shing dang/ khru gang gtubs la dmar po shing// tsan dan dmar po

rgya skyegs dang/ khrag gis byugs te brtsegs par bya// bar snang dbang sdud tsakra bri// ras sam rgya shog de dag la// tsan dan dmar po rgya skyegs kyis// dbang la sa dang nA ga la// hri dza zhes pa dgod par
bya// mu khyud rtsa ba'i snying po dang// tha ma lcags kyu 'bar ba la// tsan dan dmar pos bskus pa yi// sngags rnams kyis ni rab tu brgyan// bar snang bsreg pa nam mkha' yi// tsakra yin par yang dag
bshad// dbang gi drag sngags bar mi gcad// zhag bdun bar bzlas dmigs pa rtag/ bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol ma ste// pho nya bskul la dbang du bya// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go/ ebya myags

ya sbubs mugs shag dun/ sa na ga sarba a kar sha ya breng breng/ dun dun dza/ bsreg pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// thab tu me lha sku mdog dkar// 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu yis// gdug pa'i klu gnyan dbang

du bsdu// me nyid me long de nyid du// phyag rgya zil gnon dkyil 'khor tshogs// dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin te// bsreg rdzas dbul zhing gsang sngags bzlas// sa nA ga trig nan snying gzer sbur nan// hri
shag dza/ sa nA ga dza/ sa nA ga a kar+Sha ya/ breng breng dun dun dza/ gdug pa'i klu gnyan dregs pa kun// dbang du byas te 'gugs par byed// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa las// dbang gi le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas drag po'i las bshad pa// gnas mchog dben pa'i sa dag tu// phung sa gsum la maN+Dal bya// sna tshogs khrag dang dug chus byug/ bsreg pa sa gzhi'i tsakra bri// dbus su grub gsum brtseg

par bya/ kha khyer gsum dang ldan pa ni// nang du mtho gang bar ma la// mdzub gang tha ma chag gang yin// rtsang dang thod pa me ri bya// nang du rgya sol nag pos byug kha khyer dmar por shis pa ste// dbus su sna

tshogs rdo rje yam// gdug pa'i gzugs dang snying po dgod// za kham la ni gang gnod gzugs// de 'og sa gting khru gang du// thod par dbang gi tsakra dang// ling ka bcas pa gnan pa yin// hoM shing nag la

rtsub pa ste// dug gi shing ngam tsher ma can// skyer pa mdzad mo gra ma dang/ kha da ra yi me shing la/ khru gang tshad la drag por brtsig/ bcu gnyis rtsibs la bsreg rdzas dgod// gsod dang bsreg pa'i tsakra
dang// bsreg pa'i steng gcod tsakra yin// dur khrod ro yi ras la bri// dbus su drag po ldan pa la// dbang gi khor yug gnyis pa yin// gdug pa gsum dang sdong zla bri// bcu gnyis tshe ring rtsang bar

ldan// yang rim bcu gnyis bsreg par ldan// tha ma sbrul dang me ri ste// srid pa ru sbal lto bar bca'// bar snang me thod mkha' la bca'// sha sna khrag sna tshil dang ni// dug dang 'o ma de bzhin chang// mar
nag nyungs kar nyungs nag dang// bsreg rdzas ling gas yongs su bskor// nub dang lho ru kha ltas la// rag shing 'phreng thogs gos nag gon// lha yi nga rgyal zil gnon bsgom// zhag bdun gsal gsum drag

sngags bzlas// nyi ma'i gung dang nam gung la// bskul dang btab pa drag sngags re// rdzas dang ling gar ming byang bsreg/ lha re bskul la drag sngags bcus// rdzas dang ling ga re re dbul// gdug pa can

rnams tshar gcad phyir// bdun pa rtags rtsub mang na spogs// tha ma thor bar tsakra grub// las kyi thun dbab bye tshan brdeg/ thal ba gzhan rnams ling ga la// zor du brdeg dang gnod sar 'phang// las kyi

tsakra'ang de bzhin gnas// de yi gsang sngags bstan pa ni// sku gsung thugs las 'thon pa'o// sa nA ga du ram/ sa nA ga u nan/ sa nA ga u nan gzer phyung srog la dun raM tsit+ta preng shag thun rbad/ e raM/ sa

nA ga tsi tra du me srog la yam shag rbad/ raM kha raM dz+wa la raM/ drag po tshar gcad cho gar bshad// ru sbal khra bo'i gsang ba'i rtog pa las// tshar gcad pa'i 'phrin las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas phan
gdags cho ga bshad// drag po'i rjes la shis pa 'am// yang na gong bu bya ba yin// gnas mchog yid dang 'thad pa ru// dang zhi ba'i las bya ba// 'jam zhing snum la dkar ba'i sa// yo byad la

sogs bsags byas la// maN+Dal rgya gcad dkar por bya// dri spos ldan pas byug pa bya// dbus su hoM khung zlum po la/ khru gang rgya gcad mdzub gang dpangs// zheng du'ang ni sor bzhi ldan/ khru gang gter du

brko bar bya// dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// ge sar kun d+ha lta bu la// tha ma khor yug zlum po dkar// hoM shing lcang ma glang ma dang// bal bu 'phang ma khru gang la// zlum po'i dbyibs su bri bar bya// bsreg
rdzas 'bras bu nas chen dang// rtsi mar me tog dkar po dang// rtsi bcud 'o ma lce phog dkar// yam shing ldan pa dbul bar bya'o// dang pos gang lta lha sgom zhing// bskul re sngags bcus bsreg rdzas
dbul// zhi bar gyur cig brjod par bya// thal 'jam gtsang ma'i ras kyis dril// zhi ba'i gnas su sba bar bya// gdug pa ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di gsungs

so// hur khaM baM ril sa nA ga thu shan []ting ku ru/ dz+nyA na sarba ho'i/ thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa las/ zhi ba'i las te sbyin sreg gi rim pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rdo rje rnon pos yang
gsol pa// 'phrin las sbyor ka de ltar na// gdug pa klu gnyan sa bdag gi/ sdong zla gzir ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs pas bka' stsal pa// kun tu 'khrug pa the brang yin// sna 'dren 'gong po

rgyal the'u klu// byad ma ma mos byed pa ste// btsan gyi kyang ni blo bur 'khrug/ klu btsan rtag par gnod par byed// dam sri klu srin nyen slong bas// drag po rdzas kyi gzir bar bya// nya sbrul sbal pa'i sha yis
ni// bsregs na klu gnyan sa bdag bskrod// gu gul spru ma'i dud pa yis// rgyal po dang ni the'u brang gzir// mi sha'i dud pas dam sri gzir// khu yug rtsa yi dud pas ni// klu bsen mo dag gzir bar

byed// gu gul nag po btsan dug bsreg/ btsan dang srog bdag skrag pa yin// phag rtug rnga mo'i rtug pa bsreg/ de yis ma mo gzir bar byed// dregs pa'i spyi bshig sgo gzhig bya// sarba rtsa sbur/ srog gzir

breng shar yi rbad/ yang na rdzas rgod bco brgyad bsreg/ mi rtag bya yi tshil bu dang// nya sbrul sbal pa'i sha dag dang/ khyi phag spyang ki'i brun dang ni// ra dug re lcag thal nur dang// btsan dug rlung ru rta mig

dang// gu gul nag po mu zi dang// mdzo dang dre'u khyi spu sbyar te// ling ga 'am tsakra bdug par bya// nad pa yang ni bdug par bya// de yis sdong zlar gyur pa kun// myos dang skrag dang brgyal nas 'gros// sha rus
zhig dang kha sbub 'gyel// dran pa nyams shing srog dang 'bral// ces gsungs so// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa bcu gcig pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sdong zla gzir ba de ltar

na// sdong zla gzhi mar bcas pa yi// rtags dang drod tshad ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs pas nges bshad pa// thog mar spre'u dang byi la bong bu dang// lha khang mchod khang thangs sku lugs sku dang// bu chung

khyed khu btsun pa sprang po dang// mdze can rgya lta 'bag seng dang// re hrul khang stong sgo chung dog par 'dzul// gnyis pa nya dang sbal lcong rta bla'o// se sing 'bu dang bra ma grog mo dang// sbrang bu

mchu rings ma dang chung ma dang// sring mo mdza' mo gnyen bshes bud med dang// bud med nag mo sngo dang dkar mo dang// btsun pa dge bsnyen mo dang khyi phag wa dang// gsum pa'i rtags ni ra lug mang po dang// ba glang sdig pa

rta dang ra thag dang// gcan spyang chu dang tsher ma ston pa dang// mi dang srog chags ston pa yin// bzhi pa'i rtags ni glang chen zhing chen dang// mtha' med nags dang thang chen gad pa dang// brag g.yang sha dang chu

dang lung stong dang// mi lus mgo brnyan dag tu ston pa yin// lnga pa'i rtags te zhang blon mi chen dang// sbal sbrul dang chu rta chu lugs dang// ri dang chu dang mtshe'u dang lteng ka'o// drug pa'i rtags mtshan rtsad po

btsan mo dang// ri rab rgya mtsho ngan ri sha ra dang// lta 'drod sna tshogs mdog ldan rba rgal dang// chu chen rgyun 'bab lu ma rdzing bu ston// de ni gnas kyi bdag po rim pa bzhin// the brang 'gong po sa

gsen sa bdag gnyan// rigs kyi klu dang rigs bzhi'i gnas su gtod// thub na dang po nang nas phyi ru stod// gdon kyang chu la cho 'phrul che 'phra ston// mi thub rim pas phyi nas nang du stod// gdon kyang che

la cho 'phrul je che ston// gnas nas rim pas gnas pa ji bzhin du// gnod pa'i dus su phyi nas nang du stod// gdon mgo chog na nang nas phyi ru stod// des thub phyi rol rtags rnams ston// de nas tha ma dam
sri 'gong po yi// rtags rnams byung nas mtshams gdon gtang rag gtang// de ma shes na slar la nang du stod// dper na btson thar mi 'gros 'dzing ka srog dang mtshungs// rtags log gdon lhang blo bur nad

kyang 'ong// the brang 'gong po'i rtags de ma byung na// klu gnyan gnyis ka'i mgo nas ma thar bas// brtson 'grus drag pos dpa' brtul bskyed cing bya// ru sbal khra bo'i rtog pa bcu gnyis pa// rdo rje rnon po ral

gri che// rdo rje mi thub 'jigs pa yis// e ma sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sku// mi rtog chos dbyings 'das pa yi// gdug pa 'dul byed khyod phyag 'tshal// sngags kyi ngo bo khyod phyag 'tshal// bla med skyob mdzad
khyod la 'dud// mun sel sgron me khyod phyag 'tshal// nad sel sman pa'i mchog la 'dud// le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud// rus sbal khra bo'i
rtog pa zhes bya ba rtog pa bcu gsum pa/ gdug pa gsum 'dul kyi rgyud rdzogs so// sa ma ya na ra skan////
